story:
Hi there!

There are many small things we need carry with us on a daily basis. Some of them are vital to keep our health in check. You don’t want a constant reminder that your well-being depends on your daily intake of meds that are carried in those pill pods that tells everybody that you are sick. We wanted to create a small watertight storage solution so you can confidently carry those essentials with you at all times in an inconspicuous way, and that's when iNA was born.

Its minimalistic and timeless design will blend beautifully with your outfit making it a must have accessory. If you don’t find anything to store in it, don’t worry, the quality and human validation of each piece results in an industrial container of such perfection that it can be used as jewelry. 

It's made for travellers, adventurers, design lovers, titanium lovers, for you.

 

Design

During the prototyping phase we had a clear goal in mind: Minimalism.

These small Jewells are meticulously crafted using state of the art CNC machines and hand finished with the utmost care and attention to detail. The quality of the product is not apparent in what you see; it's in the details you can not see but that must be felt to appreciate.

 

 

Grade 5 titanium - Ti6Al4V

This material is widely used in the aerospace industry due to its exceptional strength and mechanical properties. Also, Frank Gehry, the acclaimed architect, decided to use it for the Guggenheim in Bilbao, a world-renowned art museum.

This has to be the coolest metal on earth and we absolutely love working with it. We have devoted ourself to learning on how to machine this exotic metal and that's why all of our products are available only in titanium. It is corrosion resistant, it is non toxic and non reactive, making them the perfect storage system when a degradation of their contents is not an option.

Let me highlight some of its benefits:

  • It is not much heavier than aluminum but it is harder than most steels.
  • It does not corrode.
  • It does not stain.
  • It does not smell.
  • It is paramagnetic.
  • It is food safe.
  • It is non-toxic and non-reactive. 
  • It can be anodised.

These small containers are virtually indestructible and they will last a very, very long time. 

If you haven’t experienced the feeling of holding it in your hands, just give it a try. You won't see other metals the same way after owning your first titanium product. 

 

 

Available in different sizes

The iNA containers are available in four different sizes. The cap which is the female part is only available in 15mm (0.59") but you can find the male parts in 15mm , 25mm, 35mm and 45mm (0.59",  0.98", 1.38" and 1.77"), combining both parts, iNA is available in 30mm, 40mm, 50mm and 60mm (0.91",  1.30", 1.70" and 2.09"). Choose the one that best suits your needs.

 

Watertight 

What!? With a cord coming from the inside of the capsule, no way! It may seem impossible but yes, iNA is watertight. We spent months working on it and we finally found a way to produce it  a . That's one of our goals and we didn't want to make compromises on this regard. Yes it might be a little overengineered for what it is, but I'm proud of what we achieved and probably this will be the container with an attaching point with the most minimalistic design you'll ever find.

 

The inner seal

This piece fits perfectly inside iNA's cap preventing moisture and dust from getting inside keeping your essentials protected. No special tools are required to remove it from the cap, only a bent paper clip will suffice. Once removed, you will gain access to the cord from the inside, should you need to replace it and also to the included spare o-rings that are inside the cap, hidden when you don't need them but always with you when a worn-out or broken o-ring needs a replacement. 

 

 

Different package options

You can get a single iNA showcased in a small tin case with custom foam insert.

With the iNA DUO you get 2 iNAs of the same size. There are four DUOs available, iNA30 DUO, iNA40 DUO, iNA50 DUO and iNA60 DUO, which include two iNA30s, two iNA40s, two iNA50s or iNA60s respectively in the same tin case. This is a better deal if you need two iNAs, a very popular option amongst couples.

With the iNA SET you get all four iNAs, one of each available size. This SET is by far the most popular option and I can understand why. Once you have them with you, you can decide which one best suits your needs and order later some additional ones in case there's a particular size you use or need the most. It's showcased in a tin case with a custom foam insert.

The DUOs and SET reduces packaging and shipping costs and I'll pass those savings onto you, making them better deals if you are thinking on getting several units for you or to share with your loved ones. 

 

 

 

The Micro cord Loop 

The soft loop you see on top of iNA is a high-tech braided cord called micro cord from Atwood Rope MFG and let me tell you it is awesome.

I like the flexibility the cord gives you. You can adjust the loop the size you need. You can make the loop small enough to let a necklace fastener through or long enough to use the cord itself as a necklace.

It is very soft to the touch and it will not scratch your precious container. As an added benefit, it will not make chain rattling noises. It is only 1.18mm (3/64”) in diameter and it is surprisingly strong.

It is available in more than 30 colors, perfect when you want to differentiate multiple iNAs or if you want to match colors with your outfit or your existing gear. But I've reduced the offering to the 10 most popular ones and also, because Indiegogo won't let me put more colors. :-). You can choose your desired color at the time of selecting your desired perk. If you choose a DUO or a SET you will be given the option to choose a different color for each one of your iNAs. All perks will include 50cm micro cord extra in case you want to resize the loop to a longer one or in case you need to replace the existing one.

In Spain we have a saying that goes: "Para gustos los colores" which translates to: "Everyone to his taste". If you don't find your favourite color in the current offering, please don't hesitate to contact me.

 

 

 

 

What they say about iNA...

"These storage containers have been expertly machined so that you can’t feel or even see the seam between the two parts of the container."

Julie Strietelmeier, The Gadgeteer 

 

"iNA titanium capsules are perfect for your tiny EDC items."

COOL MATERIAL

"After creating the hugely popular NARA & YOKO minimalist titanium storage containers, Spanish designer Dara, based in Barcelona has taken to Kickstarter once again to launch their new iNA storage container which is available in four different sizes depending on your requirements and is equipped with a loop that can be used to easily attach the container to your bag, coat or keychain."

Julian Horsey, Geeky Gadgets

 

What people say about our products 

"Very well done! These are so much better than the mass produced containers, and not that much more expensive. Glad I went with the trio, although I kind of wish I went with the deluxe set. I look forward to your next project."

Robert 

 

"I love my Nara/Yoko combination. It stands upright and I intend to place in it a memory card with all our family photos and give it to my son as an heirloom. The workmanship is superb. Thank you!"

Riccardo

 

"I received mine yesterday and I am beyond impressed!! Literally every detail from the packaging down to the personal note made my heart smile. You’ve got an absolute fan in me and I can’t wait to see what you guys do next."

Tracy

 

"Hi Dara and Isami, I just received mine today, and I must say I am very impressed with the quality of the capsule. The finishing is awesome ! And the dedicated "thank you" note on the packaging is so charming ! Definitely among the best campaign I ever backed. Congratulations for your great work. Keep me posted for your future projects !"

Olivier

 

I have received them and two of the containers have been living in my handbag since the day they arrived!

I am a severe complex migraine sufferer (boo!) and need to carry medication with me at all times. I had not been able to find a pill case I did not find annoying - until your containers came along :)

I know my meds are secure, but I am not constantly reminded of my need to carry meds as the containers are funky and nice to hold and touch; totally not “pill case” like in the traditional chemist-store sense. 

The third is going to be used to store a list of my medications so that, should I need the help of an ambulance/paramedics again one day, they can see what my current meds & doses are and be alerted to my ‘existing condition’ - vastly improving my chances of survival as a hemiplegic migraineur. 

I love my little Nara & Yoko pods completely ? Thank you for making them ?

Korinne

 

I received the package with the impressive Nara container (seriously – it’s a work of art).

Bonnie

 

Dara and Isami you guys did an amazing job on these and I'm so glad I got the Deluxe set! Shipping Canada was lightning fast! The precision of the machining is the best I’ve seen, the finish is beautiful and perfectly consistent. Love how the sizing and makers mark is on the inside so there’s no confusion as to which size is being handled but it’s still very subtle. The packaging and foam inserts are very well-done even with the thoughtful touch of a slot for spare o-rings. You guys truly went 110%. I would support anything else you put your name on in a heartbeat

Gordon

 

 

 

Each and every single container will be made by us in our workshop in Barcelona. We have shipped over 1000 containers to more than 400 people in more than 40 countries. Producing the best products we can offer is our number one priority. With your help and support we can continue investing on new technology that will certainly improve the quality of our products.

Thank you so much for checking out this project.

Cheers,

Dara

story:
His Story

Randy Blake's family moved from Cleveland, Ohio to Tulsa, Oklahoma where he continues to reside.  Greatly influenced by the Jean-Claude VanDamme movie, Bloodsport, Randy began his training at the age of seven.  Encouraged by his mother's christmas gift of a punching/kicking bag, Randy's love of kicking brought him to a new level of inspiration as he's continued focusing his training in the mixed-martial arts. 

2003  Randy received his 1st Degree black belt under Dale "Apollo" Cook at the age of sixteen.

2007  He had his first Ameatur Fight and became successful from then on going undefeated and capturing the Amateur Muay Thai Light Heavyweight Title 

2008  He was called upon to join the CHUCK NORRIS WORLD COMBAT LEAGUE for the OKLAHOMA DESTROYERS where his fights have been aired on the Versus channel also making a spectacular knockout finish Now Randy fights Pro and is still undefeated

2011  Randy has received his 4th Degree black belt under Dale "Apollo" Cook.

Currently he is the XFL Light Heavyweight Kickboxing Champion at 205 lbs.

Pro Record- 20 - 0 
WCL Record 2-1


The Impact

Your support will assist Randy to fully devote his time to the intense training required to be victorious in the ring.  As contributing sponsor, your financial support is greatly appreciated by your own CHAMPION.  This is your opportunity to personally be more than just a fan.  Please help feed the RB3 machine!!!


What You can Get

$25 official RB3 T-shirt

$35 signature "Boom Boom" hat

$50 "Boom Boom" special both a RB3 T-shirt and signature hat

$250 private lunch with "Boom-Boom"

$500 The "TKO" Package


Other Ways You Can Help

We know youâ€™re more than a fan and have a STRONG voice!!!  Please, help us to advertise who we are and what we do! 

If you cannot afford to donate, you can still support Randy â€œBoom-Boomâ€ Blake by joining our Facebook group and encourage RB3â€™s training.  Sponsorship will allow this athlete to show you directly where your contributions are going and the positive progress your funds have been used to improve his training.

PLEASE assist our cause by sharing this with your co-workers, friends, and family who want to PROMOTE and SPONSOR your own MMA fighter, Randy â€œBoom-Boomâ€ Blake!

story:
We're a small team, and we have a dream. To provide durable wooden sunnies, personalised just for you! Help us on this journey and get your own engraved wooden sunnies! 


What We Need & What You Get

We need 5000USD in order to reach our goal and deliver these amazing wooden walnut sunnies to you! In our exclusive Indiegogo only deal, the first 50 orders in our engraved sunnies perk will receive engravings free! Be sure to comment the engravings you want in the comments section! 

The Impact

We've worked hard to build contacts with suppliers in order to have these sunnies ready for Indiegogo, once we get the funding we will do our best to deliver these products out to you as fast as we can. 

Risks & Challenges

It's been a long journey for us to get to this point, if you donate it'll be greatly appreciated!

Other Ways You Can Help

Make some noise, share us on Facebook, Twitter and to your friends and family!

story:
LUUNA, the first intelligent sleep mask that tailors its soothing capabilities to your sleep schedule. In today’s fast pace world, true relaxation is hard to achieve. LUUNA will give you the rest you need in order to be more fully awake for the things that matter most to you.

Whether it be to lull you into a nap or caress you into a full night sleep, LUUNA intelligently learns from your brain waves to produce music and sounds that are in harmony with your body’s rhythm, helping you fall asleep better and faster. 

 

Above is s short sample from me. This might be the first Brainwave-AI Music you've heard. I do love the artificial intelligent music which reads my mind and knows what sound my brain need. When I'm sleepy, it won't wake me up and will naturally lull me to sleep. When I was in college, I was so eager to have a product like this that helps me have power naps every day. 

Now I have it! I'm so refreshed and powered after the catnaps!

 Are you curious? How does it work?

Below is the original EEG signals LUUNA collected for the first 6 minutes.

Based on above raw data, LUUNA's app drew the Sleep Curve and you can also see the Sleep Stages made according to the curve.

Below graph shows how music pitch reflects the sleep stages and match sleep status. When I was awake, the pitch is higher and denser than when I was drowsy and in light sleep. But it gradually lowered the pitch and slowed the pace to lead me to relax and sleep. The music differs person by person and time by time because every time the brain activity is definitely different.

For now, the music is mainly pop piano. But there will be more instruments and styles available. 

Let LUUNA help you fall into a deep sleep or simply recharge your mind and body with a quick nap. Whichever sleep mode you choose, Luuna is there for you.

  • SOUND SLEEP

Choose the sleep mode on your app to get you ready for a full night of restful sleep. Let LUUNA's artificial intelligence soothe you with calming music as you doze off into a peaceful slumber.

  • POWER NAP

LUUNA's app features a power nap mode just in case you only need a few short minutes to recharge your mind, energy, and help you boost your brain's learning capacity.

  • CONCENTRATION

Concentration training is much like weightlifting for your brain. This mode helps you master the ability to focus for longer periods of time.

LUUNA uses your brains own melody and intelligent AI to create a song to fit your mood. And when you do fall asleep LUUNA adaptively lowers the volume and fades out the music replacing it with the gentle sounds of nature.

By monitoring EEG signals, LUUNA is aware of when you’re in your deepest sleep and waits to wake you in your light sleep keeping that post-nap fog from clouding the rest of your day.

         EEG IS MORE ACCURATE 

 An electroencephalogram (EEG) is a test that detects electrical activity in your brain using small, flat metal discs (electrodes). Your brain cells communicate via electrical impulses and are active all the time, even when you're asleep. 

EEG monitoring is the most accurate and effective way to track brain activity sleep stages. Entertech has one of the most accurate EEG dry acquisition technology in the world and the most accurate algorithms for automatic sleep tracking and analysis. 

The LUUNA's app offers daily, weekly and monthly reports to show your sleep cycles and other data to understand your sleep patterns better and help you reach your sleep goals.

Free app available for IOS and Android devices

LUUNA’s high-tech design gives you up to 80 hours of battery life which makes it perfect to enjoy the many options that Luuna has to offer. Listen to your preferred music style with your earbuds, or connect your own speaker directly to your smartphone to relax the night away with soothing sounds.

Standby time more than 50 days!

LUUNA is only 50g in weight and provides you with a sense of security with special pinholes that you can peep through at any time.

LUUNA gives you the perfect light-shade because the 3D mask was specially designed to fit the contour of your face with skin-friendly fabric, making it extremely comfortable.

Did we mention that LUUNA can be washed? Just don't forget to detach the EEG sensor beforehand. Don't want to wash it? Buy an extra mask only for $19!

Naptime is our last product for which we also did a campaign on Indiegogo. Now LUUNA is ready to offer you the new experience of sleep and relax!

We are the Entertech team, and we focus on developing high-tech wearables for health, leading the way with dry EEG acquisition and ECG acquisition technology. Our R & D team consists of bioelectric data collection specialists from Zhejiang University, Hangzhou Dianzi University, University of York, and others.   

Up to now, EEG technology has entered into different application fields, such as healthcare, education, toys and games and so on. We are glad to cooperate with other companies and popularize the EEG technology with teams in relevant industries. Meanwhile, we will focus on mental health applications and launch a series of products around spiritual health like sleep, meditation, and relaxation etc. , which we believe will be more and more important.

 

 

Q&A

1. Can I connect LUUNA with my Bluetooth speaker?

Definitely yes. Any Bluetooth you used before can be connected to your phone as usual. Bluetooth connection between LUUNA and app won't break your habit of listening music!

2. How can I wash the mask?

The electronic parts are detachable. Take them down gently and you can wash it.

 

Risks & Challenges

Entertech has researched and developed EEG acquisition technology for the last four years and cooperated with many well-known Chinese university laboratories, science museums, and hospitals ever since the team was set up. The Forehead Three-electrode EEG acquisition Program is our new development proposed because of LUUNA. People who know EEG would know that most EEG acquisitions need a reference electrode on the ear, which will greatly limit product design. The fulfillment and effectiveness of this new program highly boost our confidence in Luuna. We have also integrated the EEG acquisition module. In LUUNA, there is the smallest EEG acquisition module in the world, as small as your thumbnail with a Bluetooth module in it. The power consumption can be at least 1 milliamp.

Designs and working prototypes have been developed. Small-batch production went smoothly. We are ready to begin manufacturing. Based on our experience of production and distribution worldwide with our last crowdfunding campaign, we are confident that we will be able to produce the final product with exceptional quality and to also complete it on time. By the end of this Kickstarter campaign, we should already have some product in stock. Our delivery times are expected to meet all set deadlines.

Thank you for having trust Entertech. We really appreciate your decision to back us.
story_txt:
LUUNA, the first intelligent sleep mask that tailors its soothing capabilities to your sleep schedule. In today’s fast pace world, true relaxation is hard to achieve. LUUNA will give you the rest you need in order to be more fully awake for the things that matter most to you.


Whether it be to lull you into a nap or caress you into a full night sleep, LUUNA intelligently learns from your brain waves to produce music and sounds that are in harmony with your body’s rhythm, helping you fall asleep better and faster. 
 
Above is s short sample from me. This might be the first Brainwave-AI Music you've heard. I do love the artificial intelligent music which reads my mind and knows what sound my brain need. When I'm sleepy, it won't wake me up and will naturally lull me to sleep. When I was in college, I was so eager to have a product like this that helps me have power naps every day. 
Now I have it! I'm so refreshed and powered after the catnaps!
 Are you curious? How does it work?
Below is the original EEG signals LUUNA collected for the first 6 minutes.

Based on above raw data, LUUNA's app drew the Sleep Curve and you can also see the Sleep Stages made according to the curve.

Below graph shows how music pitch reflects the sleep stages and match sleep status. When I was awake, the pitch is higher and denser than when I was drowsy and in light sleep. But it gradually lowered the pitch and slowed the pace to lead me to relax and sleep. The music differs person by person and time by time because every time the brain activity is definitely different.

For now, the music is mainly pop piano. But there will be more instruments and styles available. 


Let LUUNA help you fall into a deep sleep or simply recharge your mind and body with a quick nap. Whichever sleep mode you choose, Luuna is there for you.
SOUND SLEEP
Choose the sleep mode on your app to get you ready for a full night of restful sleep. Let LUUNA's artificial intelligence soothe you with calming music as you doze off into a peaceful slumber.
POWER NAP
LUUNA's app features a power nap mode just in case you only need a few short minutes to recharge your mind, energy, and help you boost your brain's learning capacity.
CONCENTRATION
Concentration training is much like weightlifting for your brain. This mode helps you master the ability to focus for longer periods of time.

LUUNA uses your brains own melody and intelligent AI to create a song to fit your mood. And when you do fall asleep LUUNA adaptively lowers the volume and fades out the music replacing it with the gentle sounds of nature.
By monitoring EEG signals, LUUNA is aware of when you’re in your deepest sleep and waits to wake you in your light sleep keeping that post-nap fog from clouding the rest of your day.


         EEG IS MORE ACCURATE 
 An electroencephalogram (EEG) is a test that detects electrical activity in your brain using small, flat metal discs (electrodes). Your brain cells communicate via electrical impulses and are active all the time, even when you're asleep. 
EEG monitoring is the most accurate and effective way to track brain activity sleep stages. Entertech has one of the most accurate EEG dry acquisition technology in the world and the most accurate algorithms for automatic sleep tracking and analysis. 

The LUUNA's app offers daily, weekly and monthly reports to show your sleep cycles and other data to understand your sleep patterns better and help you reach your sleep goals.
Free app available for IOS and Android devices

LUUNA’s high-tech design gives you up to 80 hours of battery life which makes it perfect to enjoy the many options that Luuna has to offer. Listen to your preferred music style with your earbuds, or connect your own speaker directly to your smartphone to relax the night away with soothing sounds.
Standby time more than 50 days!

LUUNA is only 50g in weight and provides you with a sense of security with special pinholes that you can peep through at any time.
LUUNA gives you the perfect light-shade because the 3D mask was specially designed to fit the contour of your face with skin-friendly fabric, making it extremely comfortable.
Did we mention that LUUNA can be washed? Just don't forget to detach the EEG sensor beforehand. Don't want to wash it? Buy an extra mask only for $19!



Naptime is our last product for which we also did a campaign on Indiegogo. Now LUUNA is ready to offer you the new experience of sleep and relax!






We are the Entertech team, and we focus on developing high-tech wearables for health, leading the way with dry EEG acquisition and ECG acquisition technology. Our R & D team consists of bioelectric data collection specialists from Zhejiang University, Hangzhou Dianzi University, University of York, and others.   
Up to now, EEG technology has entered into different application fields, such as healthcare, education, toys and games and so on. We are glad to cooperate with other companies and popularize the EEG technology with teams in relevant industries. Meanwhile, we will focus on mental health applications and launch a series of products around spiritual health like sleep, meditation, and relaxation etc. , which we believe will be more and more important.
 

 
Q&A
1. Can I connect LUUNA with my Bluetooth speaker?
Definitely yes. Any Bluetooth you used before can be connected to your phone as usual. Bluetooth connection between LUUNA and app won't break your habit of listening music!
2. How can I wash the mask?
The electronic parts are detachable. Take them down gently and you can wash it.
 
Risks & Challenges
Entertech has researched and developed EEG acquisition technology for the last four years and cooperated with many well-known Chinese university laboratories, science museums, and hospitals ever since the team was set up. The Forehead Three-electrode EEG acquisition Program is our new development proposed because of LUUNA. People who know EEG would know that most EEG acquisitions need a reference electrode on the ear, which will greatly limit product design. The fulfillment and effectiveness of this new program highly boost our confidence in Luuna. We have also integrated the EEG acquisition module. In LUUNA, there is the smallest EEG acquisition module in the world, as small as your thumbnail with a Bluetooth module in it. The power consumption can be at least 1 milliamp.
Designs and working prototypes have been developed. Small-batch production went smoothly. We are ready to begin manufacturing. Based on our experience of production and distribution worldwide with our last crowdfunding campaign, we are confident that we will be able to produce the final product with exceptional quality and to also complete it on time. By the end of this Kickstarter campaign, we should already have some product in stock. Our delivery times are expected to meet all set deadlines.
Thank you for having trust Entertech. We really appreciate your decision to back us.

story:
Radiomize’s gesture-controlled steering immediately turns any car into a connected car! With Radiomize, you’ll be able to enjoy a touch-enabled steering wheel cover, which is also accompanied by a personalized music and genre-based news discovery app, to provide a smart, fun, and safe connected car driving experience.

 

 

 

 

 

We know driving can be a hassle. The more you do it, the more tiring and frustrating it becomes. So, we set out to invent a smart steering wheel cover that would be the ultimate driving companion: Radiomize is that NEW driving experience (DX)! With a patented gesture-controlled steering wheel cover, which allows drivers to control their smartphones without taking their focus off the road, the driving experience (DX) will never be the same. 

 
 
* For safety reasons, scrolling through messages can only be done when at a complete stop.

 

 

 

 

The Radiomize app provides personalized infotainment for the digital age. This app creates a personal, dynamic and mood-based playlist that learns user preferences so that the driver doesn’t need to sit through songs and news that they’re not interested in hearing.

 

 

 

 

 

 

Radiomize is looking to reduce the risk of automotive collisions by preventing distracted driving. Through its simple yet revolutionary design and powerfully intuitive app, Radiomize’s goal is to keep drivers’ eyes on the road, hands on the wheel, and their focus directed on driving. 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Generic Steering Wheel

Generic steering wheels either have too many buttons, or none at all.

Many of us move our hands away from the generic steering wheel  while driving, causing dangerous distracted driving habits that put ourselves, passengers, and pedestrians at risk.

Maybe it's because the generic steering wheel is boring  and we want something fresh to keep us awake, and our mind focused on the road?

Maybe it’s because we want to stay connected  to the digital age?

Or, maybe it’s both?

 

Smart Gesture-Control Steering Wheel

Designed just for you, period.

Dress up your boring steering wheel with this revolutionary touch-enabled steering wheel cover, accompanied by your personal music collection and a news discovery app. 

The Radiomize wheel allows drivers to stay connected and while safe.

We call it “Drivetainment”.  Drive-time just got fun.

story:
The Campaign - See GALLERY for IMAGES !

I am Kesi Gibson and I am the CEO and founder of Kyu Melange -  a purpose-driven fashion company dedicated to empowering artisans in tangible ways throughout the manufacturing process. We are raising $50,000 to kick start the production cycle for Kyu Melange 2015 Spring Summer collection.

The Production Process 

All our products are hand-crafted and our curated fabrics are hand-woven and hand-dyed by women in emerging countries.  Our sourcing is modeled to ensure that as Kyu Melange flourishes, so will the ambitions of creative professionals, many of whom are women in emerging countries, who form a key part of our supply chain and production model. 

The Inspiration 

My mom was a designer. I was deeply influenced by her life and craftsmanship. I worked closely with her growing up, and remember always being in awe of her unending creativity. The essence of Kyu Mélange is a dynamic reflection of my personal and professional journey, experience in business, design talent; and above all my deep appreciation for art and contemplation of humanity.

Women in emerging economies make a huge but often understated contribution to the fashion industry. Many artisans, despite their passion and talent, would never dare to dream beyond their financial and societal limitations. Through Kyu Melange, I’ve set out to change this.  

Join our movement. Join our community. Pledge Today.

Other Ways You Can Help 

If you do not have the financial capacity to pledge right away, no problem. You can support us by joining (Liking) our community on facebook.com/kyumelange and @KyuMelange on Instagram / Twitter. Please also share the campaign and encourage others to share it as well.

story:
"At the first Pop-Up shop July 2017, Tyrice put together an experience that aimed to pursue the awareness of more colleges having Free-Tuition. He Frankensteined college hoodies with logo hoodies and had a store cubicle display made out of chalkboard paint for clients to write on. Tyrice's Dad is an Educator, so he knows how an much an positive impact education has had on his life."

About Us

Free is an innovative lifestyle company, that fuses style with social conscience. This luxury brand produces a wide-range of sensual streetwear with couture undertones. The remote fashion house offers women’s ready-to-wear fashion, and accessories.

Mission

Free’s philosophy has remained the same as the day of its creation: Tyrice Rashad has envisaged a brand that would stand for innovation, individuality and self-expression. Each piece derives from a conceptual process of enormous creative freedom in story-telling.

Meet The Founder

The company’s founder, Mr. Tyrice Rashad Hicks, was born and raised in Prince Edward County, Virginia and later moved to San Francisco to attend The Academy of Art University to pursue a Master of Fine Arts in Fashion Design. In 2015, he decided to focus on the launch of his own label. 

Challenges

The first collection began predominately with outerwear pieces with the use of prints and typefaces expressing social commentary. After multiple obstacles there were production problems so the first collection was never fully produced.

"Flashion Show" on Lombard Street

It wasn’t until the second collection that we actually started selling our inventory.  In 2016, Free put on a gorilla marketing fashion show which Jonanthan calls  “The Flashion Show” on the world famous Lombard st located in San Francisco. The show displayed sportswear with a political and social commentary.

"Melting Pot Brand"

Free embodies the energy between luxury, avant-garde and streetwear. Attitude, authenticity and honesty are the essence of its wearer. The accessories and clothing will be modern and elegant, making a statement to be summarized as follows: It is the coming together of different characters and different individuals, just like America itself. It is the unique beauty and emotion of America. 

The collections feature a season-less look to match the Micro-climates of San Francisco. Free will produce one full collections each year that will contain both the Fall and Spring looks to slow down the negative impact of the fast-fashion industry. 

Where Do We Manufacture?

All of Free’s products are made entirely in San Francisco, by our talented team of designers which places a strong emphasis on the quality of the clothes. The fabric is carefully handpicked to properly reflect the mood of that particular collection. Each sample is created through a meticulous design process. Tyrice Rashad remains highly involved in the production of the design and he is against the sweatshop conditions

IMPACT 

"The mission of Lighthouse Community Charter School is to prepare a diverse, K-12th grade student population for college and the career of their choice by equipping each child and youth with the skills, knowledge, and tools to become a self-motivated, competent, lifelong learner."

Today, the LightHouse Community Charter School resonates with the values and history of the house. It aims to promote that ALL students - regardless of race, ethnicity, or income, are prepared to pursue a higher education and live out their fullest potentials. They equipping each child and youth with the skills, knowledge, and tools to become a self-motivated, competent, lifelong learner. This is the New Generation of creatives leaders to develop the future start-ups. As we stay true to our vision to fix the world 10% of our revenue will be donated to the Lighthouse Community Charter school in Oakland, Ca. As we grow we plan on expanding this program to other schools in cities across the world. 

https://lighthousecharter.org

USE OF FUNDS

The cost of production is very costly and with your contribution it will help us jumpstart our luxury brand, we are asking for $15,000. This will go towards the production of our much anticipated line, and putting on an Innovative showcase in San Francisco. With your contribution you will be entered into the contest where you could win a chance to attend the 1st solo Fashion Show. Also with each contribution you will receive FreeTea, our Designer Line featuring the flavor of Apricot Love Black Tea and a bunch of other goodies.

We have made great strides in building this brand from the ground up. We are known for our outspoken nature and social commentary and we find it more imperative than ever to really allow our voices to be heard. We have worked extremely hard in preparation for this line and we feel as though we have a message that the world needs to hear.  

Our website: www.free---official.com

The Break Down:

Location: San Francisco

Venue: $1,500

Production Cost: $10,000 

Accommodations for In-House Team: $3,500

Total: $15,000

If we exceed our funding goal we will put the money towards NYFW and getting Free Collection into boutiques and department stores around the world. 

Once again, thank you so much for believing in us! Without you we are nothing. 

Other Ways You Can Help

Spread the word about the campaign, SHARE, share, SHARE!

story:
UPDATE: TO BE THE FIRST TO GET A STEREOTYPE APPAREL SHIRT, WE'VE LAUNCHED OUR FIRST PRE-SALE. JUST GIVE A $25 DONATION OR MORE AND YOU'RE GUARANTEED TO GET YOUR CHOICE OF STEREOTYPE APPAREL SHIRT BEFORE THE GENERAL PUBLIC! You can see all four designs from the "Sounds Collection" by clicking the gallery tab above.

  WHY WE DO WHAT WE DO

Every time someone purchases one of our shirts, they are helping another individual. Each sale donates ten percent towards our educational outreach program and scholarship funds. The educational outreach program teaches both children and adults about how placing a negative stereotype on someone can have a harmful impact and explores the concept of unity within diversity. Our scholarships will be awarded to at-risk youth and others who are positively contributing to their community.

HOW WE BEGAN

After the February 26, 2012 death of 17-year-old Trayvon Martin, Adam Sweeney, like many Americans, discussed the incident with several of his friends. He discovered they all had something in common; they had been negatively stereotyped at some point in their lives. The stories of his peers inspired Sweeney. Upon further research, Sweeney found stereotypes were at the root of many forms of hostility between humans. He founded Stereotype Apparel in April 2012 and began searching for partners in the campaign against discrimination.

THE TEAM BEHIND THE NAME

At Stereotype Apparel, it really isn't about a political statement. We feel when someone is profiled and a tragic outcome is the result, there needs to be a change. We want everyone to be part of that change. While we are currently a small staff and new to the business world, we are dedicated self-starters motivated to making a difference in our own neighborhoods. We believe in combating negative labels with unity and a message of acceptance.

                              OUR GOAL & HOW YOU CAN HELP

Believe it or not, starting a company costs a good amount of money but we think it's well worth it since we have the opportunity to help others.. With that in mind, our goal is to raise $15,000. 

                          WHAT YOUR DONATION HELPS FUND 

The first run of Stereotype Apparel shirt, stickers, and wristband manufacturing

Website Design and Creation

Marketing Materials (Media Kit, Press Release creation, Promotional events, Photography)

Legal business start-up materials and documents

Graphic Design (Logo, shirt designs, and additional digital elements in media kits and on the website)

The "Living In Stereo" Scholarship- Awarded to at-risk youth and students who are contributing positively to the community

The Stereotype Apparel Educational Outreach Program- An interactive program for high school and college students that highlights the cognitive, behavioral, and effective aspects of stereotypes in our society. 

For your wonderful contribution, we have a ton of rewards as our way of saying thank you! You can check out the reward levels to the right.>>>>>>

                              HOW DOES INDIEGOGO WORK?

People pledge any amount and choose a reward. At the end of our Indiegogo campaign, if the combined total of all pledges for our project meets our $15,000 goal, then the credit cards of those who pledge are charged and we receive the funds to create the clothing line, minus a 4% charge from Indiegogo for hosting the campaign. If we exceed our $15,000 goal then the extra funds will be used to make the clothing line even better. Aside from a 4% Indiegogo fee and a 2-3% fee on each contribution for payment processing, all funds raised will be used directly in the clothing line creation.

                          CAN I INCREASE MY PLEDGE ONCE IT'S BEEN MADE? 

YES! Once you donate to our campaign, you may want to change your incentive reward to a different one, or increase your pledge amount. 

                        WHAT HAPPENS IF YOU DON'T HIT YOUR GOAL IN TIME? 

If we don't meet our goal, then the money we've raised goes to help the company BUT we are charged 9% of the overall money raised. We know you won't let this happen!

                                             CAN WE EXCEED THE GOAL?

YES! We should be so lucky! Indiegogo will allow as much money as is given before the deadline. Even though $15k isn't something you'll find in your couch unless you're Mark Zuckerberg. (If you are, please donate to this. Thanks, Mark.) if 150 people give $100 donation, or less than $2 a week for a year, we hit our goal. We think it's totally doable, thanks to all of your help. 15K is bargain-basement for what we are trying to do, and more money would mean a greater chance to help others, which is what this company is all about.

How do we contact you? Glad you asked! You can contact us directly at Adam@stereotypeapparel.com. We check it. We will get back to you. We promise!

                                   OTHER WAYS TO HELP: 

Spread the word! Tell everyone you know how awesome this project is. Share our schnazzy new website, like us on Facebook, blow up the Twittersphere talking about Stereotype Apparel and add our Twitter handle, blog it, or promote it any way you can think of. Everything helps!

THANKS SO MUCH FOR ALL YOUR SUPPORT OF STEREOTYPE APPAREL AND FOR HELPING US IN OUR CAMPAIGN!

At Stereotype Apparel, it really isn't about a political statement. We feel when someone is profiled and a tragic outcome is the result, there needs to be a change. We want everyone to be part of that change. While we are currently a small staff and new to the business world, we are dedicated self-starters motivated to making a difference in our own neighborhoods. We believe in combating negative labels with unity and a message of acceptance.

                              OUR GOAL & HOW YOU CAN HELP

Believe it or not, starting a company costs a good amount of money but we think it's well worth it since we have the opportunity to help others.. With that in mind, our goal is to raise $15,000. 
                          WHAT YOUR DONATION HELPS FUND 
The first run of Stereotype Apparel shirt, stickers, and wristband manufacturing
Website Design and Creation
Marketing Materials (Media Kit, Press Release creation, Promotional events, Photography)
Legal business start-up materials and documents
Graphic Design (Logo, shirt designs, and additional digital elements in media kits and on the website)
The "Living In Stereo" Scholarship- Awarded to at-risk youth and students who are contributing positively to the community
The Stereotype Apparel Educational Outreach Program- An interactive program for high school and college students that highlights the cognitive, behavioral, and effective aspects of stereotypes in our society. 
For your wonderful contribution, we have a ton of rewards as our way of saying thank you! You can check out the reward levels to the right.>>>>>>

                              HOW DOES INDIEGOGO WORK?
People pledge any amount and choose a reward. At the end of our Indiegogo campaign, if the combined total of all pledges for our project meets our $15,000 goal, then the credit cards of those who pledge are charged and we receive the funds to create the clothing line, minus a 4% charge from Indiegogo for hosting the campaign. If we exceed our $15,000 goal then the extra funds will be used to make the clothing line even better. Aside from a 4% Indiegogo fee and a 2-3% fee on each contribution for payment processing, all funds raised will be used directly in the clothing line creation.
                          CAN I INCREASE MY PLEDGE ONCE IT'S BEEN MADE? 
YES! Once you donate to our campaign, you may want to change your incentive reward to a different one, or increase your pledge amount. 
                        WHAT HAPPENS IF YOU DON'T HIT YOUR GOAL IN TIME? 
If we don't meet our goal, then the money we've raised goes to help the company BUT we are charged 9% of the overall money raised. We know you won't let this happen!
                                             CAN WE EXCEED THE GOAL?
YES! We should be so lucky! Indiegogo will allow as much money as is given before the deadline. Even though $15k isn't something you'll find in your couch unless you're Mark Zuckerberg. (If you are, please donate to this. Thanks, Mark.) if 150 people give $100 donation, or less than $2 a week for a year, we hit our goal. We think it's totally doable, thanks to all of your help. 15K is bargain-basement for what we are trying to do, and more money would mean a greater chance to help others, which is what this company is all about.
How do we contact you? Glad you asked! You can contact us directly at Adam@stereotypeapparel.com. We check it. We will get back to you. We promise!
                                   OTHER WAYS TO HELP: 
Spread the word! Tell everyone you know how awesome this project is. Share our schnazzy new website, like us on Facebook, blow up the Twittersphere talking about Stereotype Apparel and add our Twitter handle, blog it, or promote it any way you can think of. Everything helps!

THANKS SO MUCH FOR ALL YOUR SUPPORT OF STEREOTYPE APPAREL AND FOR HELPING US IN OUR CAMPAIGN!

story:
Visit the "Free for Life International" website for more information.



Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ):

Why are we on Indiegogo?

We are in the very early stages of launching our clothing line nationally and internationally and are in need of additional start-up funds to do so. The money generated from this campaign will go to creating a stellar website, producing enough inventory in stock to sell our products online, as well as other non-recurring costs associated with launching our brand.

How do I choose the design, color and size?

When you chose your perk we will send you a link to a page with a form to fill out where you can chose:

  1. The style of shirt (tank, Tee, etc.)
  2. Which quote you want on the front of the shirt: I am love OR I am peace OR I am light.
  3. Which quote you want on the back of the shirt: Rumi OR St. Francis prayer (see top of page). 
  4. The color.
  5. The size.
  6. Please not that some shirts have limited size. We will get back to you ASAP if we sell out of an item and will also update Indiegogo weekly.

When will my shirt arrive?

If you order before November 30th your order will arrive before Christmas, December 25th.

If you order after November 30th we will email you a voucher of your purchases (in case you'd like to give them as a gift certificate for the Holidays!) and your order will ship out approximately 1 month after our campaign ends.

Do the shirts run true to size?

All of the shirts run true to size except the women's Mari eco-tank runs a little small and the hoodies run a little large. Also, all of the infant and kids shirts will shrink 1 size when washed and dried in dryer.

Why is your infant & kid line 100% organic cotton?

Organic clothing does not irritate your baby or child's sensitive skin. Even though non-organic clothing comes as a finished product, they still carry pesticides in them that can irritate the skin.

We Love our Mother Earth. Organic cotton is grown using methods and materials that have a low impact on the environment. Organic production systems replenish and maintain soil fertility, reduce the use of toxic and persistent pesticides and fertilizers, and build biologically diverse agriculture. In addition, federal regulations prohibit the use of genetically engineered seed for 100% organic farming. Also, research has shown that over a period of 15 years, organic farms use 50% less energy than conventional farms.

An added bonus to our infant and kid line is that it is Made in the U.S.A.!

Do you offer a 100% organic line for adults?

We would Love to!!! We have spent an entire year researching and searching for a 100% organic apparel line that has great quality combined with interesting and unique designs. This has proven very hard to come by. Our current supplier of choice specializes in an "eco-blend" fabric where a small percentage is made of organic cotton and recycled polyester. We believe as we support those suppliers who offer sustainable and fair trade options, the market for these types of apparel will grow. Your support in buying from us and similar companies encourage the suppliers that there IS a demand for organic and recycled fabrics! We are very hopeful that we will be able to offer many more organic options as we grow.

What sets your company apart?

I Am Consciousness Clothing Co provides the clothing market with an  alternative to the abundance of apparel available to the consumer. We at "I AM" are doing our part to create beautiful products that support the evolution to sustainability in the clothing industry. In our personal lives, we are both 100% committed to a sustainable, organic lifestyle and we are very motivated in bringing that commitment into our company. 

As people are becoming increasingly aware of the need to make positive and conscious choices to sustain a healthy and thriving planet, I AM Consciousness Clothing serves as a reminder of just that.

What non-profits does your company support?

For this campaign we will donate 10% of all profits to FREE FOR LIFE INTERNATIONAL,  an international non-profit organization that rescues and restores victims of human trafficking to eliminate this modern day slavery. We have personal contacts within this organization and are deeply inspired by the change they are making on a personal level in the lives of those rescued, as well as the change they are making in our world to eradicate human trafficking.

Why did you start this company?

Bethany says, "The idea to create the I AM Clothing line came to me when I was going through a very hard time in my life and was SO appreciative of how my energy would shift and elevate every time I recited the yogic Prayer of Love, Peace and Light. I said to myself, 'Oh, how I wish I could have LOVE, PEACE and LIGHT on my body all day, to be reminded of, and to carry their vibration!' It was a Divinely inspired thought and then and there I decided to create a clothing line that used 'I am love', 'I am peace' or 'I am love'." 

Bethany approached Crystelle, who is a fellow yoga instructor, successful business woman and talented artist, to partner together in creating the clothing line. Together they created and founded I Am Consciousness Clothing Co.
story_txt:
Visit the "Free for Life International" website for more information.

story:
The perfect Mobile Desk for your laptop

We created Mobile Desk to give support to all those people who own a laptop and want to have the comfort of a desk wherever they want.

Created for business professionals, students, designers, gamers, or just anyone with a laptop.



Protorype


Introducing Sophi, the Made in Italy Mobile Desk

Sophi was born by an idea of Alessandro Costa, an italian web designer, for make more comfortable the laptop usage. The Sophi Mobile Desk it's ultra lightweight and comfortable, that's because we use light wood materials but very durable and strong.. The part of the table call "writing zone" it's composed by eco leather or a jeans material, and it can be used for writing paper, place objects or simply for place your hand. We decided to use the eco-leather and jeans because the materials are durable and beautiful to look and the quality is not as if we had done plastic.
The holes along the surface serve as not to overheat a laptop because one of the major causes that do break it is overheating.

Protorype


Perfect for laptops from 13" to 17".


Care to detail

In the space dedicated to tablet and smartphone there is a small hole that is used to route the cable of the battery, so that we can charge our devices even when we are using Sophi! 

We pay much attention to the environment, and for this reason Sophi is made with wood from certified and controlled forests. We have decided to use pine wood because it is one of the most durable woods that there are.


Three different colors and three different materials to make unique your laptop!


Classic Sophi
  • Colour: Beige
  • Material: Blue Jeans


Premium Sophi

  • Colour: Premium white
  • Material: Dark blue jeans


Royal Sophi

  • Colour: Royal brown
  • Material: Beige eco leather


Lost items?

Sophi has been designed to give the ability to have in a single plan of work the laptop, smartphone and tablet! So you have everything at your fingertips!

Protorype

We need your help

The Sophi will begin its first of many production runs, but the labor cost is very hight for us. We need your help to buy the necessary machinery to cut, drill and polish the wood, and to buy a number of pieces of wood sufficient to lower the cost of the future Sophi Mobile Desk.

The entire production process is completed at our workshop in Turin, Italy, the city of the 2006 Winter Olimpics! We believe in the Made ​​in Italy and we want to give all our supporters a highly functional and attractive product.


What will we do for you

We believe that the fair price of the desk is around the $ 90 but if you will support us with a small loan you can receive at a very low price the first production of Sophi directly to your home!

If we not reach the goal, however, we send the desks to our supporters, but unfortunately we do not know when we could produce again the Sophi Mobile Desk.



Shipping and Delivery Time:  The Sophi will be shipped on World-Wide for an additional fee. We can send it on the most countries of the world: Europe, Canada, China, Korea, United Arab Emirates, Hong Kong, Japan, Iceland, Israel, San Marino, United States of America, Vatican, Switzerland, Turkey.

The shipping delivery time is 10-15 working days and the cost of shipping starts from $ 17 for a not traced shipping, up to $ 24 for a shipment safer and tracked (you should choose the shipment traced, in case of loss of the goods we don't accept the liability).
