story:
Anil has been an employee for over a year now and he recently lost his security key card.

To purchase a new key card is $10, however he would rather spend that money on a new haircut. 

Without this card he's unable to access other floors, he's unable to enter the office via the kitchen, he has forced to live in isolation, begging and borrowing access to the other floors. 

 

We're looking to solve this problem not just for Anil, but also the next 49 employees that also misplace their keycards in the Marina.
story_txt: Anil has been an employee for over a year now and he recently lost his security key card.To purchase a new key card is $10, however he would rather spend that money on a new haircut. Without this card he's unable to access other floors, he's unable to enter the office via the kitchen, he has forced to live in isolation, begging and borrowing access to the other floors.  We're looking to solve this problem not just for Anil, but also the next 49 employees that also misplace their keycards in the Marina.

story:
AUDRIC is proud to launch its first Swiss Made watch on Kickstarter, a product which combines AUDRIC’s intricate design, coupled by meticulous and spirited characteristics, with a robust complication standing for technical innovation. The timepiece exhibits the brand’s most uncommon traits, introducing remarkable additional elements such as the renowned SW 200-1 movement. Our designers and engineers have worked tirelessly to perfect this watch. In designing, we wanted to keep the watch functional and easy to read.

The SeaBorne 500 M  is a great everyday timer that can be worn in any situation. It is built as robust as all forthcoming AUDRIC watches but has an elegant twist to it. For the desk divers, the watch enthusiasts, the explorers and the office goers alike, the SeaBorne is the perfect fit for people who appreciate the fine art of watchmaking and the beauty of intricate mechanics.

 

Various problems had to be solved as we scoured the watch market. We believe that we have SUCCEEDED in finding solutions for few of them. You can consider that the problems we faced were our motivation to create something unique.

 AFFORDABILITY: Not $1500. Not $1200. Not even $1000. Starting at just $600 on Kickstarter. Working direct to consumer, we pass the savings to you with radical transparency.

PRACTICALITY: We wanted a quality handmade watch utilitarian enough for everyday wear. Simply, a no frills watch that just makes sense.

DESIGN: Beautifully crafted for timelessness with a less is more approach. A classic look with extra detailing on the the multi layered Sandwich Dial.

We wanted to create a unique design language for our flagship model and the challenge was to introduce creative elements which would bring out our thought process and convey the same to our patrons. Lots of permutations and combinations were contemplated in terms of designing of case, bezel, hands and bracelet. Our main aim was to provide a distinctive feel to the watch but at the same time keep it very utilitarian to the core.The design concept and the feel was finally perfected after many visits to the drawing board and spending innumerable hours of discussion in producing an automatic dive watch without any compromise on quality, functionality or the uniqueness. This whole journey of a concept to prototyping is completely dedicated to all those who have encouraged us. 

The screw-down crown which is placed at the contemporary position of 3 o'clock is etched with the logo of the brand and filled with BGW9 lume for easy access at night. A helium escape value (HEV) located at 9h position, is a feature found on some diving watches. It provides functionality for professional divers operating at great depths for prolonged periods of time or under saturation. 

The Seaborne case is made of 316 L stainless steel which is also called as surgical steel. This is a high grade, metallurgically strong steel that has a greater resistant to corrosives – both of industrial and biological origin. Due to its effectiveness in high-stress situations, more specifically in contexts that present remarkable levels of acidity, it is highly appreciated in marine environments.  The Diver is created from a blend of angular aerodynamic surfaces and exceptional components. This makes the AUDRIC SeaBorne 500 M an elegant yet competent diver's gear.  The Case-back of the AUDRIC Seaborne 500 M has an engraving of a Sea Turtle which symbolizes strength, endurance and agility. Throughout history, many cultures adopted Sea Turtles as symbols for many different themes as well. Because of their long lifespan, sea turtles often symbolize patience, wisdom, endurance, and good luck. ... A turtle's shell is strong enough to carry the weight of the continent on its back, and with it their actual home. There is also a serial number engraved on each case back to make it unique.  "000/000" 

  We have 5 different dials in this first line of SeaBorne 500 M timepieces:

A classy and highly luminous dial was of great importance, with a sandwich construction and generous layers of Superluminova C3 on the lower layer  and BGW9 filled indices.  The textured dial is made with great amount of attention to detail. The dial features raised (applied) polished hour markers and printed AUDRIC Logo. The hands are Rhodium plated which gives that extra shine and durability for longer years. The lume on the dial, hands, and bezel is a heavy dose of BGW9 that glows a blue all night long. The watch is absolutely free from harmful coatings like nickel. Dial also has color indicated depth gauge for visual reference. 

DIAL DEPTH GAUGE: 

Water absorbs different wavelengths of light to different degrees. The longest wavelengths, with the lowest energy, are absorbed first. Red is the first to be absorbed, followed by orange & yellow. The colors disappear underwater in the same order as they appear in the color spectrum. Even water at 5 ft depth will have a noticeable loss of red. 

At What Depth Underwater Does Color Disappear?

Red - 15 feet, Orange - 25 feet, Yellow - 35 feet

The bracelet is 22mm at the lug and 20mm at the adjustable ratchet buckle. The buckle is milled out  and with 3 micro-adjust positions. The lug holes are screwed with high grade screw bars for easy removal of the bracelet. Solid endlinks for that extra toughness and balance. Satin Brushed and Polished links give an excellent aesthetic feel for this watch.The SeaBorne will ship in a black luxury box with warranty card, and extra spring bars. The AUDRIC logo is engraved on the buckle

 We wanted to use some of the best input materials on the market for this watch. Inside of the SeaBorne watches are the Swiss Made Sellita SW 200-1 which are hugely employed by the most renowned firms in the field of horology. They are very accurate and built to last for many years. The balance runs at 28,800 vibrations per hour and the movement hacks, comprising 26-jeweled bearings. They deliver a 38 hour power to the timepiece when fully charged /wound. This caliber is considered a workhorse by today's watch making standard.

 We used a Double Domed Sapphire Crystal Glass for the extraordinary mechanical properties it exhibits rather than the Mineral Crystal Glass alternatives seen in most watches. Five layers of anti-reflective coating are added to the underside of the crystal in addition to the double dome, ensuring a high degree of clarity and minimal light distortion and thus allowing you to get a clear view of the dial at all times, both indoors and outdoors. The crystal is 4.5 mm thick in the center and tapers down to 4.3 mm at the sides. This enables water tight setup for the watch at all circumstances.

The bezel insert is made of sapphire, an extremely robust material that is higher scratch resistance, a “nearly indestructible” property, strength and superior longevity as opposed to the traditional ceramic, steel or aluminium alternatives. Despite the higher material costs, the choice was clear especially since we wanted to build the SeaBorne as a sport diver watch. The sapphire insert is engraved and filled with Swiss Super-LumiNova BGW9 pigment for excellent low/no light visibility.

The 60-minute bezel is unidirectional (120 clicks) as per ISO/DIN specification for diving safety i.e. it won't accidentally bump down dive time. 

  •  SS 316 L case : 43 mm * 51 mm.
  • Case Thickness : 15.4 mm including the crystal.
  • Crystal Thickness : 4.5 mm.
  • Lug width : 22 mm.
  • 120 clicks unidirectional sapphire bezel filled with BGW9.
  • Domed sapphire crystal with 5 layers of anti-reflective coating.
  • Screwed case back with watch specs.
  • Screw down crown with logo etched and filled with luminous BGW9
  • 50 ATM W R.
  • Helium Escape Valve @ 9H.
  • Sunburst pattern Sandwich Dial (minute markers in C3 Lume) with Matt background and Applied indexes Rhodium plated ( filled with white luminous BGW9 ).
  • Rhodium plated hour, minute and seconds hands filled with white luminous (BGW9).
  • SS 316 L bracelet with diver buckle and extender. Solid end links on the fitted bracelet with screws in the links for easy sizing. 22 mm at the lugs and 20 mm at the buckle.
  • Movement: SW 200- 1 Incabloc and Elabore Execution. 
  • SWISS MADE and Shipped from Switzerland

"AUDRIC" ( French, "Old and wise ruler", German, "Noble ruler; Noble friend",)

AUDRIC is a SWISS MADE Watch Startup based in Singapore.  At AUDRIC, we are committed to delivering high-quality and rugged watches with utilitarian features. Our ingenious designs, impeccable materials and attention to detail fortify our commitment to produce beautiful timepieces which creates unique value for our customers. All of our watches are SWISS MADE to ensure that they meet not only the highest standards, but also impart that luxurious feel to the customer

Affordable Price: Pre-order at launch and enjoy the SeaBorne at a great Kickstarter price of up to 40% off eventual retail prices. Don’t miss this chance to get our watches at preferential prices. Retail prices will revert to full launch price upon launch. Value for money proposition.

Stretch Goals: Pledge now and enjoy stretch goals exclusively created for Kickstarter backers.

Delivery: We will be shipping all pre-orders BEFORE any full retail units. Pledge now and get the SeaBorne by December 2020. 

We will never overcharge and dump ridiculous retail markups onto our supporters. We adamantly dislike when high designer markups are just passed onto the consumer. Just because it was designed does not mean it deserves a premium or exorbitant price tag. In reality, design is meant to be shared with all to benefit. Especially in this Kickstarter community where everyone contributes with ideas and feedback, aren't we all designers? In reality, you Kickstarters help create these products.

Shipping:

From Switzerland worldwide. Please note: customs duties and taxes are the buyer’s responsibility upon delivery.

Shipping to USA and ROW with DHL | Fedex is $35 onward. Free shipping within Switzerland

Warranty:

Two (2) year international warranty from the date you'll receive the watch. The warranty covers manufacturing defects.

We chose to work with an established watch manufacturing group known for rigorous quality control. We have a great relationship with our manufacturing partners. We've thoroughly toured their facility multiple times and they are completely align with our goals. We visited their facility in the Summer of 2018 in detailed tours and again in December 2019. 

With multiple stages in the manufacture and quality check process, we are confident in their ability to deliver a quality product. We were impressed with their sophisticated manufacture process including different rooms for assembly, air pressure checkpoints, water pressure stations, 48-hour time-keeping accuracy test, and (of course) a drop test. All of their facilities meet all necessary regulation and code for operation 

 After the Kickstarter campaign concludes, we will send out surveys gathering backer information to begin production. Meanwhile, we want to continue R&D for the watch. We will rigorously source, test, and research the materials and production of the watch. While the watches are being manufactured and packaged, we will be preparing for large scale shipment to our backers.

Please don’t hesitate to contact us directly if you have any questions about the AUDRIC SeaBorne 500 M. We can be reached at support@audric.ch. We are watch lovers foremostly and we strive to treat each customer how we ourselves would like to be treated. As a micro-brand, each and every customer is important to us - so if you have a burning question for us, just reach out to us directly
story_txt:
AUDRIC is proud to launch its first Swiss Made watch on Kickstarter, a product which combines AUDRIC’s intricate design, coupled by meticulous and spirited characteristics, with a robust complication standing for technical innovation. The timepiece exhibits the brand’s most uncommon traits, introducing remarkable additional elements such as the renowned SW 200-1 movement. Our designers and engineers have worked tirelessly to perfect this watch. In designing, we wanted to keep the watch functional and easy to read.The SeaBorne 500 M  is a great everyday timer that can be worn in any situation. It is built as robust as all forthcoming AUDRIC watches but has an elegant twist to it. For the desk divers, the watch enthusiasts, the explorers and the office goers alike, the SeaBorne is the perfect fit for people who appreciate the fine art of watchmaking and the beauty of intricate mechanics.  Various problems had to be solved as we scoured the watch market. We believe that we have SUCCEEDED in finding solutions for few of them. You can consider that the problems we faced were our motivation to create something unique. AFFORDABILITY: Not $1500. Not $1200. Not even $1000. Starting at just $600 on Kickstarter. Working direct to consumer, we pass the savings to you with radical transparency.PRACTICALITY: We wanted a quality handmade watch utilitarian enough for everyday wear. Simply, a no frills watch that just makes sense.DESIGN: Beautifully crafted for timelessness with a less is more approach. A classic look with extra detailing on the the multi layered Sandwich Dial.We wanted to create a unique design language for our flagship model and the challenge was to introduce creative elements which would bring out our thought process and convey the same to our patrons. Lots of permutations and combinations were contemplated in terms of designing of case, bezel, hands and bracelet. Our main aim was to provide a distinctive feel to the watch but at the same time keep it very utilitarian to the core.The design concept and the feel was finally perfected after many visits to the drawing board and spending innumerable hours of discussion in producing an automatic dive watch without any compromise on quality, functionality or the uniqueness. This whole journey of a concept to prototyping is completely dedicated to all those who have encouraged us.  The screw-down crown which is placed at the contemporary position of 3 o'clock is etched with the logo of the brand and filled with BGW9 lume for easy access at night. A helium escape value (HEV) located at 9h position, is a feature found on some diving watches. It provides functionality for professional divers operating at great depths for prolonged periods of time or under saturation. The Seaborne case is made of 316 L stainless steel which is also called as surgical steel. This is a high grade, metallurgically strong steel that has a greater resistant to corrosives – both of industrial and biological origin. Due to its effectiveness in high-stress situations, more specifically in contexts that present remarkable levels of acidity, it is highly appreciated in marine environments.  The Diver is created from a blend of angular aerodynamic surfaces and exceptional components. This makes the AUDRIC SeaBorne 500 M an elegant yet competent diver's gear.  The Case-back of the AUDRIC Seaborne 500 M has an engraving of a Sea Turtle which symbolizes strength, endurance and agility. Throughout history, many cultures adopted Sea Turtles as symbols for many different themes as well. Because of their long lifespan, sea turtles often symbolize patience, wisdom, endurance, and good luck. ... A turtle's shell is strong enough to carry the weight of the continent on its back, and with it their actual home. There is also a serial number engraved on each case back to make it unique.  "000/000"   We have 5 different dials in this first line of SeaBorne 500 M timepieces:  A classy and highly luminous dial was of great importance, with a sandwich construction and generous layers of Superluminova C3 on the lower layer  and BGW9 filled indices.  The textured dial is made with great amount of attention to detail. The dial features raised (applied) polished hour markers and printed AUDRIC Logo. The hands are Rhodium plated which gives that extra shine and durability for longer years. The lume on the dial, hands, and bezel is a heavy dose of BGW9 that glows a blue all night long. The watch is absolutely free from harmful coatings like nickel. Dial also has color indicated depth gauge for visual reference. DIAL DEPTH GAUGE: Water absorbs different wavelengths of light to different degrees. The longest wavelengths, with the lowest energy, are absorbed first. Red is the first to be absorbed, followed by orange & yellow. The colors disappear underwater in the same order as they appear in the color spectrum. Even water at 5 ft depth will have a noticeable loss of red. At What Depth Underwater Does Color Disappear?Red - 15 feet, Orange - 25 feet, Yellow - 35 feetThe bracelet is 22mm at the lug and 20mm at the adjustable ratchet buckle. The buckle is milled out  and with 3 micro-adjust positions. The lug holes are screwed with high grade screw bars for easy removal of the bracelet. Solid endlinks for that extra toughness and balance. Satin Brushed and Polished links give an excellent aesthetic feel for this watch.The SeaBorne will ship in a black luxury box with warranty card, and extra spring bars. The AUDRIC logo is engraved on the buckle We wanted to use some of the best input materials on the market for this watch. Inside of the SeaBorne watches are the Swiss Made Sellita SW 200-1 which are hugely employed by the most renowned firms in the field of horology. They are very accurate and built to last for many years. The balance runs at 28,800 vibrations per hour and the movement hacks, comprising 26-jeweled bearings. They deliver a 38 hour power to the timepiece when fully charged /wound. This caliber is considered a workhorse by today's watch making standard. We used a Double Domed Sapphire Crystal Glass for the extraordinary mechanical properties it exhibits rather than the Mineral Crystal Glass alternatives seen in most watches. Five layers of anti-reflective coating are added to the underside of the crystal in addition to the double dome, ensuring a high degree of clarity and minimal light distortion and thus allowing you to get a clear view of the dial at all times, both indoors and outdoors. The crystal is 4.5 mm thick in the center and tapers down to 4.3 mm at the sides. This enables water tight setup for the watch at all circumstances.The bezel insert is made of sapphire, an extremely robust material that is higher scratch resistance, a “nearly indestructible” property, strength and superior longevity as opposed to the traditional ceramic, steel or aluminium alternatives. Despite the higher material costs, the choice was clear especially since we wanted to build the SeaBorne as a sport diver watch. The sapphire insert is engraved and filled with Swiss Super-LumiNova BGW9 pigment for excellent low/no light visibility.The 60-minute bezel is unidirectional (120 clicks) as per ISO/DIN specification for diving safety i.e. it won't accidentally bump down dive time. 
 SS 316 L case : 43 mm * 51 mm.
Case Thickness : 15.4 mm including the crystal.
Crystal Thickness : 4.5 mm.
Lug width : 22 mm.
120 clicks unidirectional sapphire bezel filled with BGW9.
Domed sapphire crystal with 5 layers of anti-reflective coating.
Screwed case back with watch specs.
Screw down crown with logo etched and filled with luminous BGW9
50 ATM W R.
Helium Escape Valve @ 9H.
Sunburst pattern Sandwich Dial (minute markers in C3 Lume) with Matt background and Applied indexes Rhodium plated ( filled with white luminous BGW9 ).
Rhodium plated hour, minute and seconds hands filled with white luminous (BGW9).
SS 316 L bracelet with diver buckle and extender. Solid end links on the fitted bracelet with screws in the links for easy sizing. 22 mm at the lugs and 20 mm at the buckle.
Movement: SW 200- 1 Incabloc and Elabore Execution. 
SWISS MADE and Shipped from Switzerland
 "AUDRIC" ( French, "Old and wise ruler", German, "Noble ruler; Noble friend",)AUDRIC is a SWISS MADE Watch Startup based in Singapore.  At AUDRIC, we are committed to delivering high-quality and rugged watches with utilitarian features. Our ingenious designs, impeccable materials and attention to detail fortify our commitment to produce beautiful timepieces which creates unique value for our customers. All of our watches are SWISS MADE to ensure that they meet not only the highest standards, but also impart that luxurious feel to the customerAffordable Price: Pre-order at launch and enjoy the SeaBorne at a great Kickstarter price of up to 40% off eventual retail prices. Don’t miss this chance to get our watches at preferential prices. Retail prices will revert to full launch price upon launch. Value for money proposition.Stretch Goals: Pledge now and enjoy stretch goals exclusively created for Kickstarter backers.Delivery: We will be shipping all pre-orders BEFORE any full retail units. Pledge now and get the SeaBorne by December 2020. We will never overcharge and dump ridiculous retail markups onto our supporters. We adamantly dislike when high designer markups are just passed onto the consumer. Just because it was designed does not mean it deserves a premium or exorbitant price tag. In reality, design is meant to be shared with all to benefit. Especially in this Kickstarter community where everyone contributes with ideas and feedback, aren't we all designers? In reality, you Kickstarters help create these products.  Shipping:From Switzerland worldwide. Please note: customs duties and taxes are the buyer’s responsibility upon delivery.Shipping to USA and ROW with DHL | Fedex is $35 onward. Free shipping within SwitzerlandWarranty:Two (2) year international warranty from the date you'll receive the watch. The warranty covers manufacturing defects.We chose to work with an established watch manufacturing group known for rigorous quality control. We have a great relationship with our manufacturing partners. We've thoroughly toured their facility multiple times and they are completely align with our goals. We visited their facility in the Summer of 2018 in detailed tours and again in December 2019. With multiple stages in the manufacture and quality check process, we are confident in their ability to deliver a quality product. We were impressed with their sophisticated manufacture process including different rooms for assembly, air pressure checkpoints, water pressure stations, 48-hour time-keeping accuracy test, and (of course) a drop test. All of their facilities meet all necessary regulation and code for operation  After the Kickstarter campaign concludes, we will send out surveys gathering backer information to begin production. Meanwhile, we want to continue R&D for the watch. We will rigorously source, test, and research the materials and production of the watch. While the watches are being manufactured and packaged, we will be preparing for large scale shipment to our backers.Please don’t hesitate to contact us directly if you have any questions about the AUDRIC SeaBorne 500 M. We can be reached at support@audric.ch. We are watch lovers foremostly and we strive to treat each customer how we ourselves would like to be treated. As a micro-brand, each and every customer is important to us - so if you have a burning question for us, just reach out to us directly

story:
I created a really cool product for everyone's glasses and sunglasses called Headband-it and I would love to bring it to market.  I just need your help to do that.  I have the final prototype ready to go (no small feat as the seamtresses and pattern designer that helped me would testify to!).  I even found a U.S. maufacturer willing to work with me. Hurray!!
All I now need is the funds to further develop my web site, buy a lot of fabric, pay the manufacturer to sew a lot of headband-its (minimum order required), and pay for packaging this cool, new, never been seen before, product. With your support I can put Headband-it in the hands of anyone who wants one! Thank you in advance for the support. You can find out more about Headband-it by visiting http://www.headband-it.com

What exactly is Headband-it? 

Headband-it is a stylish, protective sleeve (lined in crushed velvet) that goes over virtually any size glasses that makes your glasses look like a fashionable headband when you are wearing those glasses on your head and functions as a non bulky, stylish way to store your glasses when not in use. 

Headband-it comes in two styles, Classic and Express. The Classic style covers the stems of your glasses and the Express styles exposes the stems. Look and see below. I call it the Indiegogo line!

 

 The Classic style is being worn by the women in the below pictures and the Express style is being worn by the men.

 

    

 

What to do with Headband-it when you are not using it on your glasses?  Wear it on your wrist or ankle of course!

For The $125 and more backer, this is the Black Diamond "limited edition" Headband-it fabric.

story:
IRON LEGIONS

The Centurion Method has gone on leaps and bounds since first launching in 2012, in that short time we've gone from an apolitical subculture for nerds to the full blown training system of groups all around Europe and America.

This vest is the first step towards our unveiling of the third and final stage of what the Centurion Method hopes to achieve as hinted at so un-subtly in the Iron Age Manual. 

The Iron Age requires an Iron Legion, a class of men and women prepared physically, spiritually and mentally for the challenges that face them.

EVERY SON IS ONE DAY A SOLDIER

We never aim to do little things, but move mountains with small actions, something as small as buying a vest contributes towards the greater spread of an idea. The more this idea is embraced and talked about or argued about, the more people say "I could do that better", the more that idea becomes a poison, it is the Law of Revolution.

Every scrap of funding in all of our projects that does not go on buying more books, more shirts and more material to spread our ideas goes straight into the coffers of men and women who are acting across Europe to make a change.

The physical fraternities of Europe's destiny will be built on her sons and daughters who stepped outside of the system for a brief second and made something for themselves, of their own kind, without the interference of the globalist soviet agenda and took back their future. The first step on that path is the taking back of our bodies, physically and ideologically.

GROUND ZERO

So far on all of our endeavors we have tapped the vein of the European subconscious, that we yearn for heroism, for the flaming torch to follow on moonlit nights, to march up the mountainside and ascend to the halls of the gods. All of this we saw, and all of this we have demanded from our fellows.

We must become the purveyors, promoters, instigators and vanguard of a new sense of European style, a sense of control and dominance, danger and occultism rooted in our new religion. 

A vanguard rooted firmly on the foundation of our unshakable convictions, standing the test of time and as the flood recedes we and only we will be left to reap the rewards of our efforts.

story:
What is ARSIM?

Sunlight is the fuel for all solar power generation systems. Like any other power generation technology, knowing the quantity, quality and reliability of the sun light is essential for plant optimization and economic viability of a project.

ARSIM is a Rotating Shadowband Pyranometer (RSP). This is an instrument that measures the solar irradiation as measured in watts per square meter. A RSP uses a Pyranometer that is regularly shaded to provide a reliable measurement of Global Horizontal (GHI), Direct Normal (DNI) and Diffuse Horizontal Irradiation (DHI)

Target

The purpose of this project is to develop a new improved and more economical version of the existing RSPs which are on the market. Following find the two main objectives:

  1. Reduce the price considerably by improving manufacturing standard techniques.
  2. Improve reliability and precision by new algorithms measuring transitory cloudy days.
Currently, most RSPs are based on algorithms developed in the  90's, one objective of this project is to improve measurement algorithms and implement adaptive controls according to the type of weather.

Reduced uncertainty in solar resource of a specific place is desirable in order to predict the energy production of solar power plants. ARSIM is not only for companies, there are many colleges, scientists, students and meteorology enthusiasts all over the world who are interested in studying the solar resource in an affordable and reliable way. With advanced technical features and highly competitive price, ARSIM will be a promising new product in the solar market.

Impact

ARSIM will make solar irradiation measurement affordable for more people promoting therefore more clean energy projects in the world.

Funding Goals

Our goal is to have a commercially calibrated system in the market in the next 12 months period. As a first step, we are going to fabricate a fully functional prototype and test it during the first 6 months at our field testing facility in Madrid, Spain. After the successful completion of testing period we plan to validate and calibrate at least four instruments at the Plataforma Solar in Almeria, Spain and at the NREL research facility in Golden, near Boulder, Colorado during next six months.


Kinds of instruments to measure irradiation

The instruments designed to measure any radiation are called radiometers. This section summarizes the types of radiometers commonly used to measure solar radiation:

Pyranometers and pyrheliometers normally use thermoelectric detectors and photodiodes to convert solar flux on a proportional electrical signal.

Rotating Shadowband Pyranometers (RSP) use a pyranometer that periodically is shaded from a band rotated by a motor. The RSP is constantly measuring GHI and during the time when the pyranometer is shaded, it provides DNI and DHI out of algorithms.


How will it work?

The RSP will incorporate a pyranometer for measuring GHI, plus a shadowband, a electric motor for shading and the mechanics necessary to obtain a stable and robust behavior.



Technical Specifications

ARSIM units: Licor LI-200SZ pyranometer, shadowband, wiring harness, drive mechanism and mounting bracket.

Calibration: Calibrated against an Eppley Precision Spectral Pyranometer (PSP) under natural daylight conditions + Use of DLR's enhanced correction procedures. Typical error under these conditions is ± 2-3%

Sensor LI-200SZ:

     - Sensitivity: Typically 90 µA per 1000 W m-2.

     - Linearity: Maximum deviation of 1% up to 3000 W m-2.

     - Stability: < ± 2% change over a 1 year period.

     - Response Time: 10 µs.

     - Temperature Dependence: 0.15% per °C maximum.

     - Cosine Correction: Cosine corrected up to 80° angle of incidence.

     - Azimuth: < ± 1% error over 360° at 45° elevation.

     - Tilt: No error induced from orientation.

     - Operating Temperature: -40 to 65°C.


Total system operating temperature is between -10º C to +50º C. Including the motor, the mechanical part and the global pyranometer.

Instrument enclosure: ABS motor enclosure and aluminum support.

ARSIM software: S2m Software license  to control the motor and determine the global, diffuse and direct irradiance and ambient air temperature.


Research Team

Manuel Sierra: Industrial Engineer, Electrical specialization. Expert using CAD programs. Programming skills in Python and Matlab as well as simulation of electronic and electrical system with Pspice and Orcad.

Juan Andujar: Industrial Engineer,Electronic and Electrical specialitation. Knowledge in digital and analog electronic and programming in sereral languages such as PHP,Python,C/C++,C#. Experience with meteorological instrumentations such as pyranometers, pyrheliometers, sun tracker... 

Ralf Wiesenberg: Ph.D. in Energy Systems Engineering, Berlin University. Ralf has worked on numerous projects for multinational corporations as an energy specialist and is co-founder of Sun to Market Solutions.

story:
I wanted thank you all for clicking on my project and I appreciate the time you have taken out of your day to read my story. I wanted to create a company that stood for a cause and had a purpose. That purpose is to prove that the American dream is still alive, the dream that people can create something out of nothing and help others in the process.

 So how did I arrive at custom shirting? 

 Being once a military guy and doing all those push-ups and sit-ups turned my body into a lean mean fighting machine. I have broad shoulders, a large neck and a trim waist. That mix doesn’t go well with standard off-the-rack clothing. It’s really frustrating when out of all the clothing companies that sell in America you can’t find one that makes clothes that fit you properly. I never wear ties because I can’t even button my collar. If I want a shirt that fits my neck, the material around my waist looks like a boat sail! The reality is most off-the-rack clothing companies don’t make shirts that fit men. Most are standard sizes they figured most men would fit into. The reality is that most men don’t fit into those sizes. If you’re trying to make a first impression you need to make sure you’re wearing clothing that fit. I know a lot of you men out there have the same problem with finding clothing that fits correctly like I do. You know what they say: If you have a problem don’t cry about it, fix it,” and that’s what I set out to do.

I went out and searched for a great American manufacturer. It took longer than I thought because I didn’t realize how much of our manufacturing base was sent overseas. There were many companies I found that claimed they were an American manufacturing company but their factories were overseas and this wasn’t going to cut it for me. Never giving up I finally found a shirting company in Newark, New Jersey who made all of their shirts here in America. I ordered a couple of samples and when I tried them on they were the best fitting shirts I ever wore. The first thought that came to mind was that these shirts felt like butter. Better yet I could finally button my collar and there was no sail billowing around my waist! I want every man to feel the same thing I felt when I put on that shirt for the first time. There is no reason why men in America should be walking around with shirts that don’t fit them because there is not a company out there serving their needs.

I am bootstrapping this company from the ground up and now to make this all happen in a meaningful way I need your support. Below is more info on the project. Thank so much for your time.

Our 100% pima cotton shirt in a modern fit.

What do we stand for? 

The great American tradition of manufacturing fine clothing still lives on! Rob Marshall stands for creating an American made custom shirt company that showcases the great tradition of American manufacturing. We also created a company that stands for integrity and one that will put our customers and community first. We believe a business should give back to the people who put their trust in the company. We are a company with real people, doing real things. We believe in American manufacturing. 

 To us, the American dream still lives on.

Why we need you. 

Make an investment in American manufacturing! 

 Your contribution goes directly to the cost of building a completely American supply chain. Making the choice to manufacture in America comes with higher costs. Your contribution will help with the cost of developing an interactive website, creating sample shirts, purchasing fabrics, content creation, and manufacturing cost.

How are our shirts made? 

 All of our shirts are made in Newark, New Jersey by a small family of shirt makers who have been making quality shirts for over 40 years. We want to continue to support and create American jobs.

Our Shirts

  • 100% American made
  • Custom tailored
  • 100% high quality cotton fabric
  • Barelli (Mother of Pearl) buttons
  • 500+ shirting combinations
  • Great looking

Our Promise.

Why do we need money?

1. Modern Website - E-commerce development, hosting, payment processing.

2. Product Manufacturing - purchasing additional fabric, sample shirting, labels, packaging.

How will you order shirts?

Before the website is open to the public you’ll receive a special code where you can access the site, test out its features and explore our product lines and options, and even create your shirt.

1. Create your unique look with our interactive site: choose the fabric, collar, cuff, placket, pocket, backstyle, and buttons of your shirt. You will be able to virtually see how your shirt will look.

2. You will then input your measurements (Don’t worry we will teach you how to take proper measurements).

3. Place your order and your custom made American shirt will arrive within 3-4 weeks.

If you live in Austin, Texas we will be able to measure you personally.

Rewards

$10 or more

Early access to the website before it is opened to the public. Your name will be placed on our wall of fame.

$25 or more

Early access to the website before it is opened to the public. Your name will be placed on our wall of fame. You will also receive a free monogram on your purchase of any shirt.

$50 or more

Early access to the website before it is opened to the public. Your name will be placed on our wall of fame. You will receive a free monogram on your purchase of any shirt and a pair of stainless steel collar stays.

$75 or more

Early access to the website before it is opened to the public. Your name will be placed on our wall of fame. You will receive a free monogram on your purchase of any shirt and a pair of stainless steel collar stays. Additionally, you’ll receive a special edition t-shirt.

$100 or more

One American made custom shirt from our A-level fabric line. You'll be able to chose the collar, cuff, placket, fit, pocket and other options. You’ll also receive a public thank you on our social media platforms, and on our website and a special look book with all contributors mentioned and acknowledged. Of course, you’ll also receive all rewards from the $75 pledge.

$120 or more

One American made custom shirt from our B-level fabric line. You'll be able to chose the collar, cuff, placket, fit, pocket, and other options. Just for being incredible we'll throw in a complimentary monogramming with up to 5 lettering and Barelli pearl buttons, a public thank you on our social media platforms, and on our website and A special look book with all contributors mentioned and acknowledged. All rewards from the $75 pledge are included as well.

$200 or more

Two American made custom shirts from our B-level fabric line. Just for being incredible we'll throw in a complimentary monogramming with up to 5 letters and Barelli pearl buttons. A public thank you on our social media platforms, and on our website. You will also receive a personal thank you note as well as a special look book with all contributors mentioned and acknowledged. All rewards from the $75 pledge are also included.

$4000 or more

For your generosity you will receive 12 shirts a year for life. You will also have a shirt style and fabric named in your honor. This can also be transferred to someone of your choosing if you’d like to give them a special and unique gift.
story_txt:
I wanted thank you all for clicking on my project and I appreciate the time you have taken out of your day to read my story. I wanted to create a company that stood for a cause and had a purpose. That purpose is to prove that the American dream is still alive, the dream that people can create something out of nothing and help others in the process.
 So how did I arrive at custom shirting? 
 Being once a military guy and doing all those push-ups and sit-ups turned my body into a lean mean fighting machine. I have broad shoulders, a large neck and a trim waist. That mix doesn’t go well with standard off-the-rack clothing. It’s really frustrating when out of all the clothing companies that sell in America you can’t find one that makes clothes that fit you properly. I never wear ties because I can’t even button my collar. If I want a shirt that fits my neck, the material around my waist looks like a boat sail! The reality is most off-the-rack clothing companies don’t make shirts that fit men. Most are standard sizes they figured most men would fit into. The reality is that most men don’t fit into those sizes. If you’re trying to make a first impression you need to make sure you’re wearing clothing that fit. I know a lot of you men out there have the same problem with finding clothing that fits correctly like I do. You know what they say: If you have a problem don’t cry about it, fix it,” and that’s what I set out to do.
I went out and searched for a great American manufacturer. It took longer than I thought because I didn’t realize how much of our manufacturing base was sent overseas. There were many companies I found that claimed they were an American manufacturing company but their factories were overseas and this wasn’t going to cut it for me. Never giving up I finally found a shirting company in Newark, New Jersey who made all of their shirts here in America. I ordered a couple of samples and when I tried them on they were the best fitting shirts I ever wore. The first thought that came to mind was that these shirts felt like butter. Better yet I could finally button my collar and there was no sail billowing around my waist! I want every man to feel the same thing I felt when I put on that shirt for the first time. There is no reason why men in America should be walking around with shirts that don’t fit them because there is not a company out there serving their needs.
I am bootstrapping this company from the ground up and now to make this all happen in a meaningful way I need your support. Below is more info on the project. Thank so much for your time.

Our 100% pima cotton shirt in a modern fit.
What do we stand for? 
The great American tradition of manufacturing fine clothing still lives on! Rob Marshall stands for creating an American made custom shirt company that showcases the great tradition of American manufacturing. We also created a company that stands for integrity and one that will put our customers and community first. We believe a business should give back to the people who put their trust in the company. We are a company with real people, doing real things. We believe in American manufacturing. 
 To us, the American dream still lives on.
Why we need you. 
Make an investment in American manufacturing! 
 Your contribution goes directly to the cost of building a completely American supply chain. Making the choice to manufacture in America comes with higher costs. Your contribution will help with the cost of developing an interactive website, creating sample shirts, purchasing fabrics, content creation, and manufacturing cost.
How are our shirts made? 
 All of our shirts are made in Newark, New Jersey by a small family of shirt makers who have been making quality shirts for over 40 years. We want to continue to support and create American jobs.
Our Shirts

100% American made
Custom tailored
100% high quality cotton fabric
Barelli (Mother of Pearl) buttons
500+ shirting combinations
Great looking

Our Promise.

Why do we need money?
1. Modern Website - E-commerce development, hosting, payment processing.
2. Product Manufacturing - purchasing additional fabric, sample shirting, labels, packaging.

How will you order shirts?
Before the website is open to the public you’ll receive a special code where you can access the site, test out its features and explore our product lines and options, and even create your shirt.
1. Create your unique look with our interactive site: choose the fabric, collar, cuff, placket, pocket, backstyle, and buttons of your shirt. You will be able to virtually see how your shirt will look.
2. You will then input your measurements (Don’t worry we will teach you how to take proper measurements).
3. Place your order and your custom made American shirt will arrive within 3-4 weeks.
If you live in Austin, Texas we will be able to measure you personally.
Rewards
$10 or more
Early access to the website before it is opened to the public. Your name will be placed on our wall of fame.
$25 or more
Early access to the website before it is opened to the public. Your name will be placed on our wall of fame. You will also receive a free monogram on your purchase of any shirt.
$50 or more
Early access to the website before it is opened to the public. Your name will be placed on our wall of fame. You will receive a free monogram on your purchase of any shirt and a pair of stainless steel collar stays.
$75 or more
Early access to the website before it is opened to the public. Your name will be placed on our wall of fame. You will receive a free monogram on your purchase of any shirt and a pair of stainless steel collar stays. Additionally, you’ll receive a special edition t-shirt.

You’ll also receive a public thank you on our social media platforms, and on our website and a special look book with all contributors mentioned and acknowledged. Of course, you’ll also receive all rewards from the $75 pledge.
$120 or more
One American made custom shirt from our B-level fabric line. You'll be able to chose the collar, cuff, placket, fit, pocket, and other options. Just for being incredible we'll throw in a complimentary monogramming with up to 5 lettering and Barelli pearl buttons, a public thank you on our social media platforms, and on our website and A special look book with all contributors mentioned and acknowledged. All rewards from the $75 pledge are included as well.

story:
Do you have a stylist in you?

Do you love to give fashion advice?

Are you tired of spending hours and hours browsing sites or stores,
searching to get that perfect look?

We have the solution for you!


  • Fashion Inspiration
  • Fashion Curation
  • Fashion Trends
  • Fashion News
  • Fashion Updates
  • Fashion Shopping

We make mixing and matching fun and easy from your desktop or on the go. This is a tool for fashion bloggers, stylists and everyone who loves fashion.


What are we building?

We're building an amazing platform - its fashion with a FUN twist! We've shown it to a select few, and they were all blown away. This has a serious WOW! factor.

… but we can't tell or show you what it is – just yet...

The base of our system is fashionatis.com - a fashion collaboration platform that enables you to be the stylist, to get advice from your friends, or see picks from our fashion advisors.

It's a search engine, it's a personal stylist, it's a tool.
This is for everyone who loves fashion.

This a new way to find what you are looking for - or just to get inspiration.


But the front end? We can't wait to show you the front end! It will soon be on a device near you.

It’s all about fashion

It’s fun and it’s completely free.

We are in the middle of building the platform and we will share more as soon as we have something more to show.


Why funding?

As you know big projects aren’t cheap and we want to keep this forever free for everyone to use. That’s why we are asking for your support.

We have been working around the clock on this for a while and we will continue to do so but the expenses are getting to a point where we can't handle it alone. We need funds to pay for design and artwork, legal advice, and soon servers, software, licenses, etc. so we can make sure you guys get the best experience - always free!

We still work for free on this and will not be able to draw a salary until we get external investors so any donation, above or below our goal, will go directly to cover project expenses.


Perks

Our wonderful team came up with these perks for you!


Unique limited edition fashion smartphone covers:

We have teamed up with fashion illustrator Stine Reintoft who has made three amazing smartphone covers for us. They are unique and limited editions - they will only be sold once (on this gig) and never again. If you'd like one of them, secure it now and support us by buying one at only $40. We have covers for iPhone 4/5 and Samsung S3/S4. Covers can be delivered anywhere in the world.


Link back from our thank you page:

For $10 you can add a link to your name on our thank you page.

For $20 you can write 70 characters plus have a link back.

For $30 add a 36x36 pixels logo next to the 70 character text.

For $40 you can write 140 characters plus have a link back.

For $50 have a 50x50 pixels logo, 140 character text and link back.

As we aim to build a world wide brand this link back will potentially be viewed by millions and give you great value and improved ranking.


For those of you who can travel to London please celebrate with us:

If you support us with more than $100 we will invite you to our launch party in London and for donations over $250 we will invite you to the pre-launch party dinner.

Exact date and location will be announced when we know the launch date.


All donations will be mentioned on our Thank You page and you will be first to register.
All funders will get a preview before we launch (we can't wait to hear you say “Wow!”). Be first to register your account and secure your name.

And even if you can’t donate but like the project, go to our website: fashionatis.com and sign up for more updates as we progress.


Become an angel

Spread our Indiegogo link and send us more happy funders and Likes. Tell us where you shared our link, whether it be an email to your mom or on your one million readers blog, or just use the Indiegogo share tools! We will thank you on our wall and feature you on a special angels list on our Thank You page.

And make sure to Like us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/fashionatis.com and we will keep you and your friends posted on news and updates.


Who are we?

TeeJay is an Internet tech guru that has been working in the online industry since last century.

Kasper is an IT management specialist with many huge corporate projects behind him. We both have burning innovative and entrepreneurial minds.


We are in the middle of creating something truly unique and we want to share it with the world
– for free.

story:
Who We Are

We are a Service Disabled Veteran Owned Small Business that has created the most powerful  Motivational and Visualization Tool ever, the Vision Coin. The extraordinary Vision Coin was created so that you can use your power of Creative Visualization to the maximum and Manifest the abundance of Success, Health and Happiness that you most desire.

This is the perfect tool for leaders and management, coaches, students, sales teams, military teams, and sports teams. It provides unbelievable motivational incentive for weight loss, fitness, exercises encouragement, self-improvements, self-confidence and ending bad habits in every arena

View our website http://www.visioncoin.com

We are passionate about helping everyone learn the Power of Positive Thinking

Why We Are Raising Funds

We decided to use Indiegogo as our source of raising funds because we believed that there are a large number of folks in this arena that truly believe and understand the power of positive thinking and understand that if you think about good things like Money, Success, Health, and Happiness then that is what you will manifest into your life. Meeting our $15,000 goal will help cover the costs of the design of several proto-type units and packaging plus go towards the production of the products that we have up for offering.

The funds raised will be used for...

  • Coin Production tooling and mold creation costs
  • Packaging design and sourcing
  • Setting up delivery and support channels
  • Brochures design production and sourcing

With your help, we bring the power of Creative Visualization to thousands of people that will be able to Manifest Prosperity. “Anything That the Mind Can Conceive and Believe, It Can Achieve”

These beautifully designed nickel plated Vision Coins and attractive packaging are ready to help folks who want to be top achievers with unlimited potential and have the desire to create abundance and want to live a richer and fuller life. Besides helping on proto-types and designs of the Vision Coin, we need funding for the next big step to expand our motivational tools in several strategic areas. These include books and DVD’s. Your help in getting up through the current production and to the next big step is greatly appreciated. We know that you will enjoy the extremely quality crafted products that we offer. For Your Contribution you will receive our exceptional crafted product which is one of the most powerful manifestation tools available, Period!

The Vision Coin                                                                         

We have designed an incredibly powerful tool that is at your fingertips inspiring you to focus your energy and emotions on the thoughts and feelings that you have created. This lets you apply the process of the “Law of Attraction” whereas “Anything That the Mind can Conceive and Believe It can Achieve”. By having the Coin with you it keeps your mind attracting the like things that you have visualized. This process has helped millions of people through the years achieve their goals and dreams; and it will help you manifest your affirmations and create prosperity.        

           

The Vision Coin was created for the people who believe that your thoughts become things. Most people have read the books, listened to the CD’s, and have seen the DVD’s. They have paid heed to the thoughts of great authors, scientists, lecturers, teachers and philosophers. Their words have inspired them. They have set specific goals, objectives, and affirmations in their mind. Now they are ready to change their life and achieve their goals using the Law of Attraction.

Leaders face the challenges to increase their teams productive and provide the enthusiasm within their organization. Top achievers know the secret to success and that is why they seek resources that help inform, inspire, and enlighten them and their team to accomplish their goals. The Vision Coin is the tool that implements this.

The Vision Coin was designed for those who want to be top achievers with unlimited potential and have the desire to create abundance and wants to live a richer and fuller life.

The benefits of the Vision Coin are astounding and using it will transform you and your team beyond what you ever thought possible.

The Vision Coin is the best motivational tool ever, Period!

You have an Amazing Experience Ahead

Your mind is ready to process your desires if you clearly know what you want. You can have anything that you command in life by simply using the “Law of Attraction” where your Thoughts Become Things. The secret is the more focused emotion, energy and feelings that you put into your creative visions the quicker you will achieve and manifest these into a reality.

Enjoy Your Journey to Success

We are passionate about helping everyone learn the Power of Positive Thinking

We appreciate your support and please share Vision Coin with your friends

The Perk Packages you get for your Contributions

The Vision Coin Brochure Perk Package $3 USD

WHAT YOU GET

The Vision Coin brochure, although it’s not the “Coin” it will explain most of the inspirational information that will guide you through your experience in using this phenomenal power of Creative Visualization where you are able to Manifest Prosperity and Your Thoughts Become Things, it’s Just a simple. We appreciate any and all of your contributions. All Shipping is free even International.


The Single Individual Perk Package $16 USD

WHAT YOU GET

One Vision Coin Package

The perfect tool for the person that is ready to experience the extraordinary power of Creative Visualization and that is ready to change their life and Manifest the abundance of Success, Health and Happiness that they most Desire. The combination of your thoughts, emotions, beliefs and energy will take you on this extraordinary passage where you will get a clear and definite image of exactly what you want in life and it will allow you to prosper beyond what you ever conceived! Buy one for your friends that hasn’t yet become a forward thinking as you have towards Creative Visualization.

Unbelievable 45% OFF Vision Coin Retail price of $24.95 ea + Shipping You Save $13.95 Plus Free Shipping in the US*

* Please add $7 for all international shipping outside the US: 

Delivery Time, In Stock, and Ready to Ship

300 Available Packages of the Single Individual Pack


The Five Member Team Perk Package $77 USD

WHAT YOU GET

Five Vision Coin Packages

The Five Member Package is the perfect size for small sports teams, military teams, sales teams, down line sales members and all managers of less than six employees that you would like to reward and provide a motivational and inspirational gift. I promise they will absolutely love it and preform beyond yours and their greatest expectations.

You pay only $15.45 ea Unbelievable 50% OFF Vision Coin Retail price of $24.95 ea + Shipping You Save a total of $77.25 which is a savings of $15.45 for each coin Plus Free Shipping in the US*

* Please add $7 for all international shipping outside the US:

Delivery Time, In Stock, and Ready to Ship

60 Available


The Twenty Five Member Team Perk Package $347 USD 

WHAT YOU GET

Twenty Five Vision Coin Packages

I believe that the Twenty Five Member Package will be the most popular package because small companies that want to motivate their sales team and the managers that want to reward his or her staff from the warehouse personal to the sales team to the general office personal. This size package is also great for sports teams that want to mix and matches different packages to get the right number of awards for their team as well as military leaders that are looking for a positive thinking tool that will bring everyone together. And of course the Extremely Successful Sales Groups that have down lines that are always ten times more productive with an extra motivational reward and an appreciation gift. I promise they will absolutely love the Vision Coin.

You pay only $13.90 ea an Unbelievable 55% OFF Vision Coin Retail price of $24.95 ea + Shipping You Save a total of $595 which is a savings of $17 for each coinPlus Free Shipping in the US* 

* Please add $7 for all international shipping outside the US: Delivery Time, In Stock, Ready to Ship

35 Available 


The Seventy Five TeamPerk Package $918USD

WHAT YOU GET

Seventy Five Vision Coin Packages

The Seventy Five Member Package will be popular with larger companies that already realize the importance of rewarding their employees with an “Appreciation” that is more important than taking them for a drink one evening which is “not so cool now days”. Larger companies have already had the motivational speakers at their facilities and have passed out the CD’s and the books. Their employees have read the books they have listened to the CD’s, and have seen the DVD’s. They have paid heed to the thoughts of great authors, scientists, lecturers, teachers and philosophers. Their words have inspired them. They have set specific goals, objectives, and affirmations in their mind. Now they are ready to change their life and achieve their goals using the Law of Attraction. The secret is to stay focused on the positive images they have shaped by nurturing them with constant attention until they become a reality. When they repeat creative visualization of their thoughts and affirmations, their subconscious mind will interpret these visions as what they wish to achieve and make real. This process is the genesis of the Vision Coin.

Incredible 60% OFF You pay only $12.25 ea Unbelievable 60% OFF Vision Coin Retail price of $24.95 ea + Shipping. You Save a total of $1398 which is a savings of $18.65 for each coin Plus Free Shipping in the US.

* Please add $7 for international shipping outside the US:  Delivery Time, In Stock, and Ready to Ship

5 Available

We are passionate about helping everyone learn the Power of Positive Thinking

story:
Birds of Paradise - Birds of Prey, the New Collection from The Bad Button Corsets for 2014


Alisha Martin, the corsetiere behind The Bad Button Bespoke Corsets, has never believed that there is such a thing as gilding the lily.  Or, in this case, gilding the pheonix!  The Bad Button's designs have always leaned to the very feminine and decorative and the hallmark's of Alisha's work have come to be such labor intensive techniques as cording and delicate flossing.  In this same vein, an idea for a collection has been waiting to come to life for several years and is ready to take flight: Birds of Paradise - Birds of Prey. 

So, what's this campaign about?


At this point in time, the collection is slated to be 4 pieces inspired by the avian world: Dark Pheonix, Snowy Owl, American Kestrel, and Quetzal.  Those four are already in production and will be finished by the end of March for the photo shoot, funding will extend the collection up to 8 corsets and accessories in the theme.

  • Your funding will help in so many ways, but how exactly?  The help will go to: buying the necessary feathers and other supplies to expand out the collection, hiring the photographer, models, hair and make up, as well as an assistant.  Just as importantly, it'll mean hiring a graphic designer to do the layout and ultimately produce the lookbook!
  • For helping, I've got a few perks to share.  There will be several lookbooks being produced just for the project, as well as chances to get a custom drafted pattern for those who want to try out making a corset to their own measurements, or a feathered neck corset similar to the kind you'll see in the collection!
  • Even without meeting goal, funding will go to expanding the collection and helping to finance the lookbook.  
  • If we meet more than goal?  There are plans in the works to debut the collection at a runway show, that will also feature the work of other designers in the Lexington area.  Reaching more funding will help to support this collaborative effort. 

"Dark Pheonix" Epaulet Neck Corset

What about during production?

The entire time during the production of the collection, I'll be posting little sneak peaks so that you can see how the project is coming along.  Since you're being so generous and helping out, I'd also like to have you involved a little further in the collection and help me to decide on one of the designs!  Some options are:

  • Himalayan Monal
  • Lilac Fronted Roller
  • Horned Owl
  • Sooty Falcon
  • Or a bird of your choice!

Voting for the crowd design will happen on Facebook as soon as the campaign gets funding.

Total Betty Boudoir / ShutterProof Photography / Total Betty Boudoir

Want to further the collection?

Lexington, KY and the surrounding areas is overflowing with talent.  Even if you can't contribute to the campaign, please help to support the arts.  Buy products from independent or local designers and craftspeople.  Consider getting the word out about the collection and the campaign by sharing it on whatever form of social media you use.  And when all is said and done and the collection has been funded, share the word about the runway show that is tentatively being planned to unveil the collection, and the works of other independent designers in the Lexington area.

story:
A & A Shoes - The future producers of "Cannies"

About Us

We are Andro Mathewson & Andres Canales, two young boys, from international backgrounds, still in high school in Germany, yet rich with ideas and the motivation and time to develop and hopefully realize those ideas. We wish to start our own shoe company for many reasons, mainly to begin anew, secure our future and maybe one day pay our college tuition fees.

Our Campaign

We both wish to succeed in life and are attempting it through the development of this idea. My friend, Andres Canales, told me about his idea as a short story, One day sitting on the bus, he thought: Why are shoelaces always placed on the upper, forward part of the shoe? The answer may be simple - for Style and Stability. Yet he continued, what if one placed the shoelaces on the side and left the upper space completely empty for design. We decided to follow up on the idea and tracked down a shoemaker in Munich, Germany. He confirmed that it would be possible, structurally so we downloaded 3D Design shoe software and created sketches, designs and different concepts, which you can see in the video, and as pictures. Then we decided to try an Indiegogo project and hopefully..."Cannies" would come alive.

Why we need YOU?

As high school students we do not have the sufficient funds to support a beginning for our fresh, new design concept. If you support us financially you will be doing all of the following:

1. Being part of a new idea, a new concept, a new reality.

2. You will be helping two motivated and hard-working boys to succeed in life and gain a fresh start

3. You will be part of a campaign and community for life

4. Awesome Perks

5. Contribute to the development of multiple concepts and ideas in the near future and stay in contact with Andro & Andres.

If you have any question at all, please feel free to contact us at any time under: andro.mathewson@yahoo.com and andres_canrei@hotmail.com All e-mails will be answered.

What we need?

We have requested $18000, which 100% of go to the development of our project in the following ways: Purchasing a 3D printer with show making capacity to use modern technology and raise awareness about 3D printers; Purchasing materials for the shoes, developing new concepts; contracting a designer for the production of the first batch of "Cannies"

Furthermore,  we have promised each other that if the idea of “Cannies” develops enough, we will give 5% of all our profit to charitable organizations for the rest of the existence of “A&A Shoes”.

Our Perks, Your Win

As you can see, we have a large range of perks – Ranging from simple Thank you mails and postcards to a life discount of future “Cannies” and even a party with Andres, Andro and out team.

If it doesn't reach the goal: all money will be used to develop as far as possible the idea of "Cannies" and "A&A" Shoes and other sponsors will be sought.

If you Can't Help

If you can offer us no financial support, please share our project on Facebook, Twitter, Google+ and anywhere else possible.

We will be grateful for your support.

Best Wishes

Andro Mathewson & Andres Canales

A&A Shoes

story:
The “turbine Geode” watch, is a fusion of classic styling,automatic quality movement, and good functionality at an affordable price!

We now have another range, a less expensive watch, see it at:
www.igg.me/at/turbineclassic 

Thank you in advance for checking out our Indiegogo page, we truly appreciate all the support.

The turbine geode watch was designed out of a love and passion for mechanical watches, and a disappointment at the lack of clean functional watches in the market place!

We noticed that prices were high due to marketing, branding, and expensive jewellery stores making many watches worth only a fraction of what they may cost.

So we decided to create our own brand of classic, functional and aesthetically pleasing watches. We are sure that you will love the Turbine Geode, our first design! 

When creating the Geode we wanted to ensure:

1.     *  A classic design with modern functionality.

2.      * Using high quality materials

3.      * Affordability (keeping to under $300)

Black leather band option with double butterfly clasp

In the design process we did not want to cut corners so decided on a classic 24 jewel automatic movement with toughened Sapphire crystal glass. 

We have incorporated a glass porthole at the front and a sapphire crystal glass cover at the back so as to show off the lovely movement and included a 24 hour dial! We chose the Seiko made automatic movement of Japan as this gives great quality at an affordable price!


Leather strap model with perforated holes for comfort

Stainless steel strap model


Sapphire Crystal glass front with porthole exposed mechanism!

A good quality all stainless steel strap with a double butterfly clasp. With the leather strap, again, a high quality strap with a butterfly clasp and perforated leather for comfort.(the images for the leather strap model do show a normal buckle on the strap, but will come with the butterfly clasp) The back is also covered in toughened sapphire crystal glass.


From the sketch.....

To the 3D cad image our manufacturer created for us.


Why we decided on the GEODE for our first watch.

like a beautiful geode rock, when exposed to the inside of the rock showcases its inner beauty, the GEODE watch has a porthole on the front dial and a sapphire crystal glass back cover exposing the fine mechanical movement and one of the 24 jewels.

Even in low light the chrome hands and hour markers are nice and reflective The hour and minute hands are also luminescent

The Geode Specification

* Seiko Movement: Automatic 24 jewels

* 21,600 vibrations per hour

* 24 hour movement dial.

* Case Size: 40 mm

* Lug width: 20 mm

* 21,600 vibrations per hour

* Glass front and back: Hardened Sapphire crystal

* Case Material: Stainless steel 316L

* Strap: 304 high precision stainless steel

* Clasp: Double butterfly push button deployment

* Crown: 316 stainless steel

* Water Resistance: 3 ATM (30 m)

Drawing of the Geode mechanism

About Us  

Terry Flores. 

We are both entrepreneurs with a passion for fine mechanical watches. At just 10 years old I crossed half way across London taking two separate bus ride to purchase my very first watch, and ever since have been an avid collector of timepieces! So when the opportunity to work with Chris Ellis on this project came along I saw a great  opportunity to create a beautiful timepiece ourselves!

Chris Ellis 

American born, Chris has been in the watch making process and has worked with one of the top watch making companies. Chris is also passionate about quality timepieces and was very instrumental in the design of the new turbine Geode watch! 

View and details of watch back

What is the future for the turbine watch company? 

We want to create a new brand (starting with the Geode) of functional and aesthetic watches at affordable prices and would like you to be there and join us on this exciting journey. 

When funded we will update our website to include a members area whereby when we create a new watch will invite YOU to tell us what you would like to see in a watch and will be able to get great discounts on the new designs as founder supporters, a way of saying thank you for supporting us in our early days!  We have secured the domain that is now ours so the next step will be a great website.

Starting with the Geode you will be able to collect all the "tubine" watches that we design and produce.

We need you Support 

We have the prototype watches here with us and have agreed on a limited number of watches to be produced, so are ready to start production. So that we can turn this into a reality we need YOUR support. Apart from pledging your support you will be able to share this journey with others. 

We shall spread the word via social media but would really appreciate it if you too were to spread the word by the same means, email your friends, use the "share" button located just under our home video, post to your Facebook/twitter pages, that way we get that much closer to being funded and you get a superb watch at a heavily discounted price! 

A final word 

A huge thank you for your support and helping us launch our project!

Delivery

Once the funds are released to us, we can pay the initial deposit to begin production.  Production time takes roughly 40 days depending on the quantity of the order. We will then ship the orders to our backers backers! We do have experience with shipping abroad. 

For more than one watch we have added a very modest $3 shipping cost. We have been very fair with the extra $3 for multiple purchases and have not loaded on excessive shipping costs!

When we  receive the watches from our suppliers we will inspect each timepiece, pack securely, and prepare for shipment. We anticipate receiving the watches around July and will plan for delivery in August, earlier if possible!


Risks and challenges

The main challenge here is to ensure that we get the word out and get the funding, other than that there is always the challenge of ensuring we get the orders out on time, however we are determined to ensure this happens.  Our manufacturers are used to fulfilling orders and working to a deadline.

We will keep our backers informed during the production process. I'll do this with regular updates and sharing pictures as often as possible, for example when the watch cases are finished, when the dials are printed, during final assembly etc..... so please drop in from time to time, using the social media links that you see at the bottom of this page as we shall also be posting updates on our social media pages too!

If for any reason there are any setbacks and it looks as if we may not meet our deadline we will be as open as possible and keep you in the loop, however we will do out utmost to fulfill our promises as we desire to create a loyal following of turbine watches!


https://www.facebook.com/turbinewatches?ref=hl
