story:
P.M.Art is a brand new clothing company with a mission to help create a positive planet. All our designs are aimed at spreading positivity and making you feel good about yourself and your life! Our goal for this campaign is to raise start-up and production costs in order to get P.M.Art off the ground.


About P.M.Art

P.M.Art is committed to creating and promoting positivity through art, inspired by Napoleon Hill's “Positive Mental Attitude”. We use organic, fair-trade and cruelty-free products, made with a ton of PMA! To top it off, 10% of the profits from each t-shirt sold will be donated to amazing charities.


My story...

My name is Hayley Holroyd and I am the creator of P.M.Art. I live in Vancouver, Canada in a community called Kitsilano, where you find more yoga studios than you do Starbucks!

In early 2011 I was diagnosed with a type of cancer called Hodgkin’s Lymphoma. It was a really difficult year for me with lots of chemotherapy, needles, surgeries and trips to the hospital. And to make matters worse, I had to go through losing my hair. After losing my hair, I saw myself and the world differently. Letting go of something that had seemed so important, taught me the meaning of what actually was important... feeling good about myself and my life, no matter what other people think.

Luckily my husband introduced me to Napoleon Hill's awesome philosophy of Positive Mental Attitude, which taught me how to be positive and grateful, especially through the tough times. And now, because of my family, friends and my PMA, I am cancer free, happy and healthy! So now it’s my chance to give back.

I'm also vegan and straight edge, and with my growing empathy for the world and all its lovely creatures, I’m constantly trying to find ways that I can make it a better place for everyone. Combining my need to inspire people with positivity and my love for art has led me to the wonderfully fulfilling creation of P.M.Art.


It will cost at least $15,000 to launch P.M.Art, which will cover:

T-Shirts: Fair-trade, organic t-shirts in 7 colours and a variety of sizes for both men and women.
Printing: All 7 designs printed in high-quality.
Charities: 10% of the profits from each t-shirt sold will be donated to charities.
Business: Admin, website design/maintenance, online store set-up, PR and marketing, etc.
Development: Creating new designs, expanding product ranges, etc.


Contributions beyond $15,000 will help even more :)

New design ideas and products are already brewing, which could come to life thanks to money raised over and above the goal. And of course, 10% of the profits from all future P.M.Art products will also be donated to charities.


Other ways you can help:

Please help spread the word via email, blog, Facebook, Twitter, Google+, etc. or just by good old-fashioned word of mouth! You can also use the ‘Share This Campaign’ feature under the video on this page. So, even if you’re broke you can help!


Contributions of any kind help and are greatly appreciated!!!
Thank you :)
story_txt: P.M.Art is a brand new clothing company with a mission to help create a positive planet. All our designs are aimed at spreading positivity and making you feel good about yourself and your life! Our goal for this campaign is to raise start-up and production costs in order to get P.M.Art off the ground.About P.M.ArtP.M.Art is committed to creating and promoting positivity through art, inspired by Napoleon Hill's “Positive Mental Attitude”. We use organic, fair-trade and cruelty-free products, made with a ton of PMA! To top it off, 10% of the profits from each t-shirt sold will be donated to amazing charities.My story...My name is Hayley Holroyd and I am the creator of P.M.Art. I live in Vancouver, Canada in a community called Kitsilano, where you find more yoga studios than you do Starbucks!In early 2011 I was diagnosed with a type of cancer called Hodgkin’s Lymphoma. It was a really difficult year for me with lots of chemotherapy, needles, surgeries and trips to the hospital. And to make matters worse, I had to go through losing my hair. After losing my hair, I saw myself and the world differently. Letting go of something that had seemed so important, taught me the meaning of what actually was important... feeling good about myself and my life, no matter what other people think.Luckily my husband introduced me to Napoleon Hill's awesome philosophy of Positive Mental Attitude, which taught me how to be positive and grateful, especially through the tough times. And now, because of my family, friends and my PMA, I am cancer free, happy and healthy! So now it’s my chance to give back.I'm also vegan and straight edge, and with my growing empathy for the world and all its lovely creatures, I’m constantly trying to find ways that I can make it a better place for everyone. Combining my need to inspire people with positivity and my love for art has led me to the wonderfully fulfilling creation of P.M.Art.It will cost at least $15,000 to launch P.M.Art, which will cover:T-Shirts: Fair-trade, organic t-shirts in 7 colours and a variety of sizes for both men and women.Printing: All 7 designs printed in high-quality.Charities: 10% of the profits from each t-shirt sold will be donated to charities.Business: Admin, website design/maintenance, online store set-up, PR and marketing, etc.Development: Creating new designs, expanding product ranges, etc.Contributions beyond $15,000 will help even more :)New design ideas and products are already brewing, which could come to life thanks to money raised over and above the goal. And of course, 10% of the profits from all future P.M.Art products will also be donated to charities.Other ways you can help:Please help spread the word via email, blog, Facebook, Twitter, Google+, etc. or just by good old-fashioned word of mouth! You can also use the ‘Share This Campaign’ feature under the video on this page. So, even if you’re broke you can help!Contributions of any kind help and are greatly appreciated!!!Thank you :)

story:
Dou-Roshni: Inception and Plan

"They may not have the pre-reqs for high profile jobs but they are better than you or me when it comes to certain types of work." - Founder, Vocational Training Centre during a casual talk.

There are a lot of disabled people getting training in various sectors at different institutions or organizations. Vocational training centres in Karachi often teach disabled personnel computer skills, stitching, embroidery, painting etc. I have been to such centres and have seen the quality of training and caliber of the work of the most ignored segment of many societies. Instead of assuming that disabled people add to the economic burden of a country, we should see them as potential workers, contributing in full for their lives and of other's.

Moreover, there is abundance of women who are trapped in poverty and lack the skills to step out of it. During my field work for projects related to poverty in Pakistan, I came across a lot of unskilled women who were willing to work at the bare minimum wage just to financially sustain themselves. That is when I realized how much a platform to train and a good-paying employment can add to our society. These women are more than willing to get training and hone their skills to put them to economic use.

Dou-Roshni is an initiative that seeks to train and employ the disabled and poor female workforce as major business drivers. The idea involves employing those people from vocational training centres to produce high quality traditional Pakistani handicrafts, internationally demanded clothes and jewellery. The traditional products include Embroidered Kurta (shirt), rali (wall-hangings, bedsheets, cushion covers, table mats), Khussa (shoes, slippers), decoratives such as mini rickshaws or trucks. The products will be available at an online shop for the world to buy. 

Their employment will be conditional on the children in their families enrolling in and attending school regularly. They will be supported for education related expenses when needed from business profits.

Profit from sales will be reinvested into the business and will go towards specialized training of more disabled and poor people. As the project succeeds, Dou-Roshni will be a full-scale business with the same people in management (clerical) positions as well as production. This will be an excellent opportunity for those who fail to get jobs at par with others, to earn for themselves and even contribute to other's trainings and their own career development. It will give them all they need for a normal life. Plus, they will be making beautiful products for all to buy! :)

Dou Roshni means 'give light' in Urdu, the national language of Pakistan. It can also mean 2 lights: referring to the maker and the wearer of the products of Dou-Roshni.

 Dou-Roshni: Costing

Product Designing: $500

People Training: $500

Labour Cost: 6*150 ~ $1000

Equipment Cost (Sewing Machines and installation): 4*300 ~ $1200

Raw Materials: $2000

Marketing Expenses (website creation, online marketing etc): $1500

Miscellaneous (fuel etc) expenses: $300

Total amount: $7000

This money can kickstart and support the business for the first 2 months of operations. After which the business will be able to sustain itself through profits.

Dou-Roshni got something for you! :)

Every person funding the project (for more than $20) will receive a photograph with a story of someone whose life has changed due to Dou-Roshni.
 
For people contributing more than $100, you will get a 5% discount on you first purchase! :)

For people contributing more than $250, you will get a 10% discount on you first purchase! :)

For contributions of more than $500 and $1000, Dou-Roshni employees will make something special and send it your way, with their photograph and story attached! :)

Perks will be granted only if the project succeeds in raising $7000 or more. 

Dou-Roshni: Impact

By the end of 2013, Dou-Roshni will have a 20 people from extremely poor and helpless backgrounds trained and employed. Dou-Roshni will also assist children from those 20 households to enroll in school and get the education they deserve.

By 2015, Dou-Roshni will identify countries where there is most demand for it's products and open a store there! The number of people who are trained and employed will be more than 50. Dou-Roshni will also assist children from those 50 households to enroll in school and get the education they deserve.

Liked Dou-Roshni? Make it happen! :) Let you friends know!

 

And, a little about me:

I am Kanza Azeemi, an aspiring social entrepreneur, pursuing undergraduate studies in Economics at Lahore University of Management Sciences, Pakistan. I write for newspapers in Pakistan and Japan, and seek to use my writing to raise important social issues pertinent to developing countries. I have been awarded scholarships for exchange programs to Waseda University, Tokyo for a semester and to National University of Singapore for a summer program on 'Economic and Enterprise Development'. I won the Best Paper Award at SAESM 2012, Nepal. My research paper focused on the behavioral failures leading to the energy paradox in the energy-efficient lighting market in developing countries. I seek to give fashion a sustainable touch through my social enterprise, invest in human capital development and empower the underprivileged.

 You can see my World Bank blog at: http://blogs.worldbank.org/endpovertyinsouthasia/voices-youth-towards-green-south-asia-pakistan

My Express Tribune blogs at:
http://blogs.tribune.com.pk/author/541/kanza-azeemi/

My Japan Times article at:http://www.japantimes.co.jp/community/2012/03/27/general/false-eyelashes-an-authentic-eid-but-were-not-in-karachi-anymore/

story:
VERSIONE ITALIANA

Suono la batteria fin da quando avevo quattordici anni, ho sempre amato sperimentare nuovi suoni cercando sempre di inventare ed inserire nel mio drum set nuovi effetti.

Arrivato a ventitre anni l'esigenza di costruire una batteria personalizzata è stata talmente forte che ho deciso di mettere in pratica gli insegnamenti di falegnameria di mio padre per creare dei tamburi che soddisfacessero le mie fantasie sonore!

Dopo più di un anno di esperimenti il primo rullante, gran suono e quindi... Zazza Handcrafted Drums.

Costruisco fusti in multistrato artigianali, curo ogni parte del mio lavoro, dalla scelta del legno alla verniciatura ed assemblaggio.

La qualità di uno strumento artigianale non ha nulla a che vedere con gli strumenti commerciali, il lungo lavoro che c'è dietro alla creazione dei  tamburi fa si che ogni dettaglio sia curato al meglio e conferisce un calore ed una definizione che solo il legno pregiato e il duro lavoro sanno dare.

Ogni essenza dona al tamburo un suono particolare, miscelando i diversi legni in un unico fusto è possibile dar vita ad infiniti suoni.

Per diffondere e produrre i miei fusti ho bisogno anche del tuo aiuto, costruire uno strumento artigianale non richiede solo molto tempo ma anche molti soldi. Per poter far conoscere sempre a più persone le mie batterie ho bisogno di produrre più materiale ed allargare il mio laboratorio, ho bisogno del tuo contributo per arrivare al mio obiettivo! Vorrei raggiungere la somma di 10000 Euro per costruire nuove batterie e rullanti, registrare dei video promozionali professionali in studio di registrazione ed acquistare nuovi macchinari per il mio laboratorio.

Uno strumento artigianale riesce a soddisfare qualsiasi musicista!

Ogni fase della produzione è curata direttamente da me sin dalla creazione delle presse per i tamburi.

Per fare una batteria ho bisogno di trenta/quaranta giorni, per un rullante non più di trenta. Su ogni fusto assicuro una garanzia di  due anni entro i quali è garantita ogni assistenza su eventuali imperfezioni o danni sui fusti non causati da agenti esterni.

Non ho rischi di ritardi e provvederò ad inviare ai donatori il materiale nel più breve tempo possibile.

Tutti i premi saranno spediti alla fine di questa campagna.


ENGLISH VERSION

I play the drums since I was fourteen, I always loved experimenting on sounds even trying to implement my drum set with new and different effects .

At 23 I realized the only way to do so was to build my own drum set, so I decided to put into pratice my father’s knowledge about woodworking, and I realized I was able to fulfill my fancy about the sound of the drums I wanted to play!

After a little more than a year of experiments, my first snare drum was ready to rock, sound was amazing and so… Zazza Handcrafted Drums was born!

I personally craft the drums, taking care of each step of my work, from the selection of the woods through it’s assembly and painting.

The quality of an handcrafted instrument has nothing to share with commercial ones, the hard work that sits behind the creation of the drums make each and everyone of them a unique piece in which each detail is tailored in order to let the finest woods express themselves at their best creating amazing and warm sounds.

Each timber gives the drum a different sound, and through the mix of the right ones, each and every drum can give an infinite range of sounds.

However, to create and spread my drums I need your help! Building a handcrafted instrument doesn’t requires only a big amount of time, it requires a lot of money too. To let the people know about my job, and so to let them hear and play on my drums I need to produce them, and to do so I need to expand my lab. I need your contribution to get to my objective!

I’d like to reach the sum of 10.000€ in order to handcraft new drumset and snare, record some professional videos in a recording studio and mostly I need to buy some new equipment for my lab. 

I’d really like to make this my daily work!

An handcrafted instrument is capable to fulfill the desire of each musician!


I take care of each phase of the making of, from the creation of the drum presses.

To create an entire drum set I need 30/40 days, for a snare drum 30 are enough. 

I guarantee each drum for two years, covering them on every aspect regarding any flaw or damage on them, those damage shouldn’t be the result of external factors.

I don’t risk any delay and I’ll send the rewards to the contributors in the least time possible

All perks will be shipped at the end of this campaign.

story:
Stikk Gel Pad

Stikk is a unique double sided thick core gel pad that will stick anything to everything! One single Stikk pad can safely hold any object up-to 350g (12.5oz), want to hold heavier items? Just use more Stikk Pads!

We found that finding ways of temporarily sticking objects to one another or other surfaces was an expensive and frustrating process and for the most part, the options were non-reusable, non-practical, looked bad and felt poor in quality or were simply not effective. 

So thats when it occurred, what we needed was a thin and re-useable small pad that will stick to a huge range of objects, materials and surfaces, without being expensive or ugly, and so Stikk was born. 

Stikk Gel Pad

What we created in Stikk was the ultimate tool in sticking any small items to almost any surface. Stikk measures 7.6cm x 6.2cm x 0.3cm (3 Inches x 2.5 Inches x 0.1 Inches). Stikk is made from our own recipe of injection moulded Poly AB glue Plastic to create a material which is strong, flexible, sticky and re-usable, without being too hard, gluey or too soft like other similar products often are. Stikk can be pulled out to three to four times its size and it will return to its original size every-time. 

After several months of testing we came across a recipe that was the best all rounder. We found favouring some quantities against others did produce either a more durable but less sticky pad, or even a far stronger and sticky pad but far less durable and would last fewer uses. We found the best middle ground, a strong, durable, sticky pad that wasn't too much or too little of anything and was just right for everyday use! 

Stikk is very durable and can be cut into smaller pieces to create smaller gel pads for your smaller sticky needs!

Cut Stikk Into Smaller Pieces

 

How Stikk Works - The Special Stikk Recipe Explained:

Our unique recipe for Stikk involves a simple yet delicate process. The Stikk gel pad is classed as a Polyurethane Gel Elastomer. There are 5 distinct aspects when creating the recipe for Stikk that we had to test in different variables to arrive at the recipe we now have. They are: the Prepolymer material (the 'A' side) and what is called the Curative (the 'B' side) hence the A B glue recipe we mentioned earlier. The prepolymer consists of an isocyanate (or an NCO) that reacts with the hydroxyl (OH) in the curative, which creates the adhesive qualities. The final three aspects and variables are: component temperature, substrate temperature (temperature of the mixture) and post-curing temperature. All the five processes and variables, were tested in as many combinations as we could, to find the best all round gel pad recipe for Stikk. It is a particular combination of all five of those aspects that create Stikk. By applying particular quantities of the prepolymer and the curative at varying temperatures, we found many different styles of adhesive could be made, and so, this is how we eventually came across the recipe for Stikk. 

 

How Can You Use Stikk?

The great thing about Stikk is that you can use it to do almost anything. Stikk can help you in almost every area of your life. Keeping tidy at the office or at work, keeping objects sturdy in your car, holding your phone or tablet on a surface at home to watch a movie or use as a smart home hub, a key holder on your wall, the list is endless. But, to get you started here is some inspiration:

 

Sticking your phone to the outside of the shower to watch the news.

Office wall storage

Watching movies in the bath tub

Correcting paintings and wall hangings

Keeping rugs stable

Car phone holder

Can be cut to make smaller

Stick keys or cards or anything else to your phone

Attaching your phone or tablet to any surface to use a screen or face time at eye level.

Use Stikk to hold your cookbooks, smart tablet, or phones while cooking

Stick office equipment to your wall

Back seat screens for your passengers. 

A way to charge a phone when there is no surface area to hold it.

Stick things to your wall and don't leave any damage!

That doesn't even scratch the surface! The possibilities are endless! How will you use Stikk to transform your life? 

 

Using Stikk

Stikk is an all round great product for solving many everyday issues. Its also incredibly durable and will not damage your wall or car dash board! But as with most products, Stikk does have its limitations and we will explain these and tips on how you can avoid damaging your Stikk or objects and surfaces you use to Stikk with.

Sticking & Removing Stikk from an object or Surface

 To avoid damage to the object and surface that you are sticking to, and to make sure your Stikk pad lasts a long time, we advise using a Twist Then Pull method, as seen in our video. This will reduce the chances of the unlikely event your Stikk pad may damage a surface, object or itself.

Temperature

Stikk works great in almost all temperates, high or low without changing the way it sticks. We do however advise that you reduce usage in extreme temperatures either low or high. For example we would advise that you DO NOT use stick in temperatures bellow -16C (0F) or above 62C (150F). What this means is that Stikk will work in your hot car out in the sun in MOST PLACES in the world and will work outdoors in the cold in MOST cold places. But we advise you use caution in extreme temperatures. Stikk will not melt in high temperatures, but its effectiveness may change.

Weight 

While Stikk is very strong and very durable, we advise caution when using stick. You must use common sense. If you are wanting to stick an iPad or Tablet to a wall for example to watch a film, 1 Stikk pad should hold up with no issues. But using two Stikk pads will ensure security and strength. Environmental situations can play a part in the effectiveness of a Stikk pad. If you live in a hot humid place for example, the surface may be more moist than you think, which will reduce the power of Stikk, so we would advise using two pads, especially on a larger object.    

Surfaces

As a rule of thumb, the smoother and shinier the surface, the better Stikk with hold. Stikk can be very strong on some surfaces while on others it can be very weak, again we advise you use common sense to avoid injury and damage to the objects and surfaces on which you want to hold. 

Cleaning

 The great thing about Stikk is that it is re-useable. But evertime Stikk is removed and re-used it can lose its stickiness and get dirty as dust, dirt and other contaminants get stuck to it. But all you have to do to get your Stikk Gel pad back to its glory is rinse it under warm water. Just run some warm water and hold the Stikk pad under the stream while lightly massaging it, this will help remove and stubborn dirt and dust. Then, once clean, simply leave to air dry on the top of the tap. We suggest not using a towel or drying the washed Stikk pad in anyway other than air drying, to make sure that it regains its strength.

We stress that unless Stikk is washed regularly after being removed from surfaces, Stikk will eventually lose its sticky characteristics due to dust and dirt build up. To avoid this, be sure to wash your Stikk pad(s) regularly to avoid damage and ensure a long life. We also stress that although Stikk can safely hold 350g objects, these figures are found in ideal household conditions. If you are using expensive items, we suggest using two or more Stikk pads, just incase the surface you are sticking to is less than ideal, this will help to reduce the risk of the unlikely occurrence of Stikk coming loose. 

Should you have any issues or concerns after receiving your Stikk pad, we will be happy to hear them, to both, make sure you have a perfect experience using Stikk and so that we can work on any and all short comings (not that there are any ;) that we may have missed during the testing process for our recipe. We are confident that you will all have a great experience with Stikk, but we are here to help should any issues arise. 

We hope you enjoy the idea and uses for Stikk Gel pads and will want to join us on our mission to make them a reality. If you have any questions, just leave them in the comments section so everyone can see and we will make sure to get back to you as soon as we can. 

Thank You all for the support. 

Stikk 

PRESS CONTACT: contact@plus8group.com

 

Disclaimer: Use Stikk with common sense. Do not overload Stikk or use it with heavy objects. The heavier the object, or the more expensive or precious the object, the more Stikk pads you should use to safely hold your object to the surface. Use common sense and judgement when choosing a surface to stick your Stikk pad too, not all surfaces will have the same strength capabilities as others and the same goes with materials of the objects you want to stick. Stick, Plus 8 and any related persons or groups are not liable in anyway for any damage to your belongings, surfaces or self when using Stikk. 

Returns: Should you receive your Stikk Pad in less than perfect condition, you may contact us for a free replacement. We will be happy to work with all of our backers to resolve any and all issues that they have, should any arise. However, Since this is a crowdfunding campaign and we are offering Stikk as a pre-order in the form of a reward for your financial contribution rather than as a retail item, we do not have a return policy, we cannot give returns or refunds due to change of mind, misuse, damaged items due to misuse or damage to products used with Stikk or any other reason other than your Stikk arriving in a condition that will prevent you from using it. We believe that none of our customers will have issues with Stikk, but we are here to help at the best of our ability should you need any support at all! 

INSTAGRAM - COMING SOON
story_txt:
Stikk Gel Pad
Stikk is a unique double sided thick core gel pad that will stick anything to everything! One single Stikk pad can safely hold any object up-to 350g (12.5oz), want to hold heavier items? Just use more Stikk Pads!
We found that finding ways of temporarily sticking objects to one another or other surfaces was an expensive and frustrating process and for the most part, the options were non-reusable, non-practical, looked bad and felt poor in quality or were simply not effective. 
So thats when it occurred, what we needed was a thin and re-useable small pad that will stick to a huge range of objects, materials and surfaces, without being expensive or ugly, and so Stikk was born. 
Stikk Gel Pad

What we created in Stikk was the ultimate tool in sticking any small items to almost any surface. Stikk measures 7.6cm x 6.2cm x 0.3cm (3 Inches x 2.5 Inches x 0.1 Inches). Stikk is made from our own recipe of injection moulded Poly AB glue Plastic to create a material which is strong, flexible, sticky and re-usable, without being too hard, gluey or too soft like other similar products often are. Stikk can be pulled out to three to four times its size and it will return to its original size every-time. 

After several months of testing we came across a recipe that was the best all rounder. We found favouring some quantities against others did produce either a more durable but less sticky pad, or even a far stronger and sticky pad but far less durable and would last fewer uses. We found the best middle ground, a strong, durable, sticky pad that wasn't too much or too little of anything and was just right for everyday use! 
Stikk is very durable and can be cut into smaller pieces to create smaller gel pads for your smaller sticky needs!

Cut Stikk Into Smaller Pieces

 
How Stikk Works - The Special Stikk Recipe Explained:
Our unique recipe for Stikk involves a simple yet delicate process. The Stikk gel pad is classed as a Polyurethane Gel Elastomer. There are 5 distinct aspects when creating the recipe for Stikk that we had to test in different variables to arrive at the recipe we now have. They are: the Prepolymer material (the 'A' side) and what is called the Curative (the 'B' side) hence the A B glue recipe we mentioned earlier. The prepolymer consists of an isocyanate (or an NCO) that reacts with the hydroxyl (OH) in the curative, which creates the adhesive qualities. The final three aspects and variables are: component temperature, substrate temperature (temperature of the mixture) and post-curing temperature. All the five processes and variables, were tested in as many combinations as we could, to find the best all round gel pad recipe for Stikk. It is a particular combination of all five of those aspects that create Stikk. By applying particular quantities of the prepolymer and the curative at varying temperatures, we found many different styles of adhesive could be made, and so, this is how we eventually came across the recipe for Stikk. 
 
How Can You Use Stikk?
The great thing about Stikk is that you can use it to do almost anything. Stikk can help you in almost every area of your life. Keeping tidy at the office or at work, keeping objects sturdy in your car, holding your phone or tablet on a surface at home to watch a movie or use as a smart home hub, a key holder on your wall, the list is endless. But, to get you started here is some inspiration:
 
Sticking your phone to the outside of the shower to watch the news.
Office wall storage
Watching movies in the bath tub
Correcting paintings and wall hangings
Keeping rugs stable
Car phone holder
Can be cut to make smaller
Stick keys or cards or anything else to your phone
Attaching your phone or tablet to any surface to use a screen or face time at eye level.
Use Stikk to hold your cookbooks, smart tablet, or phones while cooking
Stick office equipment to your wall
Back seat screens for your passengers. 
A way to charge a phone when there is no surface area to hold it.
Stick things to your wall and don't leave any damage!
That doesn't even scratch the surface! The possibilities are endless! How will you use Stikk to transform your life? 

 













Using Stikk
Stikk is an all round great product for solving many everyday issues. Its also incredibly durable and will not damage your wall or car dash board! But as with most products, Stikk does have its limitations and we will explain these and tips on how you can avoid damaging your Stikk or objects and surfaces you use to Stikk with.

Sticking & Removing Stikk from an object or Surface
 To avoid damage to the object and surface that you are sticking to, and to make sure your Stikk pad lasts a long time, we advise using a Twist Then Pull method, as seen in our video. This will reduce the chances of the unlikely event your Stikk pad may damage a surface, object or itself.
Temperature
Stikk works great in almost all temperates, high or low without changing the way it sticks. We do however advise that you reduce usage in extreme temperatures either low or high. For example we would advise that you DO NOT use stick in temperatures bellow -16C (0F) or above 62C (150F). What this means is that Stikk will work in your hot car out in the sun in MOST PLACES in the world and will work outdoors in the cold in MOST cold places. But we advise you use caution in extreme temperatures. Stikk will not melt in high temperatures, but its effectiveness may change.
Weight 
While Stikk is very strong and very durable, we advise caution when using stick. You must use common sense. If you are wanting to stick an iPad or Tablet to a wall for example to watch a film, 1 Stikk pad should hold up with no issues. But using two Stikk pads will ensure security and strength. Environmental situations can play a part in the effectiveness of a Stikk pad. If you live in a hot humid place for example, the surface may be more moist than you think, which will reduce the power of Stikk, so we would advise using two pads, especially on a larger object.    
Surfaces
As a rule of thumb, the smoother and shinier the surface, the better Stikk with hold. Stikk can be very strong on some surfaces while on others it can be very weak, again we advise you use common sense to avoid injury and damage to the objects and surfaces on which you want to hold. 
Cleaning
 The great thing about Stikk is that it is re-useable. But evertime Stikk is removed and re-used it can lose its stickiness and get dirty as dust, dirt and other contaminants get stuck to it. But all you have to do to get your Stikk Gel pad back to its glory is rinse it under warm water. Just run some warm water and hold the Stikk pad under the stream while lightly massaging it, this will help remove and stubborn dirt and dust. Then, once clean, simply leave to air dry on the top of the tap. We suggest not using a towel or drying the washed Stikk pad in anyway other than air drying, to make sure that it regains its strength.


We stress that unless Stikk is washed regularly after being removed from surfaces, Stikk will eventually lose its sticky characteristics due to dust and dirt build up. To avoid this, be sure to wash your Stikk pad(s) regularly to avoid damage and ensure a long life. We also stress that although Stikk can safely hold 350g objects, these figures are found in ideal household conditions. If you are using expensive items, we suggest using two or more Stikk pads, just incase the surface you are sticking to is less than ideal, this will help to reduce the risk of the unlikely occurrence of Stikk coming loose. 
Should you have any issues or concerns after receiving your Stikk pad, we will be happy to hear them, to both, make sure you have a perfect experience using Stikk and so that we can work on any and all short comings (not that there are any ;) that we may have missed during the testing process for our recipe. We are confident that you will all have a great experience with Stikk, but we are here to help should any issues arise. 
We hope you enjoy the idea and uses for Stikk Gel pads and will want to join us on our mission to make them a reality. If you have any questions, just leave them in the comments section so everyone can see and we will make sure to get back to you as soon as we can. 
Thank You all for the support. 
Stikk 
PRESS CONTACT: contact@plus8group.com
 

Disclaimer: Use Stikk with common sense. Do not overload Stikk or use it with heavy objects. The heavier the object, or the more expensive or precious the object, the more Stikk pads you should use to safely hold your object to the surface. Use common sense and judgement when choosing a surface to stick your Stikk pad too, not all surfaces will have the same strength capabilities as others and the same goes with materials of the objects you want to stick. Stick, Plus 8 and any related persons or groups are not liable in anyway for any damage to your belongings, surfaces or self when using Stikk. 
Returns: Should you receive your Stikk Pad in less than perfect condition, you may contact us for a free replacement. We will be happy to work with all of our backers to resolve any and all issues that they have, should any arise. However, Since this is a crowdfunding campaign and we are offering Stikk as a pre-order in the form of a reward for your financial contribution rather than as a retail item, we do not have a return policy, we cannot give returns or refunds due to change of mind, misuse, damaged items due to misuse or damage to products used with Stikk or any other reason other than your Stikk arriving in a condition that will prevent you from using it. We believe that none of our customers will have issues with Stikk, but we are here to help at the best of our ability should you need any support at all!

story:
You can always use FIDGETPEN :

* in your office (workplace) to lower stress,

* at dentist helps You forget about the pain,

* in shopping line to relax ,

* in classroom for silent fidgeting , 

* in your living home just for fun and relaxing

Why is fidgeting spoken negatively ?

It's often marked as dysfunction and shown as none-intellectual behavior.

But in modern world, the opposite has been proven to be the case. 

Below are just some of external resources to learn more about this behavior:

The Science Of Why We Fidget While We Work

Why Do We Fidget?

Fidgeting may help children think and perform in school

It is suggested that look at fidgeting is about to change.

Fidgeting should no longer be behavior to be marked as inappropriate. 

There should be no limits when and how you use FidgetPen.

- You can use it while studying for test. 

- Use it before job interview to lower stress. 

- Use it to forget about pain while at dentist.

- Use FIDGETPEN at your home or at office working on numerous projects.

- Use FIDGETPEN in shopping mall while waiting in the line for pay.

After hundreds of prototypes we spend calculating and proving right size for FidgetPen we have got it. Right size that fits in every pocket, every handbag and fits perfectly in hand for both (childer and adults).

WHERE DOES OUR BASE WOOD COME FROM ?

Slovenia is located in heart of European Alps .

Base for FIDGETPEN is made out of 1st class spruce tree under the Alps.

With Fidgetpen you are holding part of Alps in your hand.

It is natural, handmade with love and passion.

WHY ARE WE BETTER ?

Above answer this - our base is made out of real natural wood. Enough said. Back to nature.

+ not 2 FIDGETPENS will be same . Every piece will be handmade and therefore unique.

+ our promise is - no mass production will occur for this reason - Your FidgetPen will be unique

Wood is only once painted with natural base transparent colour. 

 

INTERNATIONAL BACKERS - shipping and app. delivery time :

all DEC 2016 backers should receive FIDGETPEN no longer than 23th December by Christmas

EU and Europe countries shall receive their FIDGETPENS in beg. Dec, US and Canada about middle Dec.

We will do our best that we will ship out more distanced countries first.

All that stands for DEC 2016 batch.

Please be aware that we can not take responsibility for Post delays that are not in our control (like custom or flight delays, strikes, package lost etc.)

PRECAUTION about FIDGETPEN 

It will definitely not be allowed in manuals under the age of 3 or 8 in some countries.

Please be aware that some size, clicker colours, (colour and/or shape of wood )fluctuations can be achieved due to natural wood base and hand finished of our product !

Questions?

Send us a message or post a comment and we'll get back to you with an answer.

Feedback?

Feel free to contact us .

International Backers

This project isn't just for backers in Europe. We'll be shipping FidgetPen free! worldwide ! Airplane priority signed for mail !

That being said, Please note that there is no way for us to cover any additional amount on our end for any applicable VAT or custom duties that may be a result of a specific country's local tax law. Therefore, these fees may be incurred upon receipt of your reward. These fees are the responsibility of each backer, and additional information regarding VAT/duties can be found in our FAQ below.

Some Final Thoughts.

Am I in A Hurry to decide ?

It is up to every individual but :

we have projected only 20 days timeline for project to be live and have strong limited our DEC 2016 deliveries that everybody will be served in time. 

Production will start as soon as we eventually hit 5000 USD goal (app 300 sold FIDGETPENS) -and will start shipping by end of November.

I DONT TRUST YOU - Where is Slovenia ?

Slovenia is a democratic republic, located in the heart of Europe, member of EU, NATO and in EUR zone.

We're IUNIQUE team, Rebeka and Bostjan that make unique designs for our backers.

REWARDS :

When ordering 5 or more FIDGETPENS you can send us your simple logo or word in png or jpg file (max size 550 x 220 pixels) - it will be engraved similar as photo.

If we hit 50.000 USD we will add FREE carrying pouch to all our backers (value of 5 USD).

Further Reward coming all the way up. - stay tuned .

Help us rolling story and You will get additional rewards all the way. And we will continue making great innovations in future to come.

Risks and challenges

Please keep in mind, FidgetPen contains small parts and will definitely not be recommended for children under the age of 8 or 3 in some countries. But most likely we will stamp instructions manual with not suitable for children under the age of 15.  More details may be provided at a later date, before FidgetPen ships out.

This is not our first gig. We have been part of self-developed project before in our country. Like most creators out there, we are not machines and can make mistakes. But what's most important, we learned a lot from our previous projects and we will use this knowledge to make FIDGETPEN product as perfect as possible.

Making a small hand crafted wood product is not an easy task, but we have sourced and have put in the time to make as many prototypes as possible (to tell more, over 100 prototypes were handmade and hundreds of hours put into project. Endless sleepless night thinking out best possible product solution.

Our manufacturing process is set up and prepared so we are confident we will be able to keep our promise and deliver the first batch production (DEC 16) before Christmas (December 23.th 2016 worldwide (except some countries in Africa and some more risk or in war countries (like Iraq, Syria, Nigeria etc) that we will not ship to).

There is always risk of delays. We promise that we will honestly communicate with our backers if things don't go exactly like planned.

We are sure you will ❤ our FidgetPen. It is not just pen, it is multi-purpose wood base FidgetPen.

Making a small hand crafted wood product is not an easy task, but we have sourced and have put in the time to make as many prototypes as possible (to tell more, over 100 prototypes were handmade and hundreds of hours put into project. Endless sleepless night thinking out best possible product solution.

story:
Short Summary

Andrea Lopez, native of Brooklyn NY is a fashion designer and pet care specialist. In 2001 she pursued her passion and studied fashion design at Wood Tobe Coburn in New York City. After nine years of being in the industry, she found a new passion with animals and pursued opportunities in the pet care business.

Ms. Lopez continued to develop her hands on experience of operating the pet care business and in 2013 she opened her pet spa. She fused her fashion expertise and newly found pet industry knowledge to build a business where she can provide care services and custom clothing for pets. She developed a brand known as ANALLO Pet Couture. She believes that pets should be as fashionable as their human or dressed even better. 

Her reason for starting a pet clothing line is because she loves designing, wants to see pet fashion evolve onto the runway, magazines, and sold in more stores. She believes in using better quality and securely constructing it so its durable enough to last for years to come. Her tasteful designs are cheek, trendy, and edgy. Ms. Lopez believes she can change up the game in the pet clothing industry but she needs your help.

Having the ability to express her creativity and bring other people's ideas to life is amazing. Anallo sets a fashion statement that allows your pet to be unique and while he or she struts down the streets everyone will gravitate towards them. What does your pet's fashion say about you?

What We Need & What You Get
In order to make this brand come to life funding is needed. All contributions will go towards the start up of Anallo Pet Couture. All designs that are already created were funded from our own resources. 

The $10,000 raised will mostly further marketing efforts including: 
* Retail space
* Patent fees
* Legal fees
* Production
* Grommet punching machine
* Computerized embroidery machine

*Computer programs
*Photo shoots 

* Materials & trims (all that is needed to design)

*Mold creations (metal buckles and trims with logo engraved)

* Advertising (website hosting fees, ad space, exposure within community)

* Marketing (business cards, woven labels, hangtags, expenses)

In exchange for your contribution we have some perks that you and your pet will enjoy. Discounted items with the choice of a few other perks including exclusive access to our next photo shoot!

The Impact

While fashion is the number one statement, the main focus of Anallo is making sure that the garment is durable, made with good quality fabrics and is made specifically to fit your pet. Pet clothing of the past has its standard body size but in today's world we know that not all pets are built the same. This in itself presents many challenges such as trying to find a jacket that fits around the neck or stomach while covering the body length. Custom clothing is the best option for your pet. Here at Anallo Pet Couture, rest assured that a lot of time and detail has been put into each design to guarantee that you and your pet will be satisfied. 

Risks & Challenges

As you know, starting any business can be very expensive. Online shopping is the way to shop but it still takes a lot to make this happen. We have put everything we have into some of the development but to make this a success, we need a good starting inventory. Not having all supplies needed Being able to fund the high demand for the product without proper funding is a risk that we want to avoid.

Challenges: we want to continue to deliver a high standard of customer service and quality products that surpasses expectation. While experiencing high consumer demand we do not want to be underfunded.

Capitalization and good management skills is the proper way to decrease the risks and challenges. Our focus is on consumer connection, one of a kind designs and quality as well as timely delivery.

Other Ways You Can Help

Without a doubt, the most powerful way you can help bring Anallo Pet Couture to life is through word of mouth. We ask that you spread the word with friends and family. Share our website, purchase some unique clothing, re-post to Instagram, Facebook, Twitter, and don't forget to tag and hastag #AnalloPetCouture. Post your pictures to our social media and show how much your pet loves Anallo. The more people who know about this campaign, the closer we get to making this dream a reality.


Indiegogo's fee of $1,000 out of the $10,000:

The remaining $1,000 will be reserved for Indigogo's 9% fee.

story:
Introducing the MBI MatchBook...

8 ultra-miniature flashlights, each the size of a match, in a conveniently cool matchbook style holder.
  • The worlds smallest production flashlight
  • Waterproof and fully submersible
  • Convenient magnetic base makes them easy to stick around
  • The LED tint is available in a variety of colors (White, Red, Green)
  •  So small you can keep several in your wallet for emergencies
  • So light, you can take a whole pack camping and have 64hrs of light
  • Runtime of each matchlight is approximately 8 hours


















About the matchlights

The battery is a lithium tube type battery, 3mm in diameter and approximately 20mm long.

There's a small 3mmx3mm neodymium magnet adhered to the bottom of the battery, which is then coated with a plastic-rubber sheath (coating) for extra protection and to ensure the magnet stays firmly attached.

The LED/Switch mechanism is more or less permanently attached to the battery. With enough force, you could remove it however the battery does account for a significant portion of the product cost so for the first version at least, although the battery is not replaceable, extra matchlights will be available (without the matchbook) for supporters wanting some spares.


As the infamous saying goes, the best flashlight is the one you have with you. At this size, you can keep them just about anywhere, in any thing, for all manner of emergencies. They are easy to switch on, with just one hand (though switching off will take two) and as they are fully waterproof, you can use them in the worst of weather conditions and know they'll just work.


About the matchbook

Similar in appearance and size to common matchbooks containing real matches, the MBI MatchBook will be created from water repellent card stock but inside, at the base, there will be a plastic holder containing magnets, which will keep each matchlight held in place.


Manufacturing

(see my track record below - "previous achievements")

Having worked on multiple iterations of this Matchbook over the past 24 months, I'm confident in being able to produce and deliver the MBI Matchbook at a standard of high quality and at a scale capable of exceeding the demands of this campaign.

Risks at scale 

At present, the only issue pending confirmation at mass production is measuring the amount of tolerance (variance) in the vertical alignment of the printed logo on the Matchlights (specifically the words "MBI" on the black sheath/cover). 

The logo printing happens before the Matchlights are assembled. During the final adhesion/fastening process there is some natural tolerance (variance of mm) in the exact placement height of the printed logo on a finished Matchlight. Whilst this has no effect at all on the function, I'm very picky when it comes to aesthetics and so if the time required at mass production to ensure perfectly aligned logos has a significant impact on cost, I may opt to produce the Matchlights with no logo printed on the matchlights themselves. 


F.A.Q.

What colors are available? 
Matchlights will be available in the following packages:
7x Red, 1x White
7x Green, 1x White
7x White, 1x Red

How can I select my color? 
Approximately 1 month after the campaign ends, you'll receive an email with a link to choose your color package. If you don't choose a color, the default package will contain 7x Red, 1x White.

Will any other colors/packages be available? 
Possibly as a stretch goal.

Can you ship internationally?
Yes. There is a flat rate shipping fee of $7.50 to anywhere in the world.

Can I track my package?
Yes. The shipping method is "Registered International Airmail" and typically takes 10-14 days to most destinations around the world. You will receive a tracking number and link to a tracking page when your order has shipped.

What if my address changes? 
No problem :) About 14 days before shipping, you will receive an email to let you know your order is being prepared and you'll have a chance to update all relevant details at that time.

When will it ship? 
Orders will be fulfilled during July 2016.

Can I replace the battery?
Short answer, no. (not yet... see below). 
This is something I am working on (and I think I have it figured out) but honestly it's going to take some custom molds and tooling along with some more prototyping iterations, and with a minimum funding target in the vicinity of $70,000+ to make it commercially viable. So with this first version (an MVP - minimum viable product), my goal is to establish your trust, deliver the product as promised, and gage the true demand. To do that well and on time, I have to start at step 1 (the MVP), reduce and eliminate every conceivable manufacturing risk and then, as with every product I've created to date, iterate and enhance (I'm always actively looking to improve).

Can this replace my regular flashlight?
Most likely not (unless you don't have one to begin with). The matchlights are not going to be anywhere near as bright as a flashlight using a larger battery. They do produce light, and that can be useful in an emergency when the only alternative is dark. 

What do I do with them when the battery runs out?
They make great little fridge magnets for holding memos, and work well on tactical coaching boards too. You can also send them to me and I'll be happy to recycle them in the most responsible manner. You can of course keep them, as a souvenir/trophy of sorts of our version 1 matchlight.



More About me

Hi Indiegogo, I'm Guy from MBI - MatchBox Instruments and I'm very excited to share this project with you. You can learn more about my work at www.matchboxinstruments.com and you'll find links to some of my more complex long term (in development) projects hosted at candlepowerfxorums.

My story as a product designer
I've been designing, building and selling exotic flashlights for the last 5 years as a very successful hobby, and I've had an immense passion for light since I was a young kid.
Based in Japan, I have several existing hobby projects in development where I'm quite transparent regarding the process, sharing the trials and challenges publicly, along with the companionship, advice and feedback of a very knowledgable and passionate community of supporters, all of which is publicly viewable (links below). 

Previous achievements

I'll admit to being a perfectionist and stickler for small details, often times spending months (sometimes years) to get something right before I release it. Here are some external reviews/references for some of my previous designs, ranked by many as the best in their class.

http://bit.ly/EDC-HFR (short review, 2nd flashlight on the page, MatchBoxInstruments HF-R)
http://bit.ly/HF-edc-review (full review of the HF/R series flashlights)
http://bit.ly/mbi-coreti-review (full review of pendant light)
http://bit.ly/mbi_at_cpf (the MBI subforum at candlepowerforums where much of my product development story is journaled)


My challenge
Whilst I'm very fortunate to have a modest, yet dedicated following for my creations, I'm always challenged to meet the demand for my new products that to date have been machined in controlled,  micro-batches, with the final assembly, packaging and fulfillment all handled by me personally. This often means may consecutive late nights, working into the wee hours, to get as many products out to my supporters as I'm able to create. Of course, with that approach, there is a finite limit to capacity.
Many of my existing products have waiting lists, usually selling out entirely, just shortly after their release, and as the number of my creations grow, cashflow becomes a limiting factor in terms of how many products I can develop or release at the same time. 

My Ambition
I sincerely want to be able to share my creations with all those who want them which means I'm going to need some hired help along with some larger scale automation in assembly and fullfillment, but for that to make sense economically, I need to exceed the minimum volume thresholds by where the project becomes feasible. This is where we can help each other.
I've chosen the MBI MatchBook as my first Indiegogo product because the challenge to bring this to market, is only one of volume and scale. I can already manufacture these in small batches (as could you) but without automation, the process is very very time consuming and ends up being very expensive (because as with most hand made items, time is often the largest cost).
As many of my followers know, I have several more products that I plan to share so ensuring my first Indiegogo project is on time and successful is a critical and important step on the MBI roadmap. After 5 years of R&D on a broad variety of flashlight related products and manufacturing, I believe I'm well organized and capable of delivering the MBI MatchBook at a high standard of quality and execution and I'm grateful for your support.

You can help by spreading the word

Chances are, if you've read this far, you appreciate cool things. I'm betting that means you have friends who'd also love to find out about this too so please share this campaign with your friends and extended friends and both they and I will thank you. 


Please donate just 1 click of your time

or share this url:
http://igg.me/at/matchbook

IN THE PRESS


Thanks so much for reading this far, go ahead and choose a perk now before they are all gone and I look forward to sharing regular progress updates between now and until it's time to ship.

Sincerely,

Guy@MBI

story:
About us !

With a degree in fashion design & a passion for shopping, we we're never truly satisfied with our purchases. Straps & skirts that are too long, cups that are too small and overall clothing that just wasn’t properly adjusted are some of the main elements which we we're tired of seeing. From these imperfections we established our philosophy & created clothing that fit our standards as designers. M&V was created to offer clothing that women search for but are never able to find in stores. We offer the indescribable "je ne sais quoi" that can only be understood by throwing on a dress that fits perfectly with a feminine touch. M&V Collection is looking to satisfy the needs and wants that only a woman can understand when it comes to clothing. Thus making our mission & motto “Designs created for women by real women".  We create all of our styles based on actual trends, they are not a cheap copy of a big popular brand.

We are offering you designer clothing at affordable prices.


Why we need your help?

Our goal is to raise 10 000$ CAD.  The money will help us to:
1 - Create a new collection for Spring/Summer 2015, with more styles, different fabrics and various colors and sizes.
2 - Any additional funds that we raised will go toward marketing and roll-out of M&V Collection brand for future collections.
We already have a whole future planned for M&V Collection.  We need your help to be able to achieve those goals.

Other Ways You Can Help Us

Remember you can always help us by:
1 - Share, share and share again ! Make noise about us !
2 - Visit our website and buy some dresses (www.collectionmv.com)
3 - Like us on Facebook and share it on your personal page
4 - Follow us on Instagram (mv_inc)

story:
UKKO - charge with style

Ukko is the only handmade charging-station for your devices that was designed from scratch to be beautiful and act as a display-holder too.

Ukko has been designed and manufactured in South-Tyrol, where craftsmanship has a long tradition. 

MORE THAN A CHARGER

Ukko acts as display-holder and helps to clean Up the Bird's Nest of Cables. One handcrafted object to charge all your devices.
This means you can charge your tablet, phone, camera, e-reader, ...

THERE IS A UKKO FOR EVERYONE

Wood: nut, larch, swiss stone pine.

Metal: aluminium, made to last forever. Silver, blue or black.


WHY WE LOVE UKKKO

  • it charges two devices simultaneously
  • it is also a display-stand
  • it is portable
  • it is handmade
  • it reminds you to charge
  • it is great to tidy up the cables
  • it simply makes sense

TECHNICAL SPECS

  • 12000mAh
  • 500+ cycles
  • Input: 5V/1000mA
  • Output 1: 5V/1000mA
  • Output 2: 5V/2100mA
  • USB-A to Micro-USB cable. 2 cables included


Find more informations about ukko at:
www.chargewithstyle.com

Ukko is a registred trademark of
MIDE - Mobile Ideas
Via Rosmini, 44
39100 Bolzano (BZ)
Italy

info@ukko.mobi

story:
We were too! That’s why we created Fyre, the first fashion friendly heated apparel line to date. No matter where or when the cold strikes Fyre will be there for you, ready to rev up and keep you warm, all while letting you maintain your own personal style.

Have you ever thought about getting a heated jacket to keep you warm during the winter but didn’t want to sacrifice looks for functionality? You’ll wear the same winter coat practically the whole season so why not pick the one YOU want. Fyre will hide discretely under whatever overcoat you choose to keep you warm regardless of the fashion state you want to make!

 

The places you can use Fyre are endless. Just put it on and let it bring the heat whenever you need it most. Use Fyre:

 

Fyre will use extremely thin and flexible carbon heating fibers that ensure an even distribution of heat that you will feel as a nice warm hug, all day long. These fibers are hair thin and are machine-washable meaning you’ll be able to throw Fyre in with your other clothing after removing the battery alone.

Fyre will also have a built-in microprocessor controller that is able to easily detect desired ambient temperature and adjust the voltage of Fyre’s energy output accordingly. Fyre then cycles its temperature output on and off in short intervals to ensure the user’s body is kept exactly where they have set it to. This temperature cycling is smart and adaptive allowing it to react to even the most drastic swings in environmental temperatures. This efficient system of smart-temperature cycling means Fyre will never be too hot and won’t force you to spend time fiddling with controls just to get it to a temperature you are happy with.

Fyre produces the bulk of its heat on the back and chest areas where the body’s temperature is most efficiently regulated. That being said, with Fyre’s insolating fabric the warmth will also be passed on to the rest of your body efficiently as well.

 

Fyre features an ultra-lightweight, rechargeable 6000mAh battery that can easily power Fyre for hours without needing a charge. Fyre’s battery is tucked seamless into your hoodie or cardigan pocket where you can easily access it to swap it out or to connect it with your smartphone to charge it discretely!

It’s never a bad idea to have an extra Fyre battery on hand either since you can use it to keep your electronics fully juiced or to get even more heating time out of Fyre. Fyre’s battery is the perfect balance of sleekness, functionality and practicality.

 

Fyre’s app is super-smart while keeping as much control in the hands of Fyre’s built in microprocessor system as possible. You won’t have to constantly play around with the Fyre app just to set Fyre to the temperature you feel comfortable at since the hardware does this for you. That being said, our personal temperature preferences change from day to day and even during the day so when you need to use the Fyre app the experience is made as seemless as possible with voice commands and super simple adjustment controls to make Fyre easy to adjust, even while wearing big ol’ winter mittens.

 

 

In essence, Fyre is the perfect balance of style and functionality and is designed for all season, dynamic use. Other lines function well but look awful or force you to adopt a style that isn’t “you”. Other’s may look decent but functionality tends to suffer. And, nearly all competitors are focused on keeping you warm during winter whereas Fyre is designed to turn on whenever and wherever it is needed, 24/7 and 365 days a year.

Fyre’s design features:

Fyre’s internal thermostat control system really shines when it comes to saving energy. Not only will it use its own energy economically but Fyre can also help save you real dollars on your energy bill too. And, when your boss is trying to save energy by keeping the office freezing, Fyre will also have your back then!

 

Our sizes are in line with North American shirt sizing for males and females. Don't fret about your sizes just yet, we will be collecting all sizing at the end of the campaign through surveys and will make sure everyone is 100% clear on the sizing information then. If your size is above or below our sizing chart and you have doubts as to whether we will be offering it, please feel free to shoot us a message so we can make confirm things for you. In most cases, we should be able to accommodate you!

As far as colors we are only offering black cardigans and hoodies at the beginning of our campaign. That being said, we will be sending out surveys to our early backers to get feedback on what colors they want to see made available. We might announce a few of these top-voted colors later in the campaign.

 

If you support us with a pledge you'll have the exclusive opportunity to get your very own Fyre clothing at a fraction of the projected retail price and before the rest of the world. We’re working to bring Fyre from prototype stage to the manufacturing, and although the pathway is clear for our experienced engineering team, we don't have the resources to complete that journey without your help!

 

With your generous support and feedback we’ll be able to make Fyre affordable and accessible to everyone. By joining us today you’ll get be the first to get this amazing line of clothing and help create the spark needed to get Fyre to the end of its journey. So don’t wait. Your chance to reserve your first batch Fyre hoodie or cardigan reward is fading fast. Let Fyre’s great looking apparel items keep you warm, happy, and productive next winter and forever after!

This crowdfunding so everyone likes a little risk mitigation. The Fyre engineering team’s qualifications will help ensure Fyre has the best possible minds behind completing its R and D and getting it made. Here are some of the amazing Product Development and Manufacturing specialist behind Fyre:

Our team is extremely passionate about Fyre and is absolutely thrilled at the opportunity to make the Fyre project a massive success for all of our backers.

 

 

Projected delivery before Christmas, 2017!

 

FAQ Section

You won’t have to constantly play around with the Fyre app just to set Fyre to the temperature you feel comfortable at since the hardware does this for you. That being said, our personal temperature preferences change from day to day and even during the day so when you need to use the Fyre app the experience is made as seemless as possible with voice commands and super simple adjustment controls to make Fyre easy to adjust, even while wearing big ol’ winter mittens.  In essence, Fyre is the perfect balance of style and functionality and is designed for all season, dynamic use. Other lines function well but look awful or force you to adopt a style that isn’t “you”. Other’s may look decent but functionality tends to suffer. And, nearly all competitors are focused on keeping you warm during winter whereas Fyre is designed to turn on whenever and wherever it is needed, 24/7 and 365 days a year.Fyre’s design features:Fyre’s internal thermostat control system really shines when it comes to saving energy. Not only will it use its own energy economically but Fyre can also help save you real dollars on your energy bill too. And, when your boss is trying to save energy by keeping the office freezing, Fyre will also have your back then! Our sizes are in line with North American shirt sizing for males and females. Don't fret about your sizes just yet, we will be collecting all sizing at the end of the campaign through surveys and will make sure everyone is 100% clear on the sizing information then. If your size is above or below our sizing chart and you have doubts as to whether we will be offering it, please feel free to shoot us a message so we can make confirm things for you. In most cases, we should be able to accommodate you!As far as colors we are only offering black cardigans and hoodies at the beginning of our campaign. That being said, we will be sending out surveys to our early backers to get feedback on what colors they want to see made available. We might announce a few of these top-voted colors later in the campaign. If you support us with a pledge you'll have the exclusive opportunity to get your very own Fyre clothing at a fraction of the projected retail price and before the rest of the world. We’re working to bring Fyre from prototype stage to the manufacturing, and although the pathway is clear for our experienced engineering team, we don't have the resources to complete that journey without your help! With your generous support and feedback we’ll be able to make Fyre affordable and accessible to everyone. By joining us today you’ll get be the first to get this amazing line of clothing and help create the spark needed to get Fyre to the end of its journey. So don’t wait. Your chance to reserve your first batch Fyre hoodie or cardigan reward is fading fast. Let Fyre’s great looking apparel items keep you warm, happy, and productive next winter and forever after!This crowdfunding so everyone likes a little risk mitigation. The Fyre engineering team’s qualifications will help ensure Fyre has the best possible minds behind completing its R and D and getting it made. Here are some of the amazing Product Development and Manufacturing specialist behind Fyre:Our team is extremely passionate about Fyre and is absolutely thrilled at the opportunity to make the Fyre project a massive success for all of our backers.  Projected delivery before Christmas, 2017! FAQ Section

story:
NEWS UPDATE – 02/25/2020
We are fully funded and production is complete! We are happy to let you know that our products have shipped and are on their way to you.

We're making one final push for extra units we are making for our online shop. This week is your last chance to buy. We only have limited units remaining so buy now before it's too late. Chat us if you have any questions.

Thank you for your support and we look forward to launching this new collection with you. Please follow along on our channels to see our products in the world.

#About Us

          












[Quick Links]
Features — Materials — Press — Categories — Colors — Sizing — Compare — Reviews — Timeline — About Us — Perks — FAQ — Shipping — Share

#FAQ 

FAQ

What are the dimensions of the Bags?
For all bag sizes see our diagram here Sizing.

What sizes of laptops can fit in the Bags?
The Small Bags fit up to 13" laptops. The Large Bags fit up to 15" laptops.

How do I choose options like colors, materials, and sizes of the bag(s)?
At the end of the campaign, we will ask you to fill out a survey to select your color, material, and size before we produce your bag.

Does the bag come with a strap?
Yes. The Briefcase and Satchel come with a detachable padded strap. The cushion on the strap is also detachable. Below is a picture.

 

What are your stretch goal rewards?
As the campaign grows, we will unlock special rewards:

- If the campaign hits $10k, we will add a Key Loop for each perk.
- If the campaign hits $20k, we will include an option to choose an updated Hardware Logo.
- If the campaign hits $50k, each main bag will get an additional Free Portable Battery Pack.

What is your refund policy?
You may request a refund from Indiegogo until the campaign ends. Because these bags are made to order, the campaign closes you will not be eligible for the refund.

Can I return or exchange after I receive the perk?
The bags and perks will be custom-made based on your survey choices. Unfortunately, we cannot offer a return or exchange for custom-made products.

Do you provide a warranty and repair for your products?
Yes! The Apollo Collection bags (like any Haerfest branded products) are warranted to the original owner against manufacturing functional defects and workmanship for the lifetime of the product. To request the repair under warranty, please visit our website for further details.


Where can I contact if I have any questions?
If you have any questions or need our assistance, please contact us at SHOP@HAERFEST.COM

#Shipping

  
Shipping

Where do you ship?
We offer flat-rate domestic shipping, $19 for bags and $9 for other perks, to anywhere in the US. The cost of international shipping (outside the US) is $69 for bags and $19 for other perks. Please note that customs clearance is different in every country and that you may be charged additional fees or tariffs on top of the shipping charges. Our prices DO NOT include VAT, GST, equivalent taxes and customs/duties. These additional charges are the responsibility of the receiver.

*We do not ship to P.O. boxes, APO/FPO, Hotel Rooms or any Temporary Addresses.

Please check below for the cost of our flat-rate shipping.

How much is the shipping?

Domestic (Continental USA)
$19 for Bags
$9 for Smart Pouch and Portable Battery Pack

International (Non-US)
$69 for Bags
$19 for Smart Pouch and Portable Battery Pack

Non-US Customers: Do your prices include VAT/duties?
Our prices DO NOT include VAT, GST or other duties and taxes. If your shipping address is outside the U.S., we would like you to acknowledge customs/duties may be charged depending upon the country in which you reside. We are not responsible for the payment of such duties. We cannot mark the perks as a gift or claim lower values to reduce/avoid customs/duties.

When we start shipping?
We plan to ship the perks in January 2020. Please note that the actual shipping dates may vary. We will keep you updated on our progress and the expected delivery date of your perk. 

Why order now?
By backing now, you will be among the first to experience the Haerfest Apollo Collection, Bags for New Era of Work. Plus, you will get exclusive access to the Early Bird Deals, that are more than 50% off the retail price.  

 

Risks & Challenges

This is not our first rodeo; we've been running an efficient operation for 8+ years strong. We've already completed and finalized prototyping and our manufacturers are ready to go into production.

Indiegogo is not a store but is a donation-based platform that helps bring projects to life. In accordance with Indiegogo's Terms of Use, we cannot offer refunds or returns once the campaign has finished. 

With that said, we are confident in your order as we have a strong supply chain. Our materials suppliers and manufacturers have a strict standard of quality control and our shipping and fulfillment partners deliver on time without delay. We’re confident that we can deliver you a high-quality bag on schedule.

Once our campaign is complete, we'll immediately start production by ordering the materials and get everything in place for manufacturing. As the final bags move into cut & sew and assembly, we'll personally oversee the factory to make sure everything is in order.

With any product, there's always a chance for delays and mistakes however, our experience has led us to believe we shouldn't have any problems. For anything unforeseen, we will be sure to update you during the process to be transparent about anything that happens.

If you have any questions please feel free to email us at SHOP@HAERFEST.COM

story:
Hi! My name is Ashley Sibille and I am a speaker, writer, and a CALYLer. 

CALYL is movement that I created in 2014.                                                                        CALYL is an acronym for Create A Life You Love.

CALYL exists to help inspire people to live their most fantastic life and to find the courage to do what is necessary to maintain that CALYL life.

In January I spoke at an event in Key West and in my talk I emphasized how it takes Courage to Create A Life You Love. By the end of the talk I gave everyone a courage necklace. I had no idea the effect of those necklaces would have, nor how much people would respond to them and continue to wear them as a symbol and a source of strength.

I haven’t even taken mine off because I feel the same way.

I had no idea what it was preparing me for- Just a little over a month after I gave out those Courage rings I found out my dad had Acute Myeloid Leukemia. It was a hard pill to swallow mostly because he has never been sick. He's a very active man who still works in the yard and enjoys building things. Seeing him in this predicament has been difficult, but what I have found in myself is the Courage to help him thru this time.

I realized that I had something to share that I could give my whole family something to hold on to, something that could give them courage to walk this walk and bring us together. With the help of my awesome girlfriend, we made courage necklaces for my whole family. I am so happy to see that my dad is wearing his – especially since he’s not the type of guy who wears anything but his wedding ring and watch.

But I tell you this necklace is special and it has super powers and everyone seems to keep it on. So that's why I want to send them across the globe. I want to spread the message of courage and help remind and inspire people to be courageous. It's a tangible reminder that you CAN Create A Life You Love. I realized that more people need courage necklaces. So I decided to create a campaign.

I am selling them for $25 and you get two- one to give to someone special in your life and one to keep. And then I will give one away in your honor to a cancer patient and/or affected family.

CALYL with Courage.

No mater what you are going thru in life – it takes courage to make the hard decisions, to step into your best self, to have important life changing conversations, and to do what you love- whatever that is-

Have you ever felt like you were totally on your own with no hope in sight?               Time to get your Courage Ring

Do you wonder how other people can be so successful but you always seem to be left behind?                                                                                                                                        Time to get your Courage ring

Do you sometimes wake up and think – how am I going to get thru this?                    Time to get your Courage ring

Do you feel like you have something so amazing inside you but don’t know how to access it?                                                                                                                                            Time to get your Courage ring

If you feel stuck in yesterday’s story then most definitely GET YOUR COURAGE RING!

Let’s all do it together. Join the movement- be courageous and help others in their plight to be courageous.

CALYL with COURAGE
