comfortable and stylish, but easy to wear and maintain too.
What’s a Slip Shirt?
"One Shirt, Every Occasion". Simply put, the Slip Shirt
combines the comfort of a t-shirt with the look of a dress shirt.
What’s ‘Truly Functional
Fashion’?
Here at GOWDA we specialize in being one of the few
fashion labels with the wearer truly in mind. We believe that clothing should
be stylish and easy to wear without extremely high prices, which is why
we created our range of ‘Truly Functional Fashion’.
In fashion, the term ‘functional’ usually refers to
clothes that are very simple in design and easily worn but often they are not
as simple to wear nor with a simple design are they ‘true’ fashion. The term
‘Truly Functional Fashion’ means our clothes are very easily
worn and they are also stylish which is what men’s fashion should be.
All of our designs in the Truly Functional Fashion range are created with the
utmost usability of the wearer in mind, for a design to be included in this
category it must: eliminate as many unnecessary aspects of a garment as
possible (like buttoning and ironing), it must be comfortable to wear, easy to
maintain and of course it must be fashionable.
What’s the #TFFmovement?
The #TFFmovement (Truly Functional Fashion
movement) is the movement towards a new era of fashion. As technology moves
ahead with wearable tech fashion itself has stagnated and now’s the time to
truly bring it into the 21st Century, making it just as stylish and efficient
as tech has become.
The #TFFmovement is the main reason for our
Crowdfunding Campaign; here at GOWDA we believe that the time has come for
fashion to move ahead, starting with menswear we are set to bring about some of
the biggest changes in the fashion industry this Century.
Backing this campaign is your chance to be apart of the
#TFFmovement. It is a movement towards a new era of fashion. Claiming your Slip
Shirt will allow you to join the ‘Select Group’ giving you a major hand in all
the future designs of this fashion Start-Up, giving you the opportunity to help
create the future of fashion.
What’s the ‘Select
Group’?
Welcome to the ‘Select Group’. Claiming one of the
perks from this campaign will entitle you to join the Select Group. This Group
is a VIP group of all the early backers of the #TFFmovement, which will give
you a major hand in the finalisations of all our future designs, including Beta
testing of our new products.
Where will the Funds Go?
All of the funds raised
will go towards manufacturing of the first production run of Slip Shirts and
further developing the range of Truly Functional Fashion with your help. 
$15000 is the minimum
amount required for a large production run, if we do not reach our funding goal
we will still fulfil all orders through a smaller manufacturer. If we exceed
our funding goal we will move towards the stretch goals as listed above.
10% of the proceeds will
also be donated to YWAM (Youth with a Mission).
Where are the Slip
Shirts Manufactured?
Our first production run
of Slip Shirts will be manufactured right here in Australia.
How do I choose my
Style, Size and Colour?
We will contact you via email
upon the conclusion of our campaign (after July 2nd) to get your
Style, Size and Colour Choices for all your Perks claimed.
You will be able to
choose between any of the 3 styles (Long Sleeve, Short Sleeve or Sleeveless),
either Medium or Large Sizes and any of the unlocked Colours.
If you purchase more
than one Slip Shirt you can choose any style, size or colour for each of your shirts
separately, they don’t have to all be the same.Note: All images shown on this campaign are concept
versions, the final version that you will receive will be finished with a higher
level of precision to what you see here.
How do I add $20 for
International Shipping?
After choosing your perk
the next screen will have a box with the amount to be paid, just add $20 on to
that figure.
If you forget to add the
cost for international shipping to your order just click ‘Contribute Now’ at
the top of the page and contribute the shipping fee using the same email
address you purchased your perk with.
How Do I claim more Slip
Shirts?
Either choose the multi
shirt options or you can choose any of the single Slip Shirt perks and on the
next screen just multiply the figure in the box by the amount of shirts you’re
after.
If however you’ve
already chosen and paid for a perk just choose any of the other perks and use
the same email address you used to purchase the previous perk, we will match up
your orders and ship them together.
What Payment Types are accepted?
You can pay using PayPal
or your Credit/Debit Card.
We accept all the major
Credit/Debit Cards (VISA, MasterCard, American Express and Discover).
All payments (including
Credit/Debit Card) are handled through PayPal to ensure your details are kept
secure.
How will my Slip Shirt
be shipped?
All of our Slip Shirts will be sent via Australia
Post. All of our items will be packed and sent with minimal product packaging
as to reduce our environmental impact. To ensure the items are kept safe on
their trip to you we send your items in a tough mailing bag (which is basically
a very strong plastic envelope which is tightly sealed).
We offer FREE SHIPPING to all of Australia,
and only an extra $20 for international orders to ensure secure shipping.
When will my Slip Shirt arrive?
The first production run of Slip Shirts is set to
arrive at your door before the end of August 2014.
Are there any Job
positions available?
Ever wanted to work at a start-up? Ever wanted to
work in the fashion industry? Well, as we are a brand new fashion start-up we
are always expanding and looking to add new members to the team. Positions
available may include; Social Media, Production, Packaging, PR, Finance, Management,
Design Analysts, etc. 
Upon completion of our Crowdfunding Campaign we
will be sending out an email to all of our backers regarding job opportunities
at our new company. So back our campaign, grab yourself a Slip Shirt and upon
completion of our campaign you could be looking at joining us in the fashion
industry as the newest member of our team.What does the Future
hold?
For us here at GOWDA we have created the
#TFFmovement with the ideal of bringing fashion into the 21st
Century. After the finalisation of this campaign we seek to launch many new
products (items including the Zero-Button Suit), first in menswear then moving
into women’s wear down the track. Have any further
questions? Ensure you’ve read the FAQs above first; if your question isn’t answered
there send us an email:
Enquiries: slipshirt@gowdafashion.co
Press: publicity@gowdafashion.co  Checkout our Website          Like us on Facebook              Follow us on twitter   Thanks for checking out
our campaign, (you’re awesome for reading down to here!)
Feel free to share our
campaign with your friends and followers via the share tools at the top of this
page (just below the video advert at the top) be sure to include the hash tag #TFFmovement, remember the more you share the more
colour choices you’ll unlock and the more money we’ll raise to further develop
our fashion and the more we’ll raise for charity!
Regards, the GOWDA TeamNote: Slip Shirt™ and all its components are Trademarks under ownership of GOWDA. Slip Shirt™  design and all pertaining features associated are Patent Pending under ownership of GOWDA.

story:
Short Summary

Have you ever had trouble buckling your belt? Know someone who has? Have Parkinsons? Arthritis? Or other motor dysfunction? beltNEX is what you need.

What is beltNEX? beltNEX is a self buckling belt with a minimalistic design. The tail of the belt feeds into the head of the belt via a magnet. When it has fit snugly around the waist the magnet turns off. This causes a clasp being activated gripping the tail of the belt resulting in your pants being held up. Afterword the belt can be tightened or loosened depending on how much pressure is comfortable around the waist. Buttons on the side of the belt control this function. As much as I would like to continue, I can not divulge any more secrets before this product is developed.

What if you would like to wear beltNEX casually? beltNEX is stylish enough for it to be worn on all occasions for different people. beltNEX will come in a variety of colors including black for professionals. Along with the belt comes a detachable buckle for ornamental value.These ornamental buckles can be mixed and matched for maximum customization.

Who am I? I generally like to create projects in the same league as this. One day I sat down and wondered what I could do to make a difference in peoples lives. I searched all the available products and that's when this idea came about. One experience that really stuck with me after conversing with several people is that the general wish of most disabled is the desire for independence. beltNEX can achieve that.

What We Need & What You Get

Currently beltNEX is in its formative stages. I encourage you to leave your suggestions on how this idea can be improved for a greater impact. With your help and funding I will continue to develop and engineer the product.

For just $100 you can ensure you will get the beltNEX as an early adopter along with a complimentary keychain flashlight.

What if the funds are not met? Any amount can be used to forward this goal. 


With your help, we can really transform peoples lives.

Other Ways You Can Help

Can't contribute? You can still help by sharing this campaign with your friends and family!

beltNEX thanks you.

story:
SUMMARY

Voiceless Clothing all started initially as somewhat of a joke, as we weren't real serious about the idea but had backed the fundamental ideas and morals behind the project. All of us that collaborate are a close circle of friends who have struggled in many situations that we absolutely hate to see other people struggle with. We've lost a large number of friends due to suicides and illnesses, we've seen family members involved in abusive relationships, we've lost friends and family to cancer. Our main goal is to strive to help the "Voiceless," the people who don't stand up in these situations to get the help that they need; whether a shoulder to cry on, someone to talk to or professional help. Through visual art and typography we strive to bring a STRONG and positive message to those surrounded by a world of grief and negativity. By helping us fund this next line we can focus more on getting our message out, more free products, and the stability of a company that has been a long and hard battle to keep alive due to the financial issues we all struggle with.

WHAT WE NEED

In order for us to accomplish getting this company FULLY up and running (something we've never really been able to fund ourselves) we're going to need around $2,500. These funds will cover all of our necessary costs including (Inventory of new products), products to ship to artists for tour clothes, Free Product raffles, Free give-a-ways in suburban areas strucken with poverty, as well as advertising and donations.

THE IMPACT YOU'LL HAVE

By Donating to our cause you can fully help people reach positivity and make a major change in the help that people get on a regular basis. Your contribution will impact people who are "voiceless" and need help in stepping towards recovery or towards treatment!

Other Ways You Can Help

If you CANNOT contribute to our cause, please feel Free to do these:
  • Share to Facebook
  • Tell Friends and Family Members
  • E-mail people
  • Share on Additional Social Networking Sites (Instagram, Twitter, Tumblr, etc.)
  • Share our Facebook and have people buy our existing Stock (very very low stock)

story:
Who is mKultra Clothing?
Hello! mKultra Clothing (the m is silent) is a new independent clothing company operating out of Charlotte, North Carolina. The idea was birthed around 2 years ago by Kehran Carr. Although, at that time our vision was a bit different the message was still the same; there needed to be a clothing company that stood for something more than profit and trend. 

The apparel industry has been saturated with greed, and we're here to prove it! Clothing is an art form that you can wear and showcase to the world! We believe this art should have a powerful voice behind it and stand for a cause, something real. With your help we can create this voice that so desperately needs to speak.

How can you help? And what's in it for you?

Below are two things. On one side, is a pie chart explaining roughly where our funds will go. As you can tell most of the money raised here will be used for new material and fabric such as beanies, sweat pants, and more! On the other side are our donation perks and what you get in return for your gratitude :)

Our collection and designs

*Note - All of our designs are available on T-shirts, Hoodies, Crewnecks, and anything cotton or with a cotton/poly blend.

"Legalize It!" No seriously! 4 states down 46 to go!

"Think While Its Still Legal" 

"Blood Diamond"

"What is value" no really, what is value to you?

Our Limited Edition "Mad Scientist" poster!

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute financially and we understand, but that doesn't mean they can't help! That's why we've set up this referral system! 

  • How does it work?

Well, it's simple really! All you have to do is share and spread our vision! (with the referral link of course) Share us on facebook, instagram, twitter, anything! Hey, if you want to paint our logo on your body and show us off that way you're more than welcome! 

  • What are the prizes & how do they work?

Once you spread the word and start getting your friends and family to contribute you benefit as well! Below is a list of the milestones you must meet for each prize!


Get your friends or family to contribute:

$10 -  Free bracelet and sticker!

$20 - Free T-shirt, including everything in the lower tier(s)!

$50 - Free Crewneck, including everything in the lower tier(s)!

$100 - Free Hoodie, including everything in the lower tier(s)

$250 - Free Hoodie, 2x Crewneck, T-shirt, & everything in the lower tier(s)!

*Note - The referral contest will end at the end of the campaign! All referral contributions will combined for a total at the end and prizes will be shipped then.

story:
PetBot is the first device that allows you see, speak and listen to your pet through your smartphone.  But it’s not a one-way conversation. Using PetBot’s “petificial intelligence” and bark notification, you can train your pet to send you selfies and much much more! You can even use PetBot to send your pet treats, which is really awesome for training your pet when you’re away from home.   

 

 

 

 

 

 

See and speak to your pet through your phone 

 

Tell your pet you love them and make sure they’re okay through PetBot’s built-in camera and two-way speaker. 

Train your pet to send you a selfie 

When your pet cuddles up to the camera, PetBot automatically starts recording a ten-second video or selfie image and dispenses a treat or plays a pre-recorded sound as a reward.

Send a Treat 

Reward your pet with a tasty treat right from your smartphone! Useful for training your pet when you’re not at home.

 

Get Notified 

Through our “bark recognition” technology, you’ll be the first to know if something is happening with your pet when you are away. 

 

 

 

 

 

PetBot was born in 2013 with the vision to improve the quality of life of pets in homes and in shelters around the world.

Our co-founders have years of pet training, pet care and technical experience including the development of machine learning and artificial intelligence that have been used to test the effectiveness of drugs on cancer. This technology has been included into PetBot to inform pet owners when their pets need them. Combined with years of innovation, business and finance experience, our team will provide petificial intelligence to pet owners across the world.

You can even use PetBot to send your pet treats, which is really awesome for training your pet when you’re away from home.         See and speak to your pet through your phone  Tell your pet you love them and make sure they’re okay through PetBot’s built-in camera and two-way speaker. Train your pet to send you a selfie When your pet cuddles up to the camera, PetBot automatically starts recording a ten-second video or selfie image and dispenses a treat or plays a pre-recorded sound as a reward.Send a Treat Reward your pet with a tasty treat right from your smartphone! story:
DIMENSIONS ALBERT CLOCK (approximately): w 35 cm h 15 cm d 5 cm

 

What is the Albert Clock?

The Albert Clock is a digital wall clock that keeps your brain active and helps to improve the mathematical skills of you and your kids in a playful way. Simply by reading the time.

 

That was too easy for you? No problem! ALBERT grows with you. The better you get, the more you can challenge ALBERT’s levels, like in a video game! Addition and substraction, multiplication and divison can be practiced on four levels of difficulty.
 

 

Levels of difficulty

 

 

 

Why the Albert Clock is fun and benefit

Children enjoy racking their brains and making calculations when they’re allowed to take a playful approach. The Albert Clock, however, isn’t exclusively for kids: If you want to get the ALBERT CLOCK for your little ones because of its educational value you might soon as well take pleasure in being put to the test and having to figure out the correct time. Anyone who is interested in Sudoku puzzles and other kinds of brainteasers might also enjoy the ALBERT CLOCK. We can all benefit from this clock. First of all, it’s fun and keeps you mentally fit. Secondly, wouldn’t it be lovely to be able to quickly calculate in your head which product is cheapest per kilo, or what amount should be given as a proper tip?

Time to think - now it's up to you!

The Albert Clock is set to be introduced to the market in March 2016 and will cost approximately 250 Dollars / 225 €. Together with your help we want to collect the necessary capital for its production by means of this campaign! If you join in you have a chance to recieve great rewards. For example, anyone that spends 175 $ / 160 € will get one ALBERT CLOCK with 30 % off the latter retail-price. If you want to support us with a smaller amount you still can benefit: If you support us with 1 $ you will get the ALBERT APP on your smartphone, and early birds have a super price of 150 $ / 135 €. (info: all prices are not including delivery, delivery is free in France)

 

 

Be the first to get your brains on ALBERT! Tell your friends and help us make it happen!

  • „I've spent many hours in school looking at the time and waiting for it to pass. I regret now that we did not have the Albert Clock hanging on the classroom wall - in order to turn boredom into mental calculation skills!“ Mathieu Lehanneur, designer, Paris, France

  • "The clock is not only a beautiful minimalist object, it is also a fun and clever intervention into the mundane task of looking up the time. Not just for kids, but for any brain that needs a bit of exercise..." Sigi Moeslinger, designer, New York, USA

  • "This could solve a lot of problems. I am serious. I think it is great.“ Zeke Brown, Architect, Boston.

  • „In school Mathematics isn't any fun – with the Albert Clock, however, it is!“ Chiara, 9 years old, at the Kids Design Week 2015 in Milano, Italy

  • „I would have been so jealous about it“ Albert E., Scientist and Genius (well, probably)

 

 

Who we are and what we believe in

 

Axel met Fred in 2010, they developed with their complementary skills - product design (A) & software engineering (F) - the project "tomorrow is another day" for french designer Mathieu Lehanneur. 4 years later they start to work on several ideas, like the Albert Clock!

"We think of life as a way to learn, and we love to experience the world that surrounds us in a playful way. We believe in kids – small ones and big ones as well – and we believe in the importance and the benefits of Science. We want to develop intelligent products that can have a positive influence on our everyday life, by changing our ways to see the world!" Axel Schindlbeck

 

High-tech handmade

We have worked on a large variety of projects ranging from mass produced products to luxurious one-off pieces made by outstanding artisans. We love the combination of these 2 worlds, the mix of automated electronics fabrication with artisanal handmade quality. That's why the housing for the Albert Clock is made by hand of MDF and painted with high quality matt laquer in multiple Layers.

 

The Display is custom designed and optimised for showing mathematical queries. We designed and developed the LED Digits and the electronic Circuits of the ALBERT CLOCK ourselves. We think that details matter, and even if you can not see it, you will feel the quality of our selfmade PCB board flowing through the Albert Clock:

 

The LED digits for the ALBERT CLOCK are custom designed for a good readability compared to standard alphanumeric digits. A custom design requires expensive tooling - that's why we had to use standard digits for the prototype you can see in our video. If we make it to serial production, we will use our own Albert digits!

The ALBERT CLOCK can be used both on walls and on table use. In case you do not have a AC outlet on the wall, the included 3m long textile cable and a dedicated wall fixation system for easy use allow you to put Albert nearly anywhere you like!

 

 

TIMELINE

Who we are and what we believe in
 


Axel met Fred in 2010, they developed with their complementary skills - product design (A) & software engineering (F) - the project "tomorrow is another day" for french designer Mathieu Lehanneur. 4 years later they start to work on several ideas, like the Albert Clock!
"We think of life as a way to learn, and we love to experience the world that surrounds us in a playful way. We believe in kids – small ones and big ones as well – and we believe in the importance and the benefits of Science. We want to develop intelligent products that can have a positive influence on our everyday life, by changing our ways to see the world!" Axel Schindlbeck
 
High-tech handmade
We have worked on a large variety of projects ranging from mass produced products to luxurious one-off pieces made by outstanding artisans. We love the combination of these 2 worlds, the mix of automated electronics fabrication with artisanal handmade quality. That's why the housing for the Albert Clock is made by hand of MDF and painted with high quality matt laquer in multiple Layers.
 


The Display is custom designed and optimised for showing mathematical queries. We designed and developed the LED Digits and the electronic Circuits of the ALBERT CLOCK ourselves. We think that details matter, and even if you can not see it, you will feel the quality of our selfmade PCB board flowing through the Albert Clock:
 


The LED digits for the ALBERT CLOCK are custom designed for a good readability compared to standard alphanumeric digits. A custom design requires expensive tooling - that's why we had to use standard digits for the prototype you can see in our video. If we make it to serial production, we will use our own Albert digits!

The ALBERT CLOCK can be used both on walls and on table use. In case you do not have a AC outlet on the wall, the included 3m long textile cable and a dedicated wall fixation system for easy use allow you to put Albert nearly anywhere you like!
 
 
TIMELINE

story:
The Contour

Meet the Contour, a wallet built for performance and designed for adventure. The Contour is built by hand in Bellingham, Washington and designed to accompany you on your everyday adventure while you earn your story.

The Contour is a modern take on a classic leather wallet (patent pending.) Its elegant and timeless design is backed by a steel plate to ensure a rugged, long-lasting carry. With time, the leather will develop a patina as a constant reminder of your journey. All of the components of the wallet are sourced from the USA.

Trayvax is the product of a Kickstarter campaign in 2013. We wouldn't be where we are today if it weren't for the support of our incredible customers. Since that campaign, our product line has grown to include five wallets made by a small company of people passionate about quality American-made products. Our designs are functional, sturdy and reliable. Funding this campaign will help us to purchase our own CNC machine so that we can offer newer and more custom outdoor products in order to continue to grow our company.

Please note that the “extended leather” options are accessories to the Contour and not a wallet on its own. If you’ve already backed us and believe that you need help, send us an email at support@trayvax.com.


What's included?

The Contour comes with a lifetime warranty. We will replace or repair the wallet under standard use for the life of the original owner. We have a customer service team of excellent folks that are here to help, and we stand behind our word. 
Material composition:

Gold= Titanium nitride (TiN) coating

Burgundy= Titanium aluminum nitride (TiAlN) coating

Black top plate=Aluminum titanium nitride (AlTin) coating

Contour specs:

- 5 oz top grain U.S. sourced leather (this leather is no joke. It's built to last!). We hand stitch each leather strap to ensure the highest quality, good looks, and longevity of construction.

- 304 stainless CNC machined base plate. This plate is coated in a unique process called "Plasma vapor deposition", the same coating that is used on end mills for aerospace machining. It is incredibly hard and scratch proof. 

-Integrated carabiner clip. Your wallet has all of your information and it is a must that it stays in one place while you're adventuring. You have the ability to attach it to your keychain for a single carry as well as directly to your backpack or climbing gear. 

- Laser cut top plate. The top plate features a quick access bottle opener and the same plasma vapor deposition coating as the base plate. Our Trayvax logo is engraved with a fiber laser. This is all meant to keep your wallet looking new as long as possible. 

-Stainless hardware, and a slider mechanism to ensure that you can form your wallet to the exact number of cards that you use. The adjustable slider makes it easy and quick to adjust your wallet to greater or lesser amounts of cash that you carry on the backside of the wallet. 

-Torx wrench. you will receive a torx wrench for adjusting and custom forming your wallet. 

Risks & Challenges

We will have to move quickly in order to purchase and set up a CNC machine. Depending on the amount that we raise, we will either be able to purchase a higher quality/newer machine or an older used machine. We cannot foresee any issues that may happen during setup, but we will be open and honest on any road bumps that happen during the fulfillment of this project. 

What else do we offer?

Check out our current line of U.S products on http://www.trayvax.com and contact our customer service team through this campaign or through our website with any questions that you might have!

story:
Pandas

Here are a lot of important facts about pandas:

  • baby pandas are the size of a stick of butter, they are also just as smooth
  • pandas are excellent gardeners
  • their favourite food is sprinkled doughnuts
  • a panda brain is as good at math as a calculator, that means it's probably better at math than you are
  • pandas can beat-box and sing karaoke better than any other species on the planet
  • pandas national sport is lacrosse
  • pandas begin training shortly after birth by their parents in the art of making balloon poodles and retain aforementioned poodle-balloon making skills until they die

What We Need & What You Get

We need to buy a panda costume

We promise that the world will be a better place if we have a panda costume

  • We actually only need 200 USD to buy a panda costume on Ebay but the minimum to make a campaign on here is 500 
  • Anything we make above the actual  price of a panda costume we will donate to saving the pandas here: http://www.worldwildlife.org/species/giant-panda
  • All proceeds resulting from the panda costume will also be donated to saving pandas

The Impact

Pandas are probably going to all die soon, except that scientists are probably going to freeze all the panda sperm and eggs or their dna will live forever in mosquito fossils and later on when people live on mars we can build a panda theme park and someone will get rich, but just in case they don't we should probably save the ones we have

  • A lot of people like pandas
  • We really like pandas

Risks & Challenges

  • Unless we have problems getting a panda suit through customs we are very optimistic that we will be able to achieve our desired project outcome
  • by wearing a panda costume we put ourselves in danger of people actually thinking we are a panda, being afraid and possibly getting attacked
  • we will take steps to ensure that while wearing the panda costume people are aware that it is not actually a real panda

Other Ways You Can Help

you can also get a panda suit because pandas are pack animals and they like to have friends just like people

  • make sure that if you see a panda in your neighbourhood it is actually a panda and not a person dressed as a panda if you have to attack it
  • if your children are having a birthday party hire a panda instead of a clown they are better at entertaining children and the current panda unemployment rate is especially high between 3-10 year old pandas

story:
We did it! Fully funded in under a week! Thanks to all of our RawWood family!

So what's next you may ask? Well, we've decided to introduce some rad stretch goals:

What is RawWood?

RawWood Shades Co. originated as a brand to create unique sunglasses that we wanted to use ourselves. Our vision is to create sustainable products that you can travel the world with, and be a conversation starter to the people you meet on your adventures.

We believe in sustainability, adventure, and affordability. RawWood is the creative collaboration of a small team based in Grand Rapids, near the Third Coast in Michigan.

We initially launched our first line of sunglasses via Indiegogo around three years ago! We would never have reached the level we are at now without the help of our loyal backers.

The Mission Series - Minimalist Wood Watch

 

The Chrono Series - Minimalist Wood Watch

Risks & Challenges

We could certainly experience unforeseen manufacturing delays. We have vetted our manufacturer thoroughly, but things could always get complicated dependent on the success of the campaign.

  • We have years of experience dealing with production, and we believe we have our bases covered to the fullest extent possible.
  • If delays are to happen, we will still be able to deliver in a timely fashion. In the worst case scenario, we would not be able to deliver by Christmas.

story:
Summary

Would you like to see a vibrant Garment District in Seattle that creates Made in USA jobs, and adds to Seattle's artistic culture? We're on a mission to do just that, and we need your help! Seattle Fashion Incubator is a non-profit dedicated to providing access to resources and specialty equipment to independent designers so they can grow their businesses and keep them in Seattle.

Check out some of our press coverage HERE.

What We Need & What You Get

This campaign is to raise money for the purpose creating a Pattern Making lab for the designers we serve

  • Two 23" Touchscreen computers
  • One wide format printer for pattern markers
  • Commercial CAD pattern making software

We've got some great perks including hand written thank you notes, a Made in USA 25 oz branded water bottle, branded bamboo messenger bag, and more...

Designers we have some special Perks just for you. Attend a free class on how to use this industry standard software from a trained instructor, an alotment of hours to access the lab, and membership in Seattle Fashion Incubator.

The Impact

Without this software independent designers have to either spend hundreds of dollars, or dozens of hours to not only create their patterns, but to also recreate them in the various sizes they wish to produce them in through a process called Grading. Your support of our campaign will:

  • Save independet designers time and money
  • Increase the manufacturability of their garments
  • Lower the cost of producing their garments making Made in Seattle affordable
  • Help create a vibrant Garment industry and jobs in Seattle

If we exceed our goal the additional funds will be used to purchase commercial sewing machines, and other tools for the designers.

Other Ways You Can Help

Unable to contribute to our campaign financially? That's okay, we understand that times are tight for a lot of folks. You can always share our campaign with your social networks, and we would be eternally grateful!

story:
About Me

Hello. My name is Ian and I design jewellery for a living.

You can see more pictures of my work here on Instagram, or visit iankwan.com.

I have graduated with a diploma (distinction) in Visual Communication, majoring Jewellery Design in 2004. Since then, just to name a few, I have been an army recruit (briefly), a police officer, T-Shirt designer and a wedding videographer/ photographer. All throughout my various career changes, I kept my jewellery making as a hobby.

In early 2011, I decided to design jewellery full time.

For the past 3 years, I have been honing my jewellery designing skills feverishly, designing and producing fine jewellery according to the demands of my clients.

I am lucky to have received so much support and encouragement from the Instagram community. I would like to end this "About Me" section with a message to all my instagram followers.

Thank you for making me push myself a bit further every single day.


About This Fund Raising Campaign

All this while, I have been designing jewellery mostly for others. This time, I would like to design something for myself; an exclusive line of jewellery that is modern, hefty and suitable for daily wear.

For that, I would like to raise some fund to jump-start this endeavour.

As I have no intention to start anything with only the contributions of others, therefore I am setting the targeted fund at USD $3000. 

All funds collected will only be used in (listed by priorities):

1) Production of my jewellery
2) Payment of any out-sourced services (photographer, graphic designers etc)

The success of this fund raising campaign would also be a good way for me to gauge whether my designs have the potential to grow into marketable and well-received jewellery pieces.

This campaign will end on 31st January 2014.


PERKS: What Do You Get In Return For Your Kind Contribution?

It is unimaginable for me to receive something for nothing.

On top of my most heartfelt gratitude, this is what I have to offer you in return for your generosity.

At the end of this fund raising campaign, an online survey will be sent to all contributors where they can then opt for the designs (for bookmarks/ postcards/ actual illustrations) they want.

Check out the Gallery at the top of this page to see more pictures of the perks!

"The Inner Circle"

All contributors will automatically be placed in my "inner circle". You have rose to the occasion and supported my cause, and I greatly appreciate that. 

For that, you will be among the first to see all future jewellery collections. Exclusive contents and special promotions await!


For $15 Contribution
(2 Bookmarks)

You will get two bookmarks with my hand-rendered jewellery designs printed on them. There are 8 different designs to collect!

Bookmark Measurement: 2 inches by 5 inches
Delivered by: 15th March 2014



For $25 Contribution
(A Set of 5 Postcards)

Receive a set of 5 postcards, each with a print of actual jewellery illustrations designed by yours truly. There are 30 different designs to choose from, in 6 sets!

You can frame them up and proudly display them or mail them to a jewellery-loving friend along with your best wishes. It's all up to you!

Postcard Measurement: 4 inches by 6 inches
Delivered by: 15th March 2014



For $50 Contribution
 (All 8 Bookmarks)

Get all 8 of my bookmarks!

Delivered by: 15th March 2014



For $120 Contribution
(All 30 Postcards)

Can't decide on which set of postcards to get? Save yourself the trouble and get them all!

Delivered by: 15th March 2014



For $150 Contribution
(All Bookmarks & Postcards)

By contributing $175, you will receive all 8 bookmarks and 30 postcards!

Delivered by: 15th March 2014


For $200 Contribution
(An Original Illustration)

You can now own one of my actual illustrations. 

Each of these illustrations is illustrated by hand, lovingly mounted on a black, A4 sized (210mm by 297mm) mounting board. I have signed and dated every single one of them at the back of the mounting, right on the bottom right corner.

Only 10 of them available! Grab them while they last!

Illustration Measurement: 210mm by 297mm

* If you are interested in getting one, please take notice of the letter of Illustration when you are choosing, and select the appropriate option on the right. Strangely, the perks seem to jumble out of their alphabetical order by their own will and there is nothing I can do about it.

Delivered by: 20th February 2014



For $250 Contribution
 (I Will Design For You)

For $250, I will design a ring, a pendant OR a pair of earrings for you. 

We will liaise via email. You just give me a direction and I will do my best to satisfy your instructions.

You can be as specific as you want, it will be easier for me to design. Or you can be just as vague and let me crack my head for you.

At the end of the day, you will get 3 black and white sketches, and a rendering of one of the sketches, in full colour. Different views will be provided and should you choose to have it produced, you can just simply bring it to a craftsman.

The illustration will be rendered on a piece of 220 gsm and acid-free paper. After which it will be mounted on an A4 sized black mounting board. Together with my best wishes and your hardcopy of the 3 B&W sketches, it will then be mailed to you.

Below, you can see two samples of the black and white sketches and actual rendering.


Stretch Goals

Be sure to check back regularly as I will be adding more as we go along.

The More I Receive, The More I Am Giving Back!

If the fund raised is:

  1. Met ($3000), all contributors get a Discount Code which they can use for any future purchases.
    * For "Pair of Bookmarks" or "A Set of 5 Postcards", you will receive a 15% discount code.
    ** For "All 8 Bookmarks", "All 30 Postcards" and "All Bookmarks & Postcards", you will receive a 25% discount code.
    ** For "An Original Illustration" and "I Will Design For You", you will receive a 35% discount code.
  2. Exceeded by $1000 ($4000), I will produce 2 more designs into bookmarks. Everybody gets to choose one free of charge!
    * Contributors opted for "All 8 Bookmarks" and above, get both new designs.


  3. Exceeded by $2000 ($5000), I will produce 5 more designs into postcards. Everybody gets to choose one free of charge!
    * Contributors opted for "All 30 Postcards" and above, get all 5 new designs.
  4. Exceeded by $5000 ($8000), I will work on an ''E-Book'' in which I will talk about the tools I use and the basics of my drawing style (nothing about colouring) with a step-by-step demonstration of me drawing a pendant.

    Filled with pictures, detailed instructions and "pro-tips", you just might learn something from this E-Book.

    This will be the first time I am "writing a book", so please pardon any amateurish qualities that you might find with the finished product. 

    * Only available for contributors who opted for "All 30 Postcards" and above.


With Your Kind and Generous Support...

I will have the means and confidence to produce and market my jewellery pieces. 

Even if it is not possible for you to contribute financially, there are still ways you can aid in my cause!

Other Ways You Can Help

Please kindly do:

  • Spread the word about the campaign. Let your friends and family know!
  • Follow me on Instagram if you like my work.

All the designs are rendered and archived, my network of suppliers and skilled jewellery craftsmen are on standby and I am ready to take the next step.

I thank you from the bottom of my heart.

Met ($3000), all contributors get a Discount Code which they can use for any future purchases.* For "Pair of Bookmarks" or "A Set of 5 Postcards", you will receive a 15% discount code.** For "All 8 Bookmarks", "All 30 Postcards" and "All Bookmarks & Postcards", you will receive a 25% discount code.** For "An Original Illustration" and "I Will Design For You", you will receive a 35% discount code.

Exceeded by $1000 ($4000), I will produce 2 more designs into bookmarks. Everybody gets to choose one free of charge!* Contributors opted for "All 8 Bookmarks" and above, get both new designs.

Exceeded by $2000 ($5000), I will produce 5 more designs into postcards. Everybody gets to choose one free of charge!* Contributors opted for "All 30 Postcards" and above, get all 5 new designs.

Exceeded by $5000 ($8000), I will work on an ''E-Book'' in which I will talk about the tools I use and the basics of my drawing style (nothing about colouring) with a step-by-step demonstration of me drawing a pendant. Filled with pictures, detailed instructions and "pro-tips", you just might learn something from this E-Book.This will be the first time I am "writing a book", so please pardon any amateurish qualities that you might find with the finished product. * Only available for contributors who opted for "All 30 Postcards" and above.


With Your Kind and Generous Support...
I will have the means and confidence to produce and market my jewellery pieces. Even if it is not possible for you to contribute financially, there are still ways you can aid in my cause!Other Ways You Can HelpPlease kindly do:
Spread the word about the campaign. Let your friends and family know!
Follow me on Instagram if you like my work.
All the designs are rendered and archived, my network of suppliers and skilled jewellery craftsmen are on standby and I am ready to take the next step.I thank you from the bottom of my heart.

story:
"A Timeless Gem Meets 21st Century Technology"

First we want to say "THANKS" for having a look at our project!

We would like to point out this is a Genuine Cultured Pearl. It is NOT a carved shell.

 

The company is poised and ready to launch this new pearl product. We have 25 years of experience in pearl culturing and technology development. All of our infrastructure, developed technology and operations for this project have been tested and proven at our existing pearl culturing operations in Tahiti. Your support will enable us to mass produce at our farms this beautiful gem.

Use Of Proceeds:

We need to purchase specialized equipment to automate some of the processing, Icon Pearls require a different type of finishing than traditional round pearls. Upgrading our processing will reduce finished product costs and delivery time.

We are seeking your participation so we can launch mass production and distribution of this unique gem.

What Is an Icon Pearl?

99.9% of all pearls in the world are cultured. Traditional round pearls are obtained by implanting an oyster with a round shell bead (or nucleus) to grow a round pearl. To culture and grow an Icon Pearl, we had to overcome the natural tendency of the oyster to bury the implant without following any surfaces that were not concentric and smooth. We achieved this by discovering how the biomineralization process works at the nano level as nacre was secreted by the oyster. In layman's terms, we developed an implant and procedure that encourages the oyster to follow very detailed shapes and contours. This science took years of diligent testing and research, and the resulting product is now ready for marketing and distribution.

Product Application:

We are not limited in the shapes we can grow. This translates to endless design possibilities. We are able to price this gem from as low as $15.00 per unit to an average price of $85.00 wholesale. This price range allows nearly anyone to enjoy this unique gem.

Application Examples:

Jewelry can be created around themes such as nautical designs for tourist destinations in tropical areas, or we can represent any type of theme for fashion, corporate logos, or tailored to the area in which it would be sold. If you're a jeweler and want to create a spectacular piece by compositing shapes to form any size or any contour, we can do it! If you already distribute to retail, or would like to distribute, let us know.

The product is so versatile that the applications are unlimited. Artists and designers now have a way to bring their creations to life in a genuine pearl. "Gender-Jumping" the product enables us to reach out to men who, before, were not likely to buy  pearls for themselves. Now we have many available designs that men will enjoy wearing. We are able to reflect designs associated with already existing male products. So come on men, give us some feedback!

Some History

American Bio-Gem has developed a breakthrough pearl culturing procedure that allows us to grow custom-designed pearls in any shape imaginable. Our science was developed over years of tests conducted at the prestigious Scripps Institution of Oceanography in San Diego, California, Hubbs Research Center at Sea World, San Diego and The Center for Biological Studies in La Paz, Mexico (CIBNOR). This new jewelry application enables known brands, logos, and recognizable images to be reproduced in pearl form through natural pearl production. Given a brand or image that already has recognized value, we can turn that image into a unique, genuine cultured pearl. Imagine Mickey Mouse, Elvis, the Playboy Bunny, or the Nike "Swoosh" in pearl form! This unique jewelry will form the basis of an entirely new market for logos, brands, and images that are realized as cultured pearls. This technology will give custom jewelry designers the ability to create unique designs that will enhance their creative one-of-a-kind custom pieces.

 

Vision and Mission:

American Bio-Gem supports the ecological and economic value that cultured pearls contribute to developing nations, not only through aquaculture and animal husbandry, but through the increased awareness of marine and freshwater ecology that often accompanies the acquisition of pearls. The Company believes that the Icon Pearls concept provides an exceptional opportunity to leverage the existing value associated with already known brands, icons, and images and to extend that value through the realization of those brands in pearl form. We also believe that as much as the traditional cachet of pearls makes our Icon Pearls product desirable, the Icon Pearls concept will, in turn, be good for the traditional pearl market. We believe that the demand for Icon Pearls will be substantial, and that this demand will provide significant earnings and growth opportunities for the Company and our farming operations. Our mission is to develop this unique business opportunity, manage the introduction and initial growth of the market for Icon Pearls with jewelry distributors and brand owners, and build value in the various regional territories where Icon Pearls can be sold.

Use Of Reward Proceeds:

Our First  Level GOAL: Funding Budget: $150,000

At this level we will purchase automated processing machines that will reduce our production costs by 25% and increase our finishing production by 200%. Currently we process all Icon Pearls by hand. With this accomplished, we can reach out to regional distributors and artists worldwide who can use this product to enhance their own businesses.

Stretch Goals

$300,000

This level will enable us to increase the volumes of our production at our pearl farms by 30%

$500,000

At this level we can outsource to meet demands for the product and have a presence at all major fashion and jewelry trade shows.

Anything beyond this level lowers the end cost and bolsters our ability to meet the demand that we hope to receive.

Reward Levels

We currently have a catalog of over 400 Icon Pearl designs. Our culturing technology allows us to harvest these gems in four months, compared to the 18 months for most other pearls. Our commercial Icon Pearl production will assure jewelry manufacturers, artists and fashion designers a constant and reliable source of this amazing gem.

story:
Printvid is the world’s first full package for making four-dimensional video prints, which can displayed without the use of any electronic devices, special headgear or glasses. This is a new way to preserve your memories, capture life's best moments and just have fun!


Printvid adds two extra dimensions in the printed image: the third dimension is depth and the fourth is time, which allows it to show motion. Printvid is capable of transforming almost all your visual media into a 4D print, which is protected from water, scratches and color fading. Printvid uses improved lenticular printing technology and cloud software. It requires no additional hardware to your devices or inkjet printer. Printvid is highly functional and easy to use: you just launch Printvid Cloud App, take lenticular lens from the box and can start creating anything within minutes.

To spice up our start we want to give an exclusive opportunity to Indiegogo backers - to break the World Record! Together we can build the Tallest Lenticular Hologram in the World (see details below)!








Great classic sizes (4x4", 4x6" and 6x8") of lenticular lens included in the box. They are all equally good for printing in 4D, including photos, videos and computer-generated imagery, but there are some more features:

Instavid 4x4" is also good for making cool square 4D printvids from social networks, creation of animated magnets and other fun things like holiday decorations, toys, souvenirs and stickers. 

Mixvid 4x6" is also good for creation of greeting cards and crafting things like 4D cases for smartphones and tablets.

Bigvid 6x8" is also good for printing HD videos, movies, photo presentations, 3D scenes and large scale crafting.

For sophisticated designs you can easily adjust shape of your lenticular sheets, so you can create 4D printvids of any form and size for any purpose. Technical drawings for 4D iPhone wraps, Christmas decorations, toys and other amazing things included!




With Printvid Cloud App you can easily prepare photos and videos for 4D printing: edit your content, apply filters and effects, add text and frames and then transform it to the interlaced image, ready for the 4D printing. Use Printvid anywhere you want and create 4D images on the go. This is a web based application, so you can enjoy the cross-platform workflow. For example, you could shoot video with an iPhone, customize it on Android tablet and then complete the 4D file on your PC. Now it is so easy and flexible!


Printvid Cloud App ships with a lot of templates and filters, so you can customize your 4D printvids in the way you want: add some fun, make it retro, create cards, invitations, toys ... be imaginative! On top of that there is a 1-year subscription to all new additional templates, effects and other exclusive content.


The use of both imagery and lens material are inseparable when it comes to making the desired effect come to life in a lenticular print. The image itself is a composite of two or more graphics that are interlaced together. The lens is a unique plastic that is made up of individual lenticules that must be perfectly aligned with the interlaced image underneath it in order for the effect to work.

Based on the angle of the viewer, each lenticule acts as a magnifying glass to enlarge and display the portion of the image below. Many lenticules working in harmony form the entire lenticular image. In this way, lenticular print can appear to show motion and three-dimensions because each eye is viewing the lenticular print from its own angle.

Printvid with Perspective Stabilization (PS) function can produce incredibly vibrant and clear 4D prints. This function automatically adjusts the image viewing angle: when you look at the image under 30 degrees angle, the image will look like the viewer's angle is 0 degrees.

Upload your videos and photos to Printvid Cloud App from smartphones, tablets or computers.

Design is an extra, unless it’s used from the beginning. For example, you can use special templates, filters, insert digital frames or any other additional elements. 


Printvid App places frames in order and creates the file for printing. It is mostly a mathematical formula that slices images to the right width and arranges them accordingly.

For better understanding of theory there is a simple example of 2 frames interlacement for "flip" effect:



Then interlaced image is printed on special paper and combined with the lenticular lens - now your 4D printvid is ready!  Continuing our example:

Crafting is also an extra, because you already have a beautiful 4D print. But if you wish there is a lot more things you can do with Printvid - it can be trimmed as paper or cardboard, glued, grooved, die-cut or mounted on other surfaces, transformed into magnets or stickers. It also can be used for creation of appliques, decor elements, jewelry and scrapbooking. This technology is so versatile, that you can easily invent new ways of use!


Printvid works perfectly with most inkjet printers having 300+ DPI (dots per inch) printing capability. Almost all printers today are capable of printing 1200 to 4800 DPI. Inkjet printers with higher DPI allow using more frames per 4D print, which means you can make longer animations and better depth effects.



We are pleased to announce that every Indiegogo founder can participate in the building of the World Tallest Lenticular Hologram! How tall will it be? Our proposition is to make it at least 1000 meters (3280 feet) tall. Yeah, that's right, it will be ten times higher than Statue of Liberty, higher than The Tallest Building in the World Burj Khalifa and even twice longer than diameter of Saturn's moon Aegaeon! It can be even taller - everything is up to you. Such a gigantic hologram is itself a remarkable thing, but what makes it even better - this is a worldwide record breaking event for technology enthusiasts, the ones who want to create something special and inspire others by making such an amazing achievement. Current record of largest lenticular hologram is 78 meters, let's break it together!

With every Printvid Pack we will send you 5 invitations for the participation in the Record Breaking Event, so if your family, friends or colleagues wish to take part, they can do it.

The idea is that the Hologram will be made of thousands of smaller 4D lenticular images created by early adopters from around the world. So each participant can create some beautiful 4D printvids and send it for participation in the event, where it will take its honorable place within the gigantic lenticular Hologram. Each participant and supporter will the get Official Record Breaker Certificate, place on the Record Breakers Page (where you could track the location of your 4D image within the Hologram) and, of course, report from the Event!




What are the shipping costs? 

If you live in the US or the UK, shipping is free. For all other destinations, please add the amount specified in the perk description. Another thing you might want to consider though is what the import fees or duties will be on your end. These vary by country and we can't cover them.

If I am purchasing multiple add-ons, do I need to pay separate shipping for each item?

No, there is a free shipment for all add-ons with main Printvid Pack (we do not ship add-ons separately during this campaign).

How do I upgrade my perk?

No problem, just click CONTRIBUTE NOW and put in the difference you need to pay to upgrade. Select "No perk, I just want to contribute." Pay for it and email us at the below to inform us of the change.

I would like to buy the add-ons too, can I do that in 1 contribution?

Unfortunately, you will have to fill in several separate contributions (depending on number of add-ons or Packs needed).

Can anyone set up Printvid?

Yes! Printvid was designed with the purpose of making lenticular printing easy and accessible for everyone.

How to make 4D printvids larger than 8x12", if my printer physically cannot print larger images?

Firstly, you can use compound printing technique - make the lenticular image in Printvid software, break it into several parts smaller than 8x12", print them separately and combine printed images with the lenticular sheet.

Secondly, you can use outsource printing - make the lenticular image in Printvid software, order needed print size from local photo printing service and combine printed image with the lenticular sheet.

Is it eco-friendly?

The lenticular lenses that we use are made of PET plastics, which are 100% recyclable. Lenses can be ground and shredded for reuse as post-consumer material by most recycling operations. Printvid is proud to be a part of those actively involved in safeguarding our environment. We believe it is the responsibility of each one of us to develop ideas, trends, and technologies in ways that respect the environment and its inhabitants.

How Record Breaker perk can actually lengthen Hologram?

This perk allow us to produce and add one more lenticular print into the Hologram, so every bit helps!

How often will I get new templates on Printvid Plus subscription?

Every 2-3 weeks.

How many templates available at launch?

The amount is specified in perk descriptions. Plus there will be weekly updates, so during the first year from launch there will be over 500 design templates.

Can I purchase Instavid, Mixvid, Bigvid and other material packages after the Printvid campaign? 

First we will ship all Indiegogo orders at very special prices. After that we will introduce a great variety of additional material packages including new print sizes, different shapes and more functionality (for example, smartphone and tablet cases).

If I have further questions where can I contact Printvid? 

You can reach us at contact@printvid.com

story:
What is LADYBAG?

LADYBAG is the first hight-end multifunctional handbag on the market which:

  • Can charge your phone and tablet 
  • Gives off heat during cold days
  • Is a high-end handbag produced of top quality leather



LADYBAG consists of five parts: a handbag, heating pads, a Ladybag battery, a switch and a charger. Each of our bags comes also with an adjustable and removable shoulder strap so that you can warm up your hands even while walking or standing. The heating pads work on 12V voltage and are on the outside pocket of the bag so that the inside part will stay cool. The outside pocket is where the heating pad is located. You can either unzip the pocket partly to slip your hands in or unzip the pocket fully and fold it down to sit on.

Are you waiting outside in the park for a friend? 

Or outside of school for your children? 

Unzip your Ladybag pocket to sit on while you wait in the cold winter months.

Power in LADYBAG

What powers LADYBAG is a high capacity 8000 mAh battery. With this power one can charge up to three electrical devices at one time, providing long lasting battery power to ones devices throughout the day. The 1A and 2A USB connections allow women with apple products and other phones and tablets to charge from their Ladybag up to 4 full times a day, while the 4.75 mm jack plug connector is used to recharge your heating pad. Once recharged, this Ladybag battery allows the heating pad to work for almost 3 hours at a time on maximum heat and minimally half an hour more on minimum heat.

Activating the heating pad

Turning on the heating pad is extremely simple. Just connect the cable to the battery and turn the battery into the “on” position (the blue light with sign 12V will appear on the battery). Once you see the switch inside of the bag blinking, that means the bag is starting to heat up. There are three levels of heating and you can change the temperature by slightly pushing the switch inside the bag. You can also turn the heating off using the same switch with which you change the temperature. Or you can turn it off by turning off the battery. There is no need to deal with portable hand warmers or unstylish gloves, you can warm your hands and body up with your own trendy handbag.

LADYBAGS for this campaign:

LADYBAG Iron Lady 199 $

Find more pictures on Pinterest


LADYBAG Magnum Black 219$

 Find more pictures on Pinterest

LADYBAG Red Carpet 219$

Find more pictures on Pinterest


LADYBAG Blue Ocean 249$

Find more pictures on Pinterest
LADYBAG Referral Contest

Win your own LADYBAG of your choice or high capacity LADYBAG battery!

  •  One person who will share the link to our indiegogo page the most times during the whole campaign will win the LADYBAG of the style he/she will choose.  It is so simple! Just share our Indiegogo page through Facebook or Tweeter as many times as you can.

  • One person sharing the most each week of the campaign will be rewarded every week by our high capacity LADYBAG battery.

  • One person who will bring to our Indiegogo page the most funders based on his/her sharing will get one Ladybag of own choice at the end of the campaign for free. (If you share our link with your friend B and B will visit our page and buy the perk, our analytics will "attribute" the referral to you. The more referrals you gather, the bigger is the chance you will win our LADYBAG.)
(Important note: In order to take part in the referral contest you have to be either loged into Indiegogo or you have to be a funder as only then the system will generate the special link for you and we will be able to track your sharing in our analytics. All prizes will be delivered to the winners of the referral contest only if the campaign is successful.)

Our goal

We want to bring this unique product to you and other women around the world. Keeping your iPads and iPhones charged, staying warm and looking stylish is the goal of LADYBAG. Women are busy working, traveling and taking care of their children and need to stay connected, while spotting the latest fashion trends and high-quality handbags. 

Design

Each of the handbags has the latest trends combined with our unique designs. So far, there are four different designs of LADYBAG, but more designs are being introduced daily as the trends of the handbag market change. Each LADYBAG is produced with the highest quality leather and allows each customer to choose their style and color of the bag. Some LADYBAGS are more small, chic and elegant – for the working lady, or bigger, relaxed and casual – for the moms who need extra space. Order multiple LADYBAG’s in different styles and colors to go with your outfit each day, while not worrying about being cold or your electronics dying on you.

OUR history

LADYBAG has been a work in progress for many years. At first, we ordered parts individually and would put together these bags for our family members and friends as holiday or birthday gifts. Once, we started to see the usefulness of these bags and started receiving great feedback, we realized this idea could benefit working women around the world. Once we started sketching designs and forming relationships with the raw material manufacturers (we changed a few of them in order to get the top quality and are cooperating now only with the best ones), LADYBAG began to become a concrete product and not just an idea. Once a few of the bag designs were in our hands, we hired a professional for a photo shoot so we could spread the world about LADYBAG on worldwide social media networks. We now have a facebook page. Twitter and Pinterest page. The word is spreading around the world and we need your help to continue spreading our idea! Please share this campaign with all your friends, family and colleagues and “like” our facebook page. Become a part of the LADYBAG story and help us find LADYBAG enthusiasts worldwide get connected.”

Where are we now?

We are currently at the stage of launching our fully operational sample handbags into the high-end handbag market. We have tested the raw materials and components of the handbags for durability, reliability and functionality for the long-term. We are confident that our materials will meet each customers conditions and will be a product that lasts. We have created our first four lines of bags that vary from casual and sporty to chic and elegant. We are continuing to test the products used in the bags, modifying the style and improving the electronic parts. In December, we will officially launch our products on the handbag market and will hopefully produce enough bags to meet the rising demand.

Delivery Details

As we are still in the manufacturing stage of our handbag line, for all pre-orders it will take approximately 4 months to receive your LADYBAG. The parts of the bag are manufactured from the highest quality and most trusted factories around the world, then assembled and shipped from Czech Republic. We want your bag to be of the highest quality and functionality before it arrives at your doorstep, so please allow 4 months from the time of order. Make sure to order your LADYBAG in time for the holidays, cold months or as a perfect Christmas present.

FAQ

How can the handbag heat and charge?

In our unique handbag is incorporated a heating system. On  outside and the design you will hardly recognize anything as the heating secret is hidden in the outside pocket. Two incorporated heating pads ensure that your hands or butt will get quickly warmed up whenever you need it. The source of energy comes from our LADYBAG battery witch has a very modern design and will not only enable giving off the heat by the heating pads but at the same time it is able to charge both your phone and tablet.

Can the LADYBAG battery charge any tablet or phone?

Yes, it can! The LADYBAG battery has 2 USB ports where you can connect the cable of your phone and tablet from any brand.

Can the LADYBAG battery heat the bag and charge both phone and tablet at the same time?

Yes. Our unique LADYBAG battery has a capacity of 8 000 mAh, enabling you to charge multiple electronic devices, while using the heating portion to warm your hands up when it is cold. All of this without ruining the leather of the bag or heating the contents inside of the handbag.

Dou you sell the LADYBAG only with a European plug?

No we deliver the product with a European plug for EU customers and with an American plug for US customers.

What are the safety features of the bag since it deals with heat?

LADYBAG is made with only the top quality leather and electronic devices. The leather has successfully been tested with the electronic parts on maximum power inside. The leather does not melt or become so hot it could burn someone. We have gone to extensive measures to make the LADYBAGS with top quality materials to ensure safety to our customers, as well as a trendy handbag to carry around.

What will you use the money for?

So far we have invested a lot of money in the development of the product, production of the Alfa and Beta prototypes, its testing and improvements. We also invested in patent and trade mark applications and in quality and safety testing. Now we need to pay for certification of the product and the LADYBAG is ready for you to enjoy it. We want to bring this unique product to as many women as possible and here we need your help. We are aware of the fact that without your help it would be hard to spread the LADYBAG worldwide as our sources are limited. We will use all the money granted for:

-  ordering the components and production of bags (the more we order, the better the price, which will enable us to invest more in development)

-  testing of each bag

-  certification by the authorities

-  logistic (logistic by higher volumes is much cheaper)

-  further development

-  based on the demand from countries we will make local web pages

Other ways you can help:

Besides monetary support of LADYBAG we are just as appreciative of those who help us spread the word about this unique product! One can share the link from our Indiegogo campaign page through e-mail, twitter, facebook or Pinterest. Send the information to your family, friends and colleagues to help us garner support for LADYBAG. We will acknowledge and thank anyone who shares our product, as you are adding so much value to the LADYBAG product.

I wear in my handbag cosmetics and sometimes even chocolate, can´t they melt from the heating?

You don´t have to worry at all, we incorporated the heating pads into the outside pocket which has isolation foam on the inner side of the bag. The inner part is therefore well protected. It can get a bit warmer but definitely not so warm that it would melt your make up.

How do I tell you about my personalized message?

Please make sure that after ordering your perk you send an e-mail to ladybag@ladybag.cz where you will write us which text you wish to have imprinted on the bag.

How much should I add for shipping?

Please add: $ 15 Europe, $30 World

Is the shoulder strap part of each LADYBAG? And is it adjustable and removable?

Yes, it is. Only the LADYBAG Iron Lady has due to its design a strap which is not removable.

We need your help!

Thank you again for visiting our Indiegogo campaign! We hope that after you have read a little more about our new product, you are as excited about it as we are. Please feel free to order as many perks as you would like as well as sharing our information on your social media website. Not only will you help us spread the word, but by ordering a LADYBAG you will be able to support this unique, chic handbag that is not yet in stores. Thank you for your interest in LADYBAG and we hope to hear from you soon!

Thanks to our colleagues

We would like to thank here our friends and colleagues Radim, Danica, Janci, Zdenko, JD and Madeline for their tremendous support. Without you we would not be as far as we are right now. Thank you so much!!!
