story:
Sustainably made unisex jacket for cyclists and outdoor lovers.  Perfect for changing weather conditions.  

Our mission is to create sustainable, multi functioning clothing that inspires a lifestyle of urban adventure. By creating minimalist, functional, timeless designs and using the best quality performance fabrics our customers can enjoy our product for years to come.

 

THE MEANDER JACKET 

Designed with Style and Performance in equal measure, guided by our values of sustainability, minimalism and value.

The Meander Jacket is unisex, comes in a variety of sizes and is available in 3 colour options.

 

 

 

SHIPPING 

Worldwide shipping is free for all reward levels.  For international shipments, the consignee is responsible for local duties and taxes, however, these will not apply in the US, Europe and UK.  We would ask all other countries to check local rates. 

 

RISK-FREE GUARANTEE 

We’re confident that you’ll love your Meander jacket.  If it doesn’t fit or if for any reason, you really don’t like it, you can return it within a month for your money back or an exchange. We want you to take a chance on us, so we’ll mitigate that risk via this money-back guarantee.

 

OUR BRAND VALUES

SUSTAINABILITY – We don’t use harmful chemical, use renewable energy where possible and offset unavoidable emissions by planting trees in local Scottish woodlands. (See more below)

MINIMALISM – Our products and our business focus on simplicity and functionality – we never over complicate things.

QUALITY AND VALUE – We produce high end clothing for the best possible value.

GIVING BACK – We plan to give a percentage of profits (when we get there) to environmental charities, but in the meantime we’ll be planting an additional tree for every jacket sold.

 

 

  “Beauty; Copenhagen meets Edinburgh on this one; Lovely”      Review by Mark Hogarth    

      

 

  "Every now and then a beautiful Scottish brand emerges with style and substance in equal measure"                                    Reviewed by Gordon J Millar - @ScotStreetStyle      

 

 

  "A great jacket to zoom around town, stylish and functional at the same time"
                                       Reviewed by Markus Stitz - Round the world cyclist - @reizkultur

 

AS SEEN IN

 

MULTI FUNCTIONAL DESIGN

Designed to be adaptable in changing weather conditions, the Meander jacket packs into its large rear pocket and can be used as a backpack, messenger or saddle bag.   

 

 

FEATURES

Inspired by Scandinavian design, simplicity, minimalism and functionality. 

The Meander Jacket features are designed to enhance your outdoor experience. 

 

 

 

HIDDEN REFLECTIVE ELEMENTS

We know its important to be seen when you're on your bike so we've added plenty of reflectivity in the cuffs, rear pocket and hood.   

We also wanted to create a great looking jacket that you want to wear off the bike, so the reflective elements in the cuff and rear pocket can be tucked away when you're not cycling.

 

Reflectivity when you need it - hidden away when you don't

 

NOT ALL WATERPROOFS ARE CREATED EQUAL

We have teamed up with of the finest mill in the Como region of Italy who match our design ethos and specialize in stylish fabrics with performance qualities.  Our chosen fabrics have the look and feel of a luxury fashion jacket but are also highly breathable and have a waterproof rating of over 10,000mm (for context, a minimum waterproof rating of 5,000 mm is recommended for ski and snowboard jackets)

We then work with a specialist outwear manufacturer in Europe who are craftsmen in their field of outwear and waterproof garments. The factory tape all of the seams to provide the best protection from the elements and have years of experience producing outerwear for the like of Barbour and Joules.

 

We are working with a specialist outwear manufacturer in Europe who are craftsmen in their field of outwear and waterproof garments. 

 

SIZE GUIDE

 

There will be the opportunity to confirm all sizes at the end of the campaign.  The above size chart is based on a regular fit garment.  If you prefer oversized then go for a size up.

 

TIMELINE

 

Production Schedule

Campaign funding until May 31st, 2018.

Fabric and Trims Orders Placed 1st week June

3rd August begin cutting and manufacturing

24th September - Finish Assembly and quality control 

End September - Ship to Warehouse

October - Ship to Backers

 

 

SUSTAINABILITY

Carbon Neutral Production – we strive to produce as little CO2 as possible and have partnered with a mill that sustains itself with clean eco-friendly energy. For the CO2  that we do produce we then offset this by planting trees which will soak up CO2 as they grow.

One Tree Per Jacket – We want to do more than just offset our emissions, so we have teamed up with Forest Carbon to plant 1 extra tree for every jacket sold in a local woodland in the Scottish Borders. These woodlands can regulate water quality and supply, reduce soil erosion, stabilise riverbanks and mitigate flooding.

Transportation – CO2 emissions linked to transportation can represent 50% of the total carbon impact of a product & transporting goods by air can produce as much as 100 times as  by sea. Our fabric mill, factory and distribution headquarters are all based in Europe to minimise transportation and we try to use the least polluting modes of transport available.

Made to last – Fast fashion has become one of the largest contributors to pollution from the clothing industry. It usually involves vast transportation, more polluting manufacturing methods and isn't made to last. We don’t want to be a part of that, so our jackets are made to last and we’ve made timeless styles that will look good in your wardrobe for years to come.

Lifetime repair – In line with creating our products to be made to last, we are offering a lifetime repair service on all of our product. If there is any wear and tear, then send it back to us and for a nominal handling charge we will fix it up and get it right back to you.

No Harmful Chemicals – Our mills do not use of PFC (linked to cancer and birth defects) or other harmful chemicals and are committed to the ZDHC roadmap to tackling the issue of hazardous chemicals in the textile supply chain. The leather straps we use for our saddle bag are tanned with vegetable tannins rather than the more common and harmful Chromium.

Factory – We believe that its really important to know where your clothes are getting made, especially in the wake of the Rana Plaza disaster in 2013. Our fabric comes from a family run mill in Italy and we are happy to work with a specialist performance factory in Sofia that we’ve visited during development of our products and can trust in their high standards.  

Constant Improvement – To us this is just the start. We are constantly learning and know we can do better, so we are committed to constantly strive to have as little negative effect as possible and have as much positive effect as we can on the world we live in.

 

OUR BUSINESS MODEL

By working direct with the manufacturer and selling direct to the consumer we’re able to offer quality design and high performance Italian fabrics for a fair price. 

 

OUR STORY

We’re Jill and Steve, the team behind Meander. We’re cyclists and adventurers based in Edinburgh, Scotland with backgrounds in fashion and engineering.

A couple of years ago, we organised a charity cycle from London to Paris an had the idea to start Meander,  we were looking for stylish and functional cycle wear but we couldn’t find it. 

We weren’t racing but going on a journey with friends and wanted one jacket that was both stylish and functional but it didn’t exist.  We found a lot of bright neon jackets and unflattering lycra which got us asking, Why are most cycling brands catering for people racing – when most cyclists don’t race?

After two years of research, development, fabric sourcing and countless prototypes, we’re excited to bring our product to life and start the Meander journey.  

 

TEAM 

                                      

CONTACT

If you have any questions, comments  we’d love to hear from you. We will try to reply to all comments on Indiegogo and you can reach us by email or social media:

Info@MeanderApparel.com

              @meanderapparel
story_txt:
Sustainably made unisex jacket for cyclists and outdoor lovers.  Perfect for changing weather conditions.  
Our mission is to create sustainable, multi functioning clothing that inspires a lifestyle of urban adventure. By creating minimalist, functional, timeless designs and using the best quality performance fabrics our customers can enjoy our product for years to come. THE MEANDER JACKET Designed with Style and Performance in equal measure, guided by our values of sustainability, minimalism and value.The Meander Jacket is unisex, comes in a variety of sizes and is available in 3 colour options.   SHIPPING Worldwide shipping is free for all reward levels.  For international shipments, the consignee is responsible for local duties and taxes, however, these will not apply in the US, Europe and UK.  We would ask all other countries to check local rates.  RISK-FREE GUARANTEE We’re confident that you’ll love your Meander jacket.  If it doesn’t fit or if for any reason, you really don’t like it, you can return it within a month for your money back or an exchange. We want you to take a chance on us, so we’ll mitigate that risk via this money-back guarantee. OUR BRAND VALUESSUSTAINABILITY – We don’t use harmful chemical, use renewable energy where possible and offset unavoidable emissions by planting trees in local Scottish woodlands. (See more below)MINIMALISM – Our products and our business focus on simplicity and functionality – we never over complicate things.QUALITY AND VALUE – We produce high end clothing for the best possible value.GIVING BACK – We plan to give a percentage of profits (when we get there) to environmental charities, but in the meantime we’ll be planting an additional tree for every jacket sold.    “Beauty; Copenhagen meets Edinburgh on this one; Lovely”      Review by Mark Hogarth             "Every now and then a beautiful Scottish brand emerges with style and substance in equal measure"                                    Reviewed by Gordon J Millar - @ScotStreetStyle          "A great jacket to zoom around town, stylish and functional at the same time"                                       Reviewed by Markus Stitz - Round the world cyclist - @reizkultur AS SEEN IN MULTI FUNCTIONAL DESIGNDesigned to be adaptable in changing weather conditions, the Meander jacket packs into its large rear pocket and can be used as a backpack, messenger or saddle bag.     FEATURESInspired by Scandinavian design, simplicity, minimalism and functionality. The Meander Jacket features are designed to enhance your outdoor experience.    HIDDEN REFLECTIVE ELEMENTSWe know its important to be seen when you're on your bike so we've added plenty of reflectivity in the cuffs, rear pocket and hood.   We also wanted to create a great looking jacket that you want to wear off the bike, so the reflective elements in the cuff and rear pocket can be tucked away when you're not cycling. Reflectivity when you need it - hidden away when you don't NOT ALL WATERPROOFS ARE CREATED EQUALWe have teamed up with of the finest mill in the Como region of Italy who match our design ethos and specialize in stylish fabrics with performance qualities.  Our chosen fabrics have the look and feel of a luxury fashion jacket but are also highly breathable and have a waterproof rating of over 10,000mm (for context, a minimum waterproof rating of 5,000 mm is recommended for ski and snowboard jackets)We then work with a specialist outwear manufacturer in Europe who are craftsmen in their field of outwear and waterproof garments. The factory tape all of the seams to provide the best protection from the elements and have years of experience producing outerwear for the like of Barbour and Joules. We are working with a specialist outwear manufacturer in Europe who are craftsmen in their field of outwear and waterproof garments.  SIZE GUIDE There will be the opportunity to confirm all sizes at the end of the campaign.  The above size chart is based on a regular fit garment.  If you prefer oversized then go for a size up. TIMELINE Production ScheduleCampaign funding until May 31st, 2018.Fabric and Trims Orders Placed 1st week June3rd August begin cutting and manufacturing24th September - Finish Assembly and quality control End September - Ship to WarehouseOctober - Ship to Backers  SUSTAINABILITYCarbon Neutral Production – we strive to produce as little CO2 as possible and have partnered with a mill that sustains itself with clean eco-friendly energy. For the CO2  that we do produce we then offset this by planting trees which will soak up CO2 as they grow.One Tree Per Jacket – We want to do more than just offset our emissions, so we have teamed up with Forest Carbon to plant 1 extra tree for every jacket sold in a local woodland in the Scottish Borders. These woodlands can regulate water quality and supply, reduce soil erosion, stabilise riverbanks and mitigate flooding.Transportation – CO2 emissions linked to transportation can represent 50% of the total carbon impact of a product & transporting goods by air can produce as much as 100 times as  by sea. Our fabric mill, factory and distribution headquarters are all based in Europe to minimise transportation and we try to use the least polluting modes of transport available.Made to last – Fast fashion has become one of the largest contributors to pollution from the clothing industry. It usually involves vast transportation, more polluting manufacturing methods and isn't made to last. We don’t want to be a part of that, so our jackets are made to last and we’ve made timeless styles that will look good in your wardrobe for years to come.Lifetime repair – In line with creating our products to be made to last, we are offering a lifetime repair service on all of our product. If there is any wear and tear, then send it back to us and for a nominal handling charge we will fix it up and get it right back to you.No Harmful Chemicals – Our mills do not use of PFC (linked to cancer and birth defects) or other harmful chemicals and are committed to the ZDHC roadmap to tackling the issue of hazardous chemicals in the textile supply chain. The leather straps we use for our saddle bag are tanned with vegetable tannins rather than the more common and harmful Chromium.Factory – We believe that its really important to know where your clothes are getting made, especially in the wake of the Rana Plaza disaster in 2013. Our fabric comes from a family run mill in Italy and we are happy to work with a specialist performance factory in Sofia that we’ve visited during development of our products and can trust in their high standards.  Constant Improvement – To us this is just the start. We are constantly learning and know we can do better, so we are committed to constantly strive to have as little negative effect as possible and have as much positive effect as we can on the world we live in. OUR BUSINESS MODELBy working direct with the manufacturer and selling direct to the consumer we’re able to offer quality design and high performance Italian fabrics for a fair price.  OUR STORYWe’re Jill and Steve, the team behind Meander. We’re cyclists and adventurers based in Edinburgh, Scotland with backgrounds in fashion and engineering.A couple of years ago, we organised a charity cycle from London to Paris an had the idea to start Meander,  we were looking for stylish and functional cycle wear but we couldn’t find it. We weren’t racing but going on a journey with friends and wanted one jacket that was both stylish and functional but it didn’t exist.  We found a lot of bright neon jackets and unflattering lycra which got us asking, Why are most cycling brands catering for people racing – when most cyclists don’t race?After two years of research, development, fabric sourcing and countless prototypes, we’re excited to bring our product to life and start the Meander journey.   TEAM                                       CONTACTIf you have any questions, comments  we’d love to hear from you. We will try to reply to all comments on Indiegogo and you can reach us by email or social media:Info@MeanderApparel.com               @meanderapparel

story:
GallioTempo company was born from the passion for watches instilled to the founder by his grandfather, a farmer from a small town close to Vicenza called Gallio, and who used to show him his collection of pocket watches handed down from father to son through generations.

 

 

The Trident Watch by GallioTempo  

The features of Trident are the interchangeable colored stainless steel rings (available in green, orange and metal color)... you can adapt your Trident watch to your daily look! Furthermore, 316L stainless steel case, anti-scratch sapphire crystal, CItizen Miyota 821A movement and sailcloth straps are some of the features that make Trident the "WATCH PAR EXCELLENCE".

 

Technical Specifications

- 42mm diameter case, made of 316L Stainless Steel  

- 20ATM (200 meters) water resistant  

- Sapphire Crystal  

- Citizen Miyota® (Japan) 821A Automatic Movement  

- Stainless steel colored rings  

- Sailcloth straps by iWantAStrap.com 
  (dimensions: 11cm on the 'holes' side and 7.5cm on the buckle side)

- Swiss Super-LumiNova® pigments for the highest possible afterglow performance

 

Design

Italy is recognized as being a worldwide trendsetter and leader in design: the architect Luigi Caccia Dominioni claims that “Quite simply, we are the best” and that “We have more imagination, more culture, and are better mediators between the past and the future”. Italy today still exerts a vast influence on urban design, industrial design and fashion design worldwide and Italy’s iconic design has emerged into the common phrase “Made in Italy”. Italy’s age old traditions of world-class craftsmanship are a cornerstone for all Gallio Tempo make – the research and the quality of each material make it the watch made in Italy par excellence.

 

Citizen Miyota® 821A Automatic Movement

Our timepiece is powered by Miyota® 821A movement, a mechanical movement from Japanese company Citizen®. It is considered one of the most reliable on the market. The main spring is powered by the caliber through a winding rotor excited by your daily wrist movement. The movement has a power reserve built-in, therefore our watch will keep running while not being used. Miyota 821A has 45 hours of power reserve! Rubies are used because in the movement because of their hardness. More specifically, Miyota 821A is twenty-one jewels movement.

 

316L Stainless Steel Case

The 42mm diamenter case is made by 316L Stainless Steel. Stainless steels are notable for their corrosion resistance, which increases with increasing chromium content. Additions of molybdenum increase corrosion resistance in reducing acids and against pitting attack in chloride solutions. Thus, there are numerous grades of stainless steel with varying chromium and molybdenum contents to suit the environment the alloy must endure. Stainless steel’s resistance to corrosion and staining, low maintenance, and familiar lustre make it an ideal material for many applications and it is the most used material for luxury watches.

 

Sapphire Crystal

All of our watches are fitted with sapphire crystal, the most resistant crystal there is. Sapphire is a naturally growing crystal and the second hardest substance on the planet, so hard that only a diamond can scratch it. Our sapphire crystal is cut from a polished slice of solid sapphire made by the fusion and crystallization of alumina. The end result is beautiful, but more importantly hardly unbreakable. 
Try to scratch it!

 

Colored SS Rings

We decided to make our Trident watch unique by implementing a detail that we had never seen in a luxury watch until now . The stainless steel colored rings give at the watch a sporty and easy look, but in the same time enrich it in detail. The color of the rings match perfectly with the stitching of the straps.. this match make our Trident watch the ideal watch for every daily look. 
Four different colored rings (green, red, metal and blue) are available! 
One watch and many customizations!

 

Super-LumiNova® Technology

Swiss Super-LumiNova® pigments are the first choice of the watch industry for the highest possible afterglow performance. The material is non-radioactive, REACH compatible and resistant to high temperature and enviromental agents. It works like a storage battery where light charges the battery first and , afterwards, the light is continuously emitted. This activation and subsequent light emission process can be repeated again and again and the material does not suffer any ageing. It is chargeable with sunlight or artificial light. Mixed with a suitable specific binder, Swiss Super-LumiNova® is applied on dials and hands.

 

Sailcloth Straps by iWantAStraps.com

Trident collection use sailcloth patterned straps by iWantAStraps.com, the perfect strap for any sports watch. Its durable stamped sailcloth nylon coupled with its quick drying properties makes this strap the “go-to” strap for many watch enthusiast. We offer 5 different color stitching that are matching with external watch’s colored rings, to be sure that your look will be always the best.

 

Leather Box

 

 

 

Risks and challenges

We are passionate watch lovers and want to create a luxury and adventure italian watch brand, inspired by the tradition and the classic style, but looking ahead to the future and the new tendencies of horology design. 
Our style and work represent Italian manufacturing tradition. 
We launch this campaign to seek passionate supporters for Italian brand and quality. Our TRIDENT collection is unique for who love watches and the world of luxury microbrand.

As we are already deep in the production process, we are several steps ahead of other projects, and have greatly lessened the number of steps our project will have to jump through after our campaign ends. It is always possible for delays with production though, so we have added some extra time in our estimates to provide for this. 
We'll keep you informed every step of the way.

Backers are responsible for any Duty/VAT/GST charges for their own country, which may vary according to each country’s legal and taxation structure. GallioTempo® legally cannot pay for or compensate customers for their own country’s Duties or VAT or GST. Upon purchasing a GallioTempo® Watch, you are acknowledging that you are aware of and intend to pay for your own Duties or VAT or GST on your purchase. 
For more information or to calculate your Duty/VAT/GST please visit this website: http://www.thevatcalculator.com/international-v...

story:
I am AJ Avecilla and I run the shop Nerdywolves.  These are pins perfect for the holiday season or any season which features BT21 characters by BTS.

The pins will be funded with a small minimum and each tier will be unlocked once we reach that amount.

The first pins to be unlocked once the goal is reached is Chimmy and Cooky.

First Pin: Chimmy

Second Pin: Cooky

Third Pin: Tata

Fourth Pin: Shooky

Fifth Pin: RJ

Sixth Pin: Mang

Seventh Pin: Koya

 

If we get to $2000, a design for Van will be unlocked.

Here are some of the popular pins I currently sell in my shop that are inspired by BTS.

story:
our craftsmen at work 
 

 

 

FAQ'S

Where is the company located and where are the products made?

Our company is located in Hyderabad,India, our products are made at the same location.

Does the company have a brick and mortar store?

No, we currently do not have a brick and mortar store. We are working towards setting one up by 2020.

Where can I make a purchase of an I L A M R A product?

You can purchase our clothing directly from our website www.ilamra.com

Can I make a bulk purchase?

Please write to us at ilamralabel@gmail.com with your details and we will get in touch.

How long will it take to receive my product?

We will start production immediately after the campaign ends and you can expect to receive your products by January 2019 or if not earlier.

What size do I order my perk in?

Use our size guide below before you place an order.

story:
As an industrial designer, the inspiration for the design came from my personal experience. I often have small items wandering around in my pocket. They are sometimes hard to find, and even some are missing or broken. It may not be a life-changing problem but certainly is such an inconvenient experience in daily life.

 

Keri is a lightweight mini wallet & case with modern style that can hold your most essential items.

Keri consists of top cover, base container, and elastic band. You can place items in the base container, and the elastic band holds the top & base parts together.

Frequently used cards and cash can be stored under the band that acts as a money clip.

Keri can be used as a wallet, business card holder, ID card holder, and so on.

 

 

 

Optional lanyard kit is available with a high-quality natural leather cord and a specially designed elastic band.

 

 

 

 

We are a group of designers, each with over 15+ years of experiences in product & UX design. We are passionate about finding problems and creating solutions, always trying to see things through the users' mind and point of view.

 

We have improved upon our prototypes many times and completed functional prototype production. We need your support to bring it to mass production. We have already partnered with top tier manufacturers, and they are ready to set to work as soon as the funding goals are met. We have several years of experiences working with them and know they will follow every step we require to produce the highest quality product.

 

Shipping will be ready a month after the funding campaign ends. Please refer to the schedule below.

We have several years of experiences working with them and know they will follow every step we require to produce the highest quality product.

 


Shipping will be ready a month after the funding campaign ends. Please refer to the schedule below.

story:
The sunglasses that change with your lifestyle! Our sunglasses are polarised with UV400 protection ready for any adventure. The unique magnetic hinges mean you can customise on the go! Match your mood, outfit or day ahead.

Select one of our perks to get your hands on a pair!

 The colour combinations are almost limitless; while the Indiegogo campaign is running, head to our website and use the colour selector and create your perfect pair. Once you've chosen your perk we will be in touch and ask you what design you would like.

Go to colour selector

For us, the brand is more than just products; it’s about personal expression and being part of Espii means having the confidence to fully express yourself. Our goal is to help people not to live a life designed by someone else; it’s to live a life designed by you.

The way we do this is by making our sunglasses an extension of the person's individuality, changeable because life isn't static and robust because being self expressed means putting yourself out there.

So that everyone can Express the Now we've created a fantastic custom sunglasses line, 


Instant customisation 

What makes the Espii Frontier unique is the instant customisation you get from the magnetic hinges. They have been engineered to easily pop on and off to quickly change your look. At the same time they are designed to stay locked in place, ready for your next adventure.

Lightweight and Tough The frames are made from TR90 Thermoplastic which is incredibly suited for the outdoor lifestyle. They are lightweight which makes them comfortable to wear. The material has shape memory so that they can more impact and flex back to their original shape. More much durable than your average pair of sunglasses.

 The Lenses 

We created the lenses using a robust polycarbonate which has high impact resistance and also great optical performance. The lenses come in six colours; 4 REVO mirrored lenses and 2 tints. 

Maximum protection

The lenses have 100% UV400 protection to filter out potentially dangerous UVA + UVB rays. We have polarised every lens so that you wont be slowed down by the Sun's bright glare. Our lens surpass North American and European standards for medical safety.

1. Choose from the selection of Perks at the top right of the page.

2. You will be taken to the next page to make a payment, where you can pay by Credit or Debit Card.

3. We will email you , so you can tell us which colour combination you would like. If you order multiple pairs, we recommend ordering different parts to maximise your colour combinations.

4. Once we receive the order from the manufacturer (August 2016), we will carefully create your design and ship them with love. Delivery time for the UK/ Europe will be 2-5 days and upto 10 days for the Rest of the World.

Share with your friends


FAQs

What size are Espii Frontiers?

We designed them as one size fits all, the flexibility of the material means they will be comfortable with any head size.

Frame width 147mm

Frame Height 50mm

Arm Length 142mm

When do I give you my design?

 We will message you and ask for your favourite colour combination.

What if I have entered the wrong details?
Please contact us at chris@espii.co and we can make any changes to your order.

Are prescription lenses available?
At the moment we only stock non-prescription lenses. We will work to make this an option in the future.

How long will they take to deliver?
Once our first manufacturer order arrives (August 2016), we will carefully put your designs together and ship with love. For UK delivery expect 1-2 days, Europe 2-5 days and the Rest of the World 5-7 days. ( based on courier information 31/03/16)

What are your plans for 2016?

We plan to produce more colours and styles for your to express the now and add to your collection.


Do you ship worldwide?

Yes, we will ship globally from day one so everyone can enjoy Espii.

Say Hello


For anything we haven't covered in out FAQ section please contact us:

Supporters: chris@espii.co:


Business: powwow@espii.co

 We will message you and ask for your favourite colour combination.
What if I have entered the wrong details?Please contact us at chris@espii.co and we can make any changes to your order.Are prescription lenses available?At the moment we only stock non-prescription lenses. We will work to make this an option in the future.How long will they take to deliver?Once our first manufacturer order arrives (August 2016), we will carefully put your designs together and ship with love. For UK delivery expect 1-2 days, Europe 2-5 days and the Rest of the World 5-7 days. ( based on courier information 31/03/16)
What are your plans for 2016?We plan to produce more colours and styles for your to express the now and add to your collection.Do you ship worldwide?
Yes, we will ship globally from day one so everyone can enjoy Espii.
Say Hello
For anything we haven't covered in out FAQ section please contact us:Supporters: chris@espii.co:
Business: powwow@espii.co

story:
Kurzbeschreibung

Nach dem großen Erfolgen der letzten Jahre wollen wir 2014 in die dritte Runde gehen „Nordisch by Nature 3.1“ wird das 3. Hundefrisbee-Turnier und die 1. Deutsche Meisterschaft in Hamburg. In Kooperation zwischen Inspiration Hund aus Hamburg und den Discrockers aus Karlsruhe.

Was wir brauchen & Was man bekommt

Wir brauchen Sponsoren um das Ziel von 1500,- € zu erreichen. 
Der Betrag setzt sich wie folgt zusammen,

50 Stück T-Shrits € 480,-

50 Stück Frisbee € 310,-

5.000 Stück Flyer Din A6 € 70,-

100 Stück Plakate DIN A3 € 40,-

6 Stück Glastrophäen € 100,-

2 Tage Platzmiete, Rennbahn € 500,-

Leistungen Urban Hounds“Nordisch by Nature 3.1”

ab € 5,- dein Name auf dem Event-Shirt.

ab € 15,- dein Name auf dem Event-Shirt + eine Eventscheibe

ab € 20,- dein Name auf dem Event-Shirt + ein Eventshirt 

ab € 50,- dein Name auf dem Event-Shirt + eine Event-Scheibe und ein Event-Shirt

ab €100,- dein Name/Logo auf dem Event-Shirt, der Internetenseiten (+Link) und auf den Flyern + ein Starterpackages

ab € 170,- dein Name/Logo auf dem Event-Shirt, Flyern, Poster Internetauftritt und auf der Fotowand + ein Starterpackages

Die Auswirkung

discdogging

Hundefrisbee bietet jedem gesunden und spielfreudigen Hund eine Beschäftigung, die ihn nicht nur geistig, sondern auch körperlich auslastet. Um Verhaltensauffälligkeiten, die aus einer Unterbeschäftigung resultieren können, vorzubeugen, ist Hundesport gerade für sehr aktive Hunde besonders wichtig. Darüber hinaus festigt Hundefrisbee die Mensch-Hund-Beziehung.

spielprinzip

Das Judge 'n Play Reglements kommt aus dem Freestyle Frisbee/ Menschen Frisbee, wo jeweils in sogenannten Pools (Gruppen) gespielt wird.

Beispiel: Pool A und Pool B. Während Pool A spielt, richtet Pool B diesen, anschließend wird getauscht. Diese Form haben wir mit Hilfe von Spielern aus der Hunde- sowie Menschenfrisbeeszene in feinster Kleinarbeit, mit viel Mühe und Gedankenaustausch im Hundefrisbee implementiert, so dass das Judge'n Play Regelwerk DIE alternative Turnierform zu den sonstigen Reglements geworden ist! Beim Judge'nPlay ist jeder Spieler gleichzeitig auch Richter - der Headjudge/Veranstalter/ Ausrichter teilt den Spieler in die jeweilige Kategorie (Spielniveau) und Pools ein (Er schafft für alle Teilnehmer gleiche Verhältnisse / Voraussetzungen) es gibt auf jedem Turnier mindestens zwei Pools, die jeweils aus mindestens 5 Spielern bestehen Jeweils 2 Spieler (in dem Fall = Richter) Bewerten eine der drei Kategorien:

Mensch,

Hund oder

Team.

Einer der Mitveranstalter oder ein bereits erfahrener Spieler wird Headjudge des Turnieres und ist während des Richtens bei den Richtern, hilft, gibt Tipps und kontrolliert mögliche extreme Bewertungsschwankungen.

datum , ort und umfang

Samstag, 07.06 und Sonntag 08.06..2014 von 10:00 bis ca. 17:00 Uhr auf dem Gelände des “Norddeutscher Windhundrennverein e.V.” Es werden ca. 30 Teams (Mensch-Hund-Teams) aus ganz Deutschland und ca. 250 Zuschauer erwartet.

zielgruppe, angebot

Das Turnier spricht sämtliche Personen von Jung bis Alt an. Programm und Infrastruktur ist so gewählt, dass sowohl für Hundehalter, wie auch für alle anderen etwas dabei ist. Das Kulinarische Angebot beinhaltet bewährte Verpflegungsmöglichkeiten u.a. ein Barbeque, Vegetarisches, Kuchen und ein herrliches Buffet.

Andere Wege, wie man helfen kann

Du kannst uns auch wunderbar Helfen, und teile unsere Aktion, via Facebook, Twitter, Google+ oder über dein Blog.

 

English

short Description

After the great success of the last years we want in 2014 in the third round " Nordic by Nature 3.1" is the third Dog Frisbee tournament and the first German Championship in Hamburg. In cooperation between inspiration dog from Hamburg and the Discrockers from Karlsruhe.

What we need & what you get

We need sponsors for the target of 1500, - € to achieve .The amount is made up as follows ,

- 50 Piece T- shrits € 480,

- 50 pieces Frisbee € ​​310,

- 5,000 Flyers A6 Din € 70,

- 100 pieces Posters A3 € 40,

- 6 piece glass trophies € 100,

- 2 days space rental, racetrack € 500,

Services Urban Hounds " Nordic by Nature 3.1"

from € 5, - your name on the event shirt .

from € 15, - your name on the event shirt + an event disc

from € 20, - your name on the event shirt + an event shirt

from € 50, - your name on the event shirt + an event disc and an event -Shirt

from € 100, - your name / logo on the event shirt , the web pages (+ link) and on the flyers + a Starter Packages

from € 170, - your name / logo on the event shirt , flyers , posters and website on the photo wall + a Starter Packages

The effect discdogging

Dog frisbee offers every healthy and playful dog a job which auslastet him not only mentally but also physically . In order to avoid behavioral problems that can result from an underemployment , dog sport that is particularly important for very active dogs. In addition, dog frisbee strengthens the human-dog relationship.play principleThe Judge 'n Play regulations comes from the Freestyle Frisbee / Frisbee people , where in each case in so-called pools ( groups) is played.Example: Pool A and Pool B. During Pool A plays aimed Pool B this , then is replaced. This form we have with the help of players from the canine and human Frisbee scene in the finest detail work implements with much effort and exchange of ideas in the dog frisbee , so that the Judge'n Play rules has become THE alternative tournament format to the other rules ! When Judge'nPlay each player is simultaneously also a judge - the head judge / organizer / organizer divides the players in each category ( Level of play ) and a pool ( He creates for all participants the same conditions / requirements ) are available on every tournament at least two pools, each consisting of at least 5 players each 2 players ( in the case = judge ) Rate one of three categories :man ,dog orTeam.One of the co-organizers or already a seasoned player is head judge of the tournament and during judging the judges , help , advise and checked the possible extreme changes in valuation .

date, place and scope

Saturday, 06.07 and Sunday, 08.06 .. 2014 from 10:00 to 17:00 clock on the grounds of "North German Greyhound Racing Association eV " There are about 30 teams ( human-dog teams) from all over Germany and about 250 spectators expected.

target groups , offer

The tournament speaks to all people from young to old . Program and infrastructure is chosen so that both dog owners , as well as for all other there is something . The culinary offer includes proven catering facilities , among others a Barbeque , Vegetarian , cake and a wonderful breakfast.

Other ways you can help

You can contact us also wonderful help , and share our action , via Facebook , Twitter, Google+ or your blog.

story:
Short Summary

Hey Indiegogo! I'm Spencer, from Traffic Cycle Design - and this is the 4-A Rack End. This part is turned from 304 stainless steel, and can be welded or brazed into a high quality bike rack, like the one you'd carry your groceries or briefcase in. I designed these myself and handmade a small batch on my manual lathe & mill a few years ago, and have used them on the custom stainless steel racks that I build for commuter and touring bikes. 

I want to bring The 4-A Rack End to the next level, and get other framebuilders using them on their own custom racks. But I need a more efficient way of making them, which is why I'm coming to you. Help fund my campaign and I'll work with a US supplier to CNC machine these parts, so they can go on to be used on beautiful and functional bike racks - maybe on your next bike!

Thanks so much for being part of the campaign!

What We Need & What You Get

In order to cover tooling, setup, and our initial run, I'm pre-selling a small batch of parts. All the money collected will go directly into the actual parts that are being produced - all the design, engineering, and supplier vetting is already complete!

I'm working directly with a machine shop in Illinois, who I've built a relationship with for over two years. I've sourced many parts from this shop before, and we've been through the rigors of product delivery and have a shared understanding of the product's goals and delivery timetable. 

  • My goal for the project is just $500. That'll cover the cost of the initial run of parts.
  • Once the campaign is on its way to being funded, I'll place the order and my supplier will source material and begin production.
  • My supplier needs three to four weeks to produce the parts and ship them to me. 
  • When I receive the parts, I'll send them right out to the project backers within a week.

A note on pricing and "Perk Levels"

I spent a while looking at the price breaks that other suppliers offer, and tried to structure my perk levels so that they would make sense for builders. The rack ends are sold in multiples of two, and the pricing model tapers rapidly as your order increases (details are on my blog). If there's any confusion, just let me know and we'll work something out!

A note on Shipping

Just like with any piece of hardware, these parts will need to be shipped - and that costs money. In order to keep things simple (and to encourage people to buy in larger quantities) I'll be charging a FLAT $5 SHIPPING FEE on top of your pledge amount. I won't skimp on packing material and will be getting the parts out the door promptly, so the scale ultimately goes in your favor :)


Thanks for your support!

-Spencer Wright

story:
NEW TO INDIEGOGO? CLICK HERE

¿Hablas español? Hagas clic aquí para la versión española

Thanks for checking out Filanthropic and our launch campaign. Our success is a direct reflection of our fans and supporters and we are so excited about what we are going to achieve together!

Filanthropic was born as a response to our own struggles with running and funding an NGO in Spain. It helped us realize how upside down our economy is: we reward those who are selfish or doing harm but expect those do are doing good to work for free or at least on a shoe string budget!

We started thinking about the possibilities of changing charity and changing business at the same time. Can a charity brand compete with the quality and style of a regular lifestyle brand? Can a business have something other than pure profit at its core? We believe that the answer to both questions is “yes”.  Some call that style with a soul. We call it:

The style of your soul.

- Warren Batt, founder


What is Filanthropic?

We are a clothing company committed to producing and selling high quality, super cool clothing and then using the profits in a socially responsible way.  We operate with a revolutionary vision that blends fashion and philanthropy without sacrificing either.

Why Indiegogo?

We want every step of our journey to be shared by our supporters, we want this to be a movement that our customers can literally own and we want to build the business with your help.  (We did think about using Kickstarter but we were informed that as we want to donate some of our profits rather than spend them on Rolexes or fast cars, we don’t comply with their policies!)

Why not donate 100% of the profits?

We arent satisfied with giving a few thousand dollars, we want to give millions. To do that we need to grow the business and you can't do that if you give away every cent you make! Our dream is to reach a level where we can give away $1,000,000 a month, to turn that dream into reality we need to grow massively and for that we need capital. 

What will the proceeds be used for?

Besides producing your shirt we will be using the proceeds to build a kick ass web store, commission new designs, and fund our first sustainable development project in collaboration with Project Red, El Salvador (and many more if we reach our stretch goals!).

3 NEW DESIGNS NOW AVAILABLE!


To see more image of the shirts visit our gallery

What are they made of?

100% ringspun cotton.

What’s the quality like?

Excellent.  We are confident in saying that they will compare favorably with any other t-shirt you own. Quality is a huge priority for us.  We want you to buy Filanthropic because it’s your favourite; philanthropy is our passion so we don’t expect you to have to sacrifice anything (and we'll never use a sweatshop)!

What size should I order?

The men’s shirts are pretty standard sizes, so if you are normally a European Large you can expect to fit into a Filanthropic Large.  The women’s are a little undersized so we recommend you order a size up from your normal European size unless you like a figure hugging look.

Who did the designs?
For our launch range we worked with two incredibly talented designers who have both been fantastic to work with.  The slogan designs were done by Tadas Ciudaras from Lithuania and the illustrations are the work of Lei Melendres from the Phillipines.  Go and check out their work, they really are amazing.

When will I receive my t-shirt?

The campaign will close at the end of March and we will ship all orders by the end of April.

Can I buy anything in addition to a t-shirt?

Not yet.  For our launch we wanted to start with something that appeals to everyone. However, by the end of 2014 we hope to have a complete range of men’s and women’s clothing and accessories! CORRECTION! YOU CAN NOW BUY HOODIES TOO!!


We know you are going to love our hoodies just as much as we do. They are super thick, with double stitched seems and your choice of either a large printed logo or the smaller embroidered logo on the chest. They are unisex and as you can see from the picture they look equally as good on the ladies as they do on the chaps!

They come in all sizes from XS to XXL, upon ordering one we will send you all the sizes and dimensions and let you pick one out that is just perfect for you! Choose from black or grey.

You asked and we listened! We hope you enjoy them.



What is “the style of your soul”?

It’s the right way to do business, it’s the style that enables you to maintain your uniqueness while also creating a real benefit in the world around us. It’s a way of placing people above money and bringing back some old school values

What does is looks like?

  • 50% donations - Half of our net profits are invested into sustainable development projects around the globe. We aren’t about putting a PR band aid on a problem but about fixings them, permanently.
  • 50% unemployed – Half of our staff positions are filled by the unemployed or where possible the homeless
  • No sweatshops - We will never use a sweatshop or child labour in our production. We want our employees to love Filanthropic just as much as our customers.
  • Accountability - We will post our financials online for you to see.
  • Superior Quality – giving to charity shouldn’t mean receiving an inferior product.
  • Shared Success – We want to promote the great artist who produce our designs, they rock
  • Community Action –  All our staff are given at least a half day off each week to work with a local charity of their choosing
  • Old School Service – We will blow you away with our customer service, try us.

Choose from black or grey.You asked and we listened! We hope you enjoy them.What is
“the style of your soul”?
It’s the right way to do business,
it’s the style that enables you to maintain your uniqueness while also creating
a real benefit in the world around us. It’s
a way of placing people above money and bringing back some old school values
What does is looks
like?



50% donations - Half of our net profits are invested
into sustainable development projects around the globe. We aren’t about putting
a PR band aid on a problem but about fixings them, permanently.


50% unemployed – Half of our staff positions are
filled by the unemployed or where possible the homeless


No sweatshops - We will never use a sweatshop or
child labour in our production. We want our employees to love Filanthropic just
as much as our customers.


Accountability - We
will post our financials online for you to see.


Superior Quality – giving to charity shouldn’t mean
receiving an inferior product.


Shared Success – We want to promote the great artist
who produce our designs, they rock


Community Action –  All our staff are given at least a
half day off each week to work with a local charity of their choosing


Old School Service – We will blow you away with our
customer service, try us.

story:
UPDATE: When purchasing a pair of jeans, t-shirt or belt, you don't have to state your size yet. I will email you afterwards for size and address confirmation. And in case the size doesn't fit, you will be able to exchange for another size!

 

BENZAK DENIM DEVELOPERS

Benzak Denim Developers is an Amsterdam based denim brand, founded and solely run by Lennaert Nijgh, aka Benzak.

Out of the passion for jeans and inspired by the unique fading capabilities of denim, BDD was born. Rather than seasonal collections, BDD develops timeless pieces that can go anytime, anywhere.

By wear and wash the denim of your pair will develop its personal character. No single pair will be the same. Be the developer of your denim and become part of the world of Benzak. 

The BDD range also contains leather products, mixed with the BDD signature denim, to create the best of both worlds. The leather used is vegetable tanned and evolves into a highly unique and personal product by wear, just like the denim.

 

WHERE IS BDD NOW?

The last couple of years I have been working on the BDD brand in the form of individual projects: 1 item at the time, such as a pair of jeans or a leather wallet, to be released in limited quantities. During these years I have gained enough knowledge and experience to take the next big step: create a 'capsule' collection of various timeless garments and items of the highest quality that go seamlessly well together.

 

THE ORIGINAL 6 POCKET JEANS

Most jeans as we know feature 5 pockets: 2 on the back, 2 on the front and 1 extra at the facing of the right front pocket. This extra pocket, commonly known as the coin pocket, was used to carry small objects, such as coins, a watch or even nuggets of gold. The modern day cowboy often carries a bit more to that, thus BDD introduces a standard 6th pocket - a hidden pocket at the facing of the left front pocket, only noticable by the exposed selvedge at the top, just under the waistband. I simply call this:

‘The evolution of a classic.’

 

THE COLLECTION

 

FITTING

*I am 1.76 in height and wearing a 31 in jeans and M in t-shirts.

 

BDD-006 - DETAILS

Fabric:
*14.7 oz. selvage denim / 100% cotton.
*right hand twill.
*extra dipped dyed yarns for deep indigo colour.
*tight weaving construction for strong touch.
 
Specifications:
*slim fit top block.
*slim legs - slightly tapered.
*unwashed - sanforized.
*chambray pocketing.
*‘big 3 inspired’ coinpocket.
*hidden 6th pocket.
*hidden rivets at the back pockets.
*asymmetrical back pockets.
*3 button fly.
*3 different yarn colours.
*2 types of yarn thickness.
*2 types of stitch lengths.
*bull’s horns backpocket stitching.
*reversed debossed leather patch.
*extra lined backpockets.
*riveted for durability.
*beltloops stitched under waistband.
*clean lapseam at the inseams.
*union special 43200g chainstitched hems.
*made in okayama, japan.

 

BDD-710 - DETAILS

Fabric:
*14.7 oz. selvage.
*left hand twill.
*greencast colour.
*zimbabwe cotton.
 
Specifications:
*regular fit top block.
*tapered legs.
*unwashed - sanforized.
*chambray pocketing.
*‘big 3 inspired’ coinpocket.
*hidden 6th pocket.
*hidden rivets at the back pockets.
*asymmetrical back pockets.
*4 button fly.
*3 different yarn colours.
*2 types of yarn thickness.
*2 types of stitch lengths.
*bull’s horns backpocket stitching.
*reversed debossed leather patch.
*extra lined backpockets.
*riveted for durability.
*beltloops stitched under waistband.
*clean lapseam at the inseams.
*union special 43200g chainstitched hems.
*made in okayama, japan.

 

For more product info and pictures, please check out the collection book --> http://www.issuu.com/lennaertnijgh/docs/collection_book__1 You can download it as well!

 

WHAT DOES BDD NEEDS?

Over the past years I have invested a lot of time and money in the development and realisation of this collection. But now I need your help: by investing a small amount or pre-ordering one or more of the BDD products, I will be able to cover at least a part of the production costs and other expenses to get my goods available in stores.

The goal has been set on €4000 for now, but this will only cover a part of the total costs, so every euro will be more than helpful!

And this is not the final step: development of the BDD brand continues all the time in the form of new products and improvement of everything involved. I am a perfectionist and things can always be done better!

 

WHAT'S IN IT FOR YOU?

 

UPDATE: added perk - BDD Wallet [prototype]

I added a prototype of the BDD wallet to the perks - only 2 available!

Sample price of euro 149!

 

OTHER WAYS YOU COULD HELP

If you like to see this become a success, you could also help out a lot by sharing it with your friends & family. I understand that my products are not for everyone, but maybe someone you know will be interested in pre-ordering one or more of the BDD products!

You can use Facebook, Twitter, Tumblr or any other type of social media to let people know about BDD.

If you have a relevant blog, you can help out by posting about the new BDD collection. I gladly provide all the necessary info and pictures for an article.

 

BDD IN MEDIA

STYLESIGHT --> http://www.issuu.com/lennaertnijgh/docs/brand_watch_denim_f_w_13

RAWRDENIM.COM --> http://www.rawrdenim.com/2013/05/benzak-denim-developers-bdd-2013/

DENIMHUNTERS.COM --> http://www.denimhunters.com/brand/benzak-denim-developers

 

BDD-710 WEAR & WASH DEVELOPMENT 

 

BDD-006 WORN 6 MONTHS / BEFORE WASH 

 

HOW TO MEASURE

 

THANKS FOR YOUR TIME & PLEASE SPREAD THE WORD!

-- Lennaert Nijgh

story:
OR Visit our website www.mvmtwatches.com

 

IMPORTANT: TWO MVMT Watches

For those who chose the "TWO MVMT Watches" perk we need you to fill out a quick survey so we can get your watch choices.  Please fill this out very carefully with the correct information.  Please only fill out once.  Thank You!  

Here is the link:

https://www.surveymonkey.com/s/TwoWatchPerk


View our 2nd campaign page here: 

http://igg.me/p/490239/x/3545745

Thank you in advance for checking out our IndieGogo page, we truly appreciate all the support.

What's with the MVMT?

Our team sought out to create MVMT because of our passion for watches and desire to cut out the brand inflation and retail markup of popular name brands.  We got frustrated paying hundreds of dollars for name brand watches, knowing they only cost a fraction of the price to make.  We have spent the past year working with leaders in the industry to come up with an affordable, stylish looking watch collection that we know everyone will love.

When designing this watch collection, we made sure of THREE details:

  • A minimalist look that could be worn in a casual or professional setting.
  • The highest quality materials.
  • Offering the watches at a price less than half what our competitor's cost.

 

The MVMT Collection

For our first collection, we are offering SIX different models to choose from.

 

 

MVMT is also backed with a warranty.

We are so confident with the quality and durability of our watches, that if something were to happen within the first 2 years, we hope you will send it back to us.  Warranty includes all internal parts of the watch.

Warranty does not cover:  

  • The life of the battery 
  • Wear and tear and aging (e.g. scratched crystal; alteration of the color and/or material of non metallic straps and chains, such as leather, textile, rubber; peeling of the plating) 
  • Any damage on any part of the watch resulting from abnormal/abusive use, lack of care, negligence, accidents (knocks dents, crushing, broken crystal, etc.) 

Where is the MVMT headed?

We want a full line of different types and styled watches that stay at an AFFORDABLE cost. So join with us on this journey and be apart of it every step of the way.  We will send out several updates throughout the entire process making sure our backers are up-to-date on any important information.  We want to create a bond, a synergy with our backers, because ultimately you are the ones turning our dream into a reality.  We are excited to grow and anxious to see what the future has in store for us.

Who is the team and how did it all start?

Started by young entrepreneurs and watch enthusiasts Jake, and Kramer sought to cut out the brand inflation and retail markup of popular name brands. We have been obsessed with watches our entire life and got fed up paying for overpriced name brand watches. So now we're doing it ourselves. We started as friends, became roommates, and are now hoping to become business partners. 

Watch Specifications:

Case Material:  316L Carbon Stainless Steel
Case Diameter: 45 mm
Face Diameter: 40 mm
Bezel Width: 2.5 mm
Band Material: 316L Carbon Stainless Steel/Leather
Band Width: 24 mm
Clasp: Pushbutton Deployment Clasp
Clasp Material: 316L Carbon Stainless Steel
Dial Window Material: Crystal Mineral Glass
Display: Analog
Movement: Japanese Quartz
Date Function: Yes

Water Resistant: 3 ATM

Now we're here, on IndieGogo, with a fully functional prototype that looks amazing. We just need one more thing... your support!

 

We Need Your Support!

In order to turn this dream of ours into a reality, we need your support. Not only does this mean pledging for one of our awesome watches, but sharing the story with a friend. The important thing to remember with IndieGogo is, if we don't reach our full funding goal....we get nothing. 

We are going to do everything we can to spread the word in a variety of ways.  We hope through the use of social media and blogs we can drive enough outside traffic to our page which will result in us reaching our funding goal.  If you could do something as simple as tweeting about our page, or just liking our Facebook page, it can really go a long way. Simply click the Facebook and Twitter tabs at the top ^ of the page, right below the video.

If funded, how will you fulfill the orders?

We've tweaked the initial prototype, finalized our design, purchased the molds and selected a manufacturer that has a great reputation in the industry.  Once Indiegogo releases the funds, we can pay the initial deposit to begin production.  Production time takes roughly 30 days depending on the quantity of the order.  Our team will then ship the orders to our awesome backers! We have experience with shipping software and thermal printers which should make for a very smooth process. 

(It is TIME for the MVMT)

From all of us here at MVMT, thanks for helping us kickstart this project.

 

Risks and challenges

The challenges of MVMT Watches will be getting the word out, and convincing IndieGogos to participate. With so many great projects to choose from, we hope ours will stand apart from the rest. To reach as many people as possible, we are asking friends, families, and various blogs to help spread the word.

Once the funding is in place, the challenge will be producing on a large scale. Depending on outside help is difficult, but we have been dealing with a manufacturer for months and have established a solid relationship, which has has given us a lot of confidence in them.

story:
We hope that you’ll join us, share this story with your friends, and help us expand to everywhere that we find people in need!

FAQ

When will I get my Wishbones?

Delivery is planned for January 2014.

How do I choose the color I want?

Once we have received your order we will email you all available color options.

How do I select a size?

You can view our size chart above

What's the shipping cost?

For only $3 we send your order worldwide within 7-10 days after production is complete.

Are there any other costs such as customs duties / taxes?

There may be duties and tax payable when yours wishbones arrive, please check with your local post office what these may be. Please check here for more details 

How do I contact you if I have any questions?

We welcome your feedback and suggestions.

You can leave us a comment or contact us on: info@wish-bones.com, visit our facebook page or give us a shout out on twitter

How do you donate footwear and how often?

We have partnered with SAVE, a non-profit organisation based in South Africa that provides education, outdoor activities and basic life skills to underprivileged communities.

All our footwear donations are handled by SAVE and all donation drops are recorded.

How do I register my Wishbones?

On each pair of Wishbones we have placed a unique registration code sticker.

Just visit our website and register your pair, this will notify us to allocate a pair for donation.

Once we have donated your pair we will update you via email with a photo of the donation drop! You will be able to see the difference you have made to someone’s life.

story:
(First Edition T-shirt, $60 perk, female version)


1907 APPAREL is a philanthropic fashion company that specializes in urban chic, customized clothing. Our mission is to sell and create appealing, one-of-a-kind CLOTHES that support and uplift a CAUSE, and ultimately make a CHANGE in our community and world. With your purchase on this site, you can help us open a store front in downtown Nashville and make the dream a reality.
 

Clothes: We will offer an eclectic mix of merchandise for both home and wardrobe. We plan to sell one-of-a kind items sourced internationally, brand named designers, lesser-known brands, popular socially-conscious brands and own-brand labels aimed at an urban, hip, trendy shopper.

Our apparel is unique because it allows you to tell your story through your fashion. The approach is simple: Everyone has a story, so why not tell it with the year that it happened? Like the moment in 1995, the doctor looked up from the clear CT scan and said “You beat it.” Or the day in 2007 when you walked a stage and took hold of a diploma when no one said you could. You already wear this number on your heart as a marker, but now it’s time to wear it on your sleeve. With 1907 Apparel, you can design a shirt of your own with your specific year and provide hope to others with your story. (Check out the founder’s story below.)


Cause: Every purchase makes a difference because we invest 7% of our profits into causes that are important to us: eradicating poverty, providing education and supporting sustainable agriculture.


Change: Help us change the world. Whether it’s a shirt or accessory, your purchase will make a tangible impact on the globe: You could help feed a family in Uganda for two weeks, provide a forever family for an orphan in Detroit, build a school house in Burkina Faso, or help plant sustainable crops for nearby farms.
 

So it’s time to consider your story and help us change our community and world in the process. Hear from our founders.


1907 Apparel
Clothes. Cause. Change.

(Leather Wristband, $20 perk)

(First Edition T-shirt, $60 perk, unisex version)


(IndieGoGo Campaign T-shirt, $75 perk, female version)

 

How your contribution will help

  • Product Inventory
  • Store Fixtures
  • Initial Marketing
  • Store Signage
  • Other Initial Store Opening Costs


(First Edition T-shirt, $60 perk, male version)


Why do we do this?

1. We believe all people are made in the image of God and are souls of infinite value and worth.

2. We believe all people should have the opportunity to broaden their minds, experience the dignity of work, and eat three meals a day.

3. We believe giving is right.â€¨

4. We believe labor should be valued—that as a person sows so shall he also reap.

5. We believe anyone can give birth to hope, regardless of age, income level, social status, or education level.â€¨

6. We believe actions speak louder than words. Jesus spoke the loudest.


(IndieGoGo Campaign T-Shirt, $75 perk, unisex version)


Dawn’s Story


While 1907 Apparel was established in 2012, the heart of our store was established 105 years ago, when my hope, my grandmother, was born on a sharecropper’s plantation in south Alabama. It would be 65 years until that hope became manifest in my life, when, with a full life that included grown children of her own, my grandmother walked into a hospital near downtown Nashville and saw two twin babies, abandoned by their parents, that stirred her heart. Compelled by love at 65 years old, she put them in her purse and carried them home. I was one of those babies.


My grandmother, through that life-altering decision, birthed hope in me. For the next 19 years, she devoted every day of her life to raising my brother and me. She shepherded us, guarded us, provided for us, taught us, and, above all, loved us with a love we wouldn’t have found anywhere else. She showed us worth and value, and when she died in 1992, on the day before her 85th birthday, she had changed my life forever.

Learn more about our story here: http://www.1907apparel.com/about

 

(IndieGoGo Campaign T-shirt, $75 perk, male version)


Other Ways You Can Help

Read our full story online at 1907apparel.com, and visit us on Facebook and Twitter. Share our campaign via Facebook, Twitter, email, or plain old word of mouth.

Your prayers are greatly appreciated!
story_txt:
(First Edition T-shirt, $60 perk, female version)

1907 APPAREL is a philanthropic fashion company that specializes in urban chic, customized clothing. Our mission is to sell and create appealing, one-of-a-kind CLOTHES that support and uplift a CAUSE, and ultimately make a CHANGE in our community and world. With your purchase on this site, you can help us open a store front in downtown Nashville and make the dream a reality. 
Clothes: We will offer an eclectic mix of merchandise for both home and wardrobe. We plan to sell one-of-a kind items sourced internationally, brand named designers, lesser-known brands, popular socially-conscious brands and own-brand labels aimed at an urban, hip, trendy shopper.
Our apparel is unique because it allows you to tell your story through your fashion. The approach is simple: Everyone has a story, so why not tell it with the year that it happened? Like the moment in 1995, the doctor looked up from the clear CT scan and said “You beat it.” Or the day in 2007 when you walked a stage and took hold of a diploma when no one said you could. You already wear this number on your heart as a marker, but now it’s time to wear it on your sleeve. With 1907 Apparel, you can design a shirt of your own with your specific year and provide hope to others with your story. (Check out the founder’s story below.)
Cause: Every purchase makes a difference because we invest 7% of our profits into causes that are important to us: eradicating poverty, providing education and supporting sustainable agriculture.
Change: Help us change the world. Whether it’s a shirt or accessory, your purchase will make a tangible impact on the globe: You could help feed a family in Uganda for two weeks, provide a forever family for an orphan in Detroit, build a school house in Burkina Faso, or help plant sustainable crops for nearby farms. 
So it’s time to consider your story and help us change our community and world in the process. Hear from our founders.
1907 ApparelClothes. Cause. Change.

(Leather Wristband, $20 perk)

(First Edition T-shirt, $60 perk, unisex version)


(IndieGoGo Campaign T-shirt, $75 perk, female version)
 
How your contribution will help

Product Inventory
Store Fixtures
Initial Marketing
Store Signage
Other Initial Store Opening Costs


(First Edition T-shirt, $60 perk, male version)
Why do we do this?
1. We believe all people are made in the image of God and are souls of infinite value and worth.
2. We believe all people should have the opportunity to broaden their minds, experience the dignity of work, and eat three meals a day.
3. We believe giving is right.â€¨
4. We believe labor should be valued—that as a person sows so shall he also reap.
5. We believe anyone can give birth to hope, regardless of age, income level, social status, or education level.â€¨
6. We believe actions speak louder than words. Jesus spoke the loudest.


(IndieGoGo Campaign T-Shirt, $75 perk, unisex version)
Dawn’s Story

story:
www.SafeCanine.com

We are very passionate about our goal to create a product that involves the safety of our dogs and potentially save lives. We are excited to finally bring the results of our hard work and dedication to you.

We've created the LED Dog Safety Vest for those who love their dogs and who care about their well-being and safety. "Be Seen, Be Safe" with the LED Dog Safety Vest by SafeCanine.

Our unmatched design features super bright LED lights for complete visibility, ensuring that you and your pet can be seen during night-time strolls or times of poor visibility. The LED Dog Safety Vest is also designed with highly reflective vertical and horizontal strips on both sides of the vest. The horizontal reflective strips are accompanied with highly visible and bright LED lights that are easily controlled by the press of a button.

Our LED Safety Vest is made of a high quality, very bright flourescent lime-green polyester material designed to draw attention even during daylight. In addition, the entire LED vest's trim is also highly reflective.

This vest is also lightweight and breathable for your pet's comfort.

HOW TO OPERATE THE VEST

The LED lights run on two standard 2025 batteries, included. The batteries can be replaced as needed.

The LED lights have 3 settings: Press the button once, for constant light. Press the button a second time in order to set the lights on a fast flashing pattern. Press the button a third time, for a slow flashing pattern. Press the button once more, to turn the vest off. Rainy day? Not a problem, the lights and battery box are waterproof!

SIZE CHART AND COLOR SELECTION

      

Choice 1: Bright Pink LED  Choice 2: Bright White LED  Reflective Trim Color

**The orange trim color shown (picture left) and in beige (picture middle) will be made of the gray colored highly reflective material as shown (picture right) for even more visibility.**

Selecting the correct size for your pet is easy. The adjustable velcro straps allow for the perfect fit.

The Safety Vest is available in fluorescent lime and the trim is reflective gray. You can make your selection as to the color of the reflective strips that go horizontally and vertically along the vest. Choice #1: Reflective pink with bright pink LED lights or Choice #2: Reflective white with bright white LED lights.

The LED Safety Vest is available in the following sizes:

X-Small: Fits dogs 10-19 pounds

Small:  Fits dogs 20-35 pounds such as a Corgi, Small Terrier, Schnauzer, Beagle and other dogs similar in size.

Medium:  Fits dogs 36-60 pounds such as a Dalmation, Springer Spaniel, Small Retriever, Boxer and other dogs similar in size.

Large:  Fits dogs 61-100 pounds such as a Rottweiler, Large Retriever, Sheperd  Dogs, Large Dalmations, Labrador

X-Large:   Fits dogs 101-130 pounds

Message From The Team

Like any new innovative product, the SafeCanine LED Vest has it's own risks and challenges. We will take every step possible, from product design through manufacturing, to deliver a superior product without compromise.

We are very fortunate to have had the opportunity to have worked with our manufacturing factory previously on a different project where they had created pet products for us based on our designs and requirements. Our contacts are very attentive to our needs and have a great knack for attention to detail.

Our experience enables us to begin the production process the moment we are funded. We are raising funding for the manufacturing, packaging, and logistics. Thank you for taking the time to check out the project.

Sharing it with loved ones takes only a second, and it would mean the world to us. Thank You!

 

LED Dog Safety Vest by SafeCanine (PATENT PENDING)

story:
WHAT IT'S ALL ABOUT

Hey everyone! We're Teryn+Dakota and we're bringing this campaign to IndieGogo because it's something that we're really passionate about. Unfortunately, we lack the resources to get the project going. This campaign is for a new awesome kids clothing company, featuring multiple shirt designs that are sure to make your little one the coolest on the block. This idea sprouted when I got pregnant with our first and we started accumulating clothes for him. Girls these days have no problem finding cute stuff to wear, but with boys it's another story. Everywhere we looked, there was clothing that didn't fit our taste and our choices were very limited! We decided to do something about it and create this line for parents who want to dress their kids with style and creativity! Our idea originally was based off of boys clothing, but we do have plans of expanding to more "girly" designs in the near future. Allow your littles to "dress outside the box" in our super awesome attire.

PERKS

To properly launch this line, we would like to start out with producing the 6 designs shown above for kids and on onesies for babies. This will give our customers some variety and allow us to have a good launch point. With time and after our first chunk of sales, we'll hopefully expand soon after to offer more diverse designs and styles.

By funding our campaign, you'll also sign yourself up for some great perks!

  • Donate $50 and you become the designer! We'll make you your very own custom shirt design that's exclusive to you! *Limited to a 2 color design. We'll work with you until it's exactly what you want.
  • For every $20 that you donate toward our campaign, you will recieve credit for a free shirt of your choice once our shop is up and running. This is a great deal! You're basically just buying your item early. 
  • Donate $10 and get free shipping on your first order!

 

IMPACT

We strongly believe that it's important for kids to be able to express themselves. Without that, the world would be such a boring place! Let your child break the mold of ordinary fashions and really wear something that suits their giant personality! 

By donating to our campaign and helping to make our dream a reality, we can bring you more and more product, diverse designs, better materials, and give back to the community in ways that wouldn't be possible without your help. 

HELP US OUT

We understand that not everyone has the resources to donate to our campaign, but there are many other ways that you can help us. Please do whatever you can to draw attention to us and this project! Share this on Facebook, Twitter, Pinterest + Instagram! Tell everyone in your playdate groups, show other parents! Word of mouth will be the best way to get our message out and make our goals a reality! We really do appreciate this opportunity and look forward to what the future holds for this dream of ours.

Thank you so much! XO

story:
The brain is a muscle like any other. Willpower is a resource that gets depleted over the course of the day. The stress of our daily commutes, personal relationships, and work demands prevent us from being at our most productive. 

 

That's why we developed bandu, a watch that gives you time to slow down, take a moment, and prepare your best efforts. Built by a neuroscientist and engineers, bandu alerts you to listen to music, play a game, call a friend, meditate or stretch. We show you what works to reduce your stress.

 

bandu is a named a God at DEMO 2012!

 

How bandu works

bandu measures the autonomic nervous system, which is associated with the effects of stress including perspiration, respiration, and cardiology. The current version monitors your skin conductance, movement, and temperature. When you become stressed, bandu alerts to you to take a break. You can listen to a favorite song or play a fun game. You can even call a trusted friend, just stand up to stretch or even meditate. The results are shown right on your smartphone in real-time so you can monitor your stress level, see when it rises, and determine the people, places, and things that help you feel better. And over time, bandu automatically learns what works.

 

Our Smartphone App


Our Story

We've been working hard to build bandu over the last three years after meeting in a class at MIT. We realized that despite all of the technologies available for biofeedback, none alert you to the need to find peace and quiet in small moments of your daily life. We're now participating in two accelerators RockHealth at Harvard Medical School and MassChallenge to bring bandu to your wrist.

 

The role of stress on life, work, and play

Stress is a survival instinct. When something feels like life or death - a big test, a major presentation, a costly game - that's how your body is feeling. And during those moments it's difficult to think straight. Stress affects your short-term memory, your long-term memory, and your attention. We know that stress can also become a medical problem and makes symptom worse for conditions as varied as post-traumatic stress, panic disorder, heart disease, asthma, irritible bowel syndrome, even fertility.

 

 

Our Work Until Now

Aruba prototype 

 

Bali prototype, Cayman prototype, and bandu

We are ready for manufacturing with your support!

We've built three generations of prototypes that connect with the iPhone and Android phones.

  • bandu has been built to take advantage of existing components for mass manufacturing
  • Our team draws on extensive experiences and key mentors in the Boston scientific, engineering, and medical communities
  • We've tested the various materials, capabilities, and data produced by bandu
  • From firmware to software to analytics, we've written and optimized thousands of lines of code


 

Hardware takes time to get right

We're big fans of prototyping and rapid deployments. Our biggest challenge in hardware development comes in instituting a low-volume rapid design cycle while still striving for economies of scale in larger volumes. If there's a problem with one component, the whole production run could be lost or require a recall. With each production run comes new risks associated with every component and the system as a whole.

Manufacturing will be staged

To mitigate this risk we're slowly ramping up manufacturing. We'll deliver the first batch of bandu in limited editions over the coming months at different prize levels. During this phase there may be subtle changes in how bandu looks and functions as we optimize our design for larger builds. This is usually the part of hardware development you don't see. We will be open and honest about the challenges we face each step of the way. bandu is unlike any watch ever created. It requires precise measurements to know when you need to take a step back. We will ensure that bandu is strong and agile as we bring the price down to something a large number of people can afford.

 

FAQs

1. What does bandu measure?

We are developing bandu to measure the autonomic nervous system, the key bodily system associated with the effects of stress including perspiration, respiration, and cardiology. bandu currently measures skin conductance, temperature, and motion, and we are always developing ways of adding increasing measurements to bandu's on-board intelligence.

2. What smartphones is bandu compatible with?

iPhone and Android

3. Does bandu require connectivity?

No, bandu works independently of the app and is able to store data for you to view later on your smartphone or tablet.

4. How does bandu work when I am exercising?

bandu measures temperature and movement to make adjustments for exercise.
