story:
Our Story

My name is Leon Knight and I am 32 years old, married to my wife Tuesday for the last 13 years with two children Nathanael (12) and Kalah (9). I have been fishing bass tournaments while working full time as a Correctional officer for the last eleven years. I have been physically assaulted on several occasions, watched as close friends and fellow officers were brutally attacked, and have had my life threatened on more than one occasion.   Needless to say, bass fishing has been a positive outlet for me to handle the stresses of my job working in the prison. In 2010, I came to a cross road in my life. I had qualified to fish the 2011 FLW Tour which is comprised of 10 tournaments and only 150 of the best Bass Pro's in the world. It was as if my long time dream was staring me in the face. My wife and I felt the only way for us to keep our family intact and have a legitimite shot of being sucessfull on Tour was to stay together and move to a central location to enable me to spend as much time possible with my family and shorten the travel time from tournaments. So after a lot of prayer my wife and I agreed on leaving California and moving to Northern Alabama. With a first place prize of $125,000 and $10,000 paid to 50th place at every FLW Tour event the opportunity once again stares me in the face. I have already fished two events this year with eight to go. In my rookie year and with tough economic times sponsorships are scarce. I really believe if I can afford to fund the rest of my season, I will land the sponsorship I need to to continue on.  

 


The Impact

I stongly believe and know in my heart that my being able to travel around and meet new people has a strong impact on the people that God puts in my path.  I believe that everything happens for a reason.  One instance that comes clearly to my mind is the story of the two children I met while fishing a tournament at Lake Havasu in Arizona. During my tournament stay I met a brother and sister that were no younger than 10 years old.  It just amazed me at how hungry for attention these kids were.  Their parents didn't know where they were, who they, were with, and didn't even care.  The brother and sister hung out with me daily, helping me get my tackle ready, and just sitting around talking about life and fishing.  Since then I have been able to talk to them on the phone at the trailer park office, and have even sent them out packages with fishing poles, magazines, and lures.  The point that I am trying to make I guess is that, I know that God used me to speak encouragement to them and be an example to them by my actions.  There have been lots of other stories just like this, and it is because I have the opportunity to go to a lot of different places and meet many different people that God places in my path. 

If it turns out that my campaign does not happen, I will continue to the best of my ability to try and make my dreams come true.  I can only go as far as I have the money available to me. 

 


What We Need & What You Get

The FLW Tour is comprised of 10 Tournaments with an entry fee of $4,000 per event totaling $40,000. I have already started my season and have paid my first two entry fees along with $1,000 deposits on the remaining eight events leaving a balance of 24,000 on the next eight events. All the money raised will go directly towards my entry fees which will be payable to FLW Outdoors (Tournament organazation flwoutdoors.com) At this point I due not have any additional funding. God willing whatever money I am lacking will be compesated with tournament winnings and I am working hard on obtaining a title sponsor to fund my endeavors. In my Tournament season I will be towing my boat throughout h United States traveling over 30,000 miles and visiting over twenty some states.  


Other Ways You Can Help

I would greatly appreciate any help in spreading the word in reguards to helping my dream become a reality. Professional Bass Fishing is the fastest growing sport in the world second only to Nascar. Many fortune 500 companies are sponsoring anglers with flashy boat and truck's wrapped with company logos. Every FLW Tournament is brodcast on Versus Country TV, to households across America stretching throughout the world.

My wife and I felt the only way for us to keep our family intact and have a legitimite shot of being sucessfull on Tour was to stay together and move to a central location to enable me to spend as much time possible with my family and shorten the travel time from tournaments. So after a lot of prayer my wife and I agreed on leaving California and moving to Northern Alabama. With a first place prize of $125,000 and $10,000 paid to 50th place at every FLW Tour event the opportunity once again stares me in the face. I have already fished two events this year with eight to go. In my rookie year and with tough economic times sponsorships are scarce. I really believe if I can afford to fund the rest of my season, I will land the sponsorship I need to to continue on.  
 



The Impact
I stongly believe and know in my heart that my being able to travel around and meet new people has a strong impact on the people that God puts in my path.  I believe that everything happens for a reason.  One instance that comes clearly to my mind is the story of the two children I met while fishing a tournament at Lake Havasu in Arizona. During my tournament stay I met a brother and sister that were no younger than 10 years old.  It just amazed me at how hungry for attention these kids were.  Their parents didn't know where they were, who they, were with, and didn't even care.  The brother and sister hung out with me daily, helping me get my tackle ready, and just sitting around talking about life and fishing.  Since then I have been able to talk to them on the phone at the trailer park office, and have even sent them out packages with fishing poles, magazines, and lures.  The point that I am trying to make I guess is that, I know that God used me to speak encouragement to them and be an example to them by my actions.  There have been lots of other stories just like this, and it is because I have the opportunity to go to a lot of different places and meet many different people that God places in my path.  
If it turns out that my campaign does not happen, I will continue to the best of my ability to try and make my dreams come true.  I can only go as far as I have the money available to me.  
 



What We Need & What You Get
The FLW Tour is comprised of 10 Tournaments with an entry fee of $4,000 per event totaling $40,000. I have already started my season and have paid my first two entry fees along with $1,000 deposits on the remaining eight events leaving a balance of 24,000 on the next eight events. All the money raised will go directly towards my entry fees which will be payable to FLW Outdoors (Tournament organazation flwoutdoors.com) At this point I due not have any additional funding. God willing whatever money I am lacking will be compesated with tournament winnings and I am working hard on obtaining a title sponsor to fund my endeavors. In my Tournament season I will be towing my boat throughout h United States traveling over 30,000 miles and visiting over twenty some states.  



Other Ways You Can Help
I would greatly appreciate any help in spreading the word in reguards to helping my dream become a reality. Professional Bass Fishing is the fastest growing sport in the world second only to Nascar. Many fortune 500 companies are sponsoring anglers with flashy boat and truck's wrapped with company logos. Every FLW Tournament is brodcast on Versus Country TV, to households across America stretching throughout the world.

story:
The experience gained by importing dresses and positive feedback from our customers made us realise that the right moment for creating our own dress collection has arrived.

The idea of the collection was growing and forming step by step, inspired by women's beauty. Unfortunately, for ages beauty was associated with suffering.

"Beauty requires sacrifice! "  - All of us have heard that from time to time.
 

Huge dresses with corsets were replaced by modern ones, then pants gained the popularity and by now in many occasions they are considered more comfortable than dresses.

We are often obliged to choose between comfort (pants) or beauty (dresses). I don't mean that pants can't be beautiful, but my point is that dresses can be comfortable.

For a long time I was looking for a compromise myself. I was trying to find a "comfortable beauty", or casual elegance. And this is the concept my collection is inspired by.

I do my best to create versatile dresses, which you can complement with your personal style, dresses for every moment of your life.

Our first dress reflects perfectly the spirit of our collection.

It is a two-pieces dress: a fitted dress and a circle skirt. You can put them on together or separately looking for the best combination to express yourself.

 

The collection conveys a spirit of inner beauty and power, being at the same time sensitive and strong, vulnerable and passionate, free and commited to your dreams, no matter how hard the world can be.

Who said you can only be comfortable in jeans? Simple beauty and elegance are back for everyday life! Be yourself, don’t let the world change you, you are unique! Business lunch, supermarket, kids’ playground…. shine every moment of your life !

The sketches are ready, the fabrics are chosen, the pattern makers and seamstresses are ready to start the work. We have already bought some fabrics and got our labels done.

 

 

 

We are trying to make the collection ready with our own efforts, but it's a complicated moment and, unfortunately, our resources are not enough. Every and any help will bring our collection to life!

 

We are carefully elaborating our patterns to make sure that the fit is as perfect as possible.

 

 

 

 

The colour inspiration comes from NATURE and its simple beauty: the sea and the sand, the sky and the sunset, the amazing world of flora.

We focus on natural fabrics such as cotton, viscose and silk. At the same time specific gowns' fabrics include a mix of materials, in order to achieve the certain effect.

 

 

 

 

 

 


 

1. Receiving the money.

 

2. Sending the questionnairies to get all the necessary details to send the rewards + Purchasing the materials + Preparing for the start of the Production Stage.

3. Patterns' making.

4. Production and Delivery Stage (as soon as we have the first designs done, we'll start the delivery process).

 

You may be subject to import duties and taxes, which are levied after a shipment reaches your country. Customs policies vary from country to country and, unfortunately, we cannot predict what they might be, and if you will have to pay them at all.

 

One of the challenges could be the timing of production, if some major factors happen, something that doesn't depend on us. It this case, we will do our best to find a quick solution. From the beginning we are considering all the risks and the possible alternatives.

The other issue to take into account is the limited quantity of the same sample in a specific fabrics or colour, due to the fact that some of the fabrics are limited edition. But this can be a benefit at the same time, because of the exclusivity of some fabrics. If this happens, we will do our best to offer you the alternatives! We will be keeping in touch with you, constantly updating and adding the news.
 

The delivery timing could be a challenge, although we use the Priority Mail Service to make sure you receive your rewards as soon as possible. Most shipments arrive within the estimated time, but occasionally delays occur. Unfortunately, these situations are out of our control.

If you don't have an opportunity to contribute with a donation, you can give us your support by sharing the link of our project and by spreading the word. Any help means a lot for us! Thank you!

story:
Short Summary

 

 

 

We've came a way since our original campaign. And we couldn't have done it without all of you! We're now open for InDemand, and we've updated our campaign to reflect some of our newest products.

 

 

So wooden sunglasses are awesome. But everyone seems to want to make them cost a fortune as well. We can offer an affordable, yet still high quality product, for a fraction of the cost of the other guys. We believe we can successfully change the sunglasses game as we know it.

To get a feel for us before reading our ideas, feel free to checkout the rough version of our website, as the full product along will be rolling out soon!

rawWoodShades.com

 

 

Our Mission:

A little bit about the founder: 

 

I'm a recent Environmental Chemistry/Environmental studies college graduate living on Michigan's gold coast. If you're anything like me, you've went through quite a few sunglasses year after year. As a lover of the outdoors, I'm attracted to the raw style and look of handcrafted wooden goods. These two ideas coming together formed the groundwork for rawWood Shades.  I'm also a self-proclaimed sunglasses enthusiast. Simply stated, we can do it better. The world deserves an affordable, high quality wooden sunglasses company. 

At rawWood Shades Co. we also care deeply about the environment. We pledge to plant one tree for every pair of sunglasses ordered through our site once we launch. Through our partnership with Trees for the Future, we will be able to plant trees in Africa, Asia, and Latin America. Sure beats buying those petroleum-based plastic sunglasses from the mall doesn't it?

 

 

 

What We Need & What You Get

$35 - Originals - Natural/Smoke

$40 - Cruisers - Brown/Brown

 

$45 Originals - Natural/Green

 

 

We are now shipping!

 

 

Specs: 
All lenses are polarized.
All of our bamboo frames float in the water!
The hinges are two-way spring loaded for a perfect fit regardless of head size (trust me, I have a big head)
UV400 Protection

 

Our Goal:

With a high attention to detail, and small custom touches, we believe rawWood sunglasses can be the next big thing out there. Help us fulfill our dream!

You can be a part of our growth, and own some of the first rawWood sunglasses ever created! We know people will ask you about them, so if and when you're satisfied, feel free to talk us up!

If you have any questions whatsoever, do not hesitate to contact us via IndieGogo or on social media!

rawWood Shades Facebook Page

rawWood Shades Twitter Page

rawWoodShades.com

 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you don't have the funds to contribute, you can still help us a ton!
  • Like us on Facebook/Follow us on Twitter!
  • Share our project on your social media!

Thanks again! Contact us with any questions,

 

 

Sincerely,

 

Nick Mortimer

RawWood Shades Co.

story:
"Luxury is in every single detail" - Hubert De Givenchy 
A deck of cards crafted carefully keeping in every single details of minimal design in mind. A deck of playing cards for the modern world, bridging the gap between creator and a collector.



Backing my Grounds

Firstly I am 20 and a Design student VERY passionate about design. Secondly, I want to share my project with the world. 

  • I have grown up playing Cards and one thing always bothered me is that, everything is evolving except the design of these playing cards. 
  • I love clean, minimal and modern design. So I worked for 3 months on creating this deck of cards. 
  • I wanted to create something that is Modern and Minimal while keeping the century old essence alive. 

Magician, Cardists, Collectors, Players or just a generous contributor(who wants this as bad as I want to share this with the world). 

Me and You = Us <3

Being a Multimedia Design student I created everything that was Digital and I realized that I have the ability to create something from scratch. So I took up a project to create a tangible product and something that holds a memory is EVERYONE's life. (I bet if you are reading this, you would have played cards once in your life.) So here,

  • I will need around 2500$ to successfully start the production. I want to keep it limited(haven't decided the numbers yet) but make it available for you beautiful people. 
  • This is not just it. Read the next title for the surprise. 

THE SURPRISE (YOUR LIFE CARD)

So this is not JUST playing cards, I will be creating this PERSONALLY for every single backer. What will I need when you back me up? 

  • Birth-date.

Yes, ONLY your birth-date. Every single person in this world have their own unique card which is called the LIFE CARD. For example, according to my birth-date I am a 5 of Diamond. 

Now for the main story, every person in this world has its own characteristic which is shown by the card when its found using your birth-date. Confusing? Let me break it down. 

Take for example your card is 5 of Diamond. Every backer gets a personalized Poster, T-Shirt and a deck of card made from him own CARD. Now what will this "personalized" goodies have? Hint: It's made for you with a tinge of your own character and personality.  Let me give you a sneak peek. 

Brand T-Shirts

Posters

The "UnCut" Deck


Boxing

I am planning on normal textured box packaging which will look like this. 

IF backing increases I am planning on changing the packaging to something even better. HINT: Wood and Suede. 

Risks

  • To get enough backers to be able to get the gold foil print and wood packaging 
  • To make my backers happy

Share and Giveaway

I will host a giveaway once I get enough funding and choose 2 Lucky Winners randomly. How will this workout?

  • You need to share this using any social media tool
  • Be creative while sharing. 

The lucky winner will be contacted and given 1 Deck and 1 T-Shirt of choice. 

And that's all there is to it.


PLEASE READ:

If you do contribute to this campaign kindly fill this form so I get your birth-date. And I will be able to find your Life Card. 

http://goo.gl/forms/jhqObiWIfH

story:
Who and what is ook-fashion?

The history: In 2009 Hannes Hein founded the fashion project fashion against anti-Semitism and its appending label out-of-kippot www.ook-fashion.com. Over the years he gathered fashion enthusiasts and artists to help him work on different products and ideas.

Our credo: ook-street wear collection is designed for young people, who are interested in Jewish culture and interacting in intercultural dialogue. Our fashion with a Jewish twist is meant to find a spot in global street couture and every day wear. Simultaneously we want to use our art exhibitions to boost our credo: Chic against anti-Semitism and racism.

How cool would it be, if, after visiting a Jewish museum or cultural event,       you could simply pick up an affordable ook-remembrance on your way out?   We do believe that mixing a museum’s educational input with ook's joie de vivre will result in a potent recipe. Comparable to a strong feeling one breathes in and takes home.

FAQ

      How do I choose my perk’s color or style?

While our campaign is up and running, you can find all articles and their different shapes and styles on our ook website.

This is how it works:

  •  Click on our gallery    http://www.ook-fashion.com/                                          
  •  Chose which ever perk tickles your fancy
  •  Drop us a line via email hannes@ook-fashion.com or inbox
  • Anxiously await your superperk, which is on its way to you

                               Do you ship internationally?  

                      Yes, we do ! And even better - it´s free of charge.                                                                    

Take a look at the variety of our perks right here:


         What’s up with all the Indiegogo-effort?

Our goal is to set up efficient sales units, so we can distribute orders to relevant Jewish museum shops and cultural institutions in America, Europe and the East.                                                  

Unfortunately at this point in time our production volume is still very small, which sadly influences the prices of our products. Yes, we also produce top of the range products, but we would like to cater to the wallets of young buyers, who often only have $ 10-20 to spare.

A minimum start budget should be $7000 for contact and marketing to about 250 museums worldwide and supply them with 250 sample boxes of our basic ook-collection (  $ 15 500 ). In total adds up to $ 22 500.

 

                       Our high-budget schemes


                  Who buys your products?

ook-fashion designs beautiful head wear for people who don’t stress and don’t want to be stressed. We want to show that amongst prejudice and stereotypes, there is room for a relaxed and unpretentious attitude: „Yes, Jews pass by on the street, wearing kippot and ringlets – but they are also standing next to you in clubs and bars and you can’t even tell. So what?” ook-fashion represents exactly this kind of freedom and unconventionality. This vibe is mirrored in its art and street wear, wanting to attract plenty and excluding no one.         

(Foto: permanent exhibition ook lady kippa / Jewish Museum, Berlin)

    

What do you mean with intercultural dialog ...

      It's a tulip - and a tichel * - and a turban

… and what's the big fuss when it comes to hair?

Firstly: it´s a prompt beauty booster.                                                                                    

Secondly: In many religious cultures it is seen as a sign of respect and humbleness to hide ones hair. For generations the covering of body and head have shaped and influenced many denominations. Nowadays it is more like      a mixture of fashion, religion and culture. Everything goes – nothing must.      An intercultural statement, that proves to be open-minded and free of stigmatizations. 


              

When it comes to pimping up an ordinary outfit, this headdress can be seen as the cherry on the top. But what do tulips, tichels and turbans have in common? They all reign far up high, at times showing off their pompously haughty and then again modestly simple presence.

( upcoming solo exhibition 2015 *Museum für Abgüsse* Munich )

  


                    When do I get my perk?

Some of the perks are on stock – some have to be made especially for you.   But since we are partly German, we are busy superbees - eager to please and not keep you waiting. You should not have to wait longer than 3 - 6 weeks for your perk to arrive. The collection is Made in Bavaria / Germany.   


Any more questions ?

How do I become a friend and part of ook-fashion in Region USA, Europe or East?

Are you genuinely interested in becoming an active friend of ook-fashion ? Excellent! Contact Hannes via email: hannes@ook-fashion.com (Note: ook-fashion is based in Munich and of which Hannes Hein holds personal liability).

They all reign far up high, at times showing off their pompously haughty and then again modestly simple presence.( upcoming solo exhibition 2015 *Museum für Abgüsse* Munich )                      When do I get my perk?
Some of the
perks are on stock – some have to be made especially for you.   But since we are
partly German, we are busy superbees - eager to please and not keep you
waiting. You should not have to wait longer than 3 - 6 weeks for your perk to
arrive. The collection is Made in Bavaria / Germany.   
Any more questions ? How do I become a friend and part of ook-fashion in Region USA, Europe or East?
Are you genuinely interested in becoming an active friend of ook-fashion ?
Excellent!
Contact Hannes via email:  hannes@ook-fashion.com                (Note: ook-fashion is based in Munich and of which Hannes Hein holds personal liability).

story:
Problem to be solved:

Blue light is part of the spectrum for all forms of light, but never before have we held a light source inches from our face as we do with smart phones. Many discuss the short-term harms from blue light to our eyes, but a greater problem lingers; the growing digitalization of the world around us leads to greater exposure to non-consensual blue light. As menus at restaurants convert to digital screens, imagine the other aspects of daily life that are impacted in the same manner. 

Solution:

The only way to verify protection from digital screens in public is to protect the eye at its source, through blue light blocking lenses. Many may find satisfaction is protecting personal devices through screen protectors applied to the device. While screen  protectors provide effectiveness, they lack the ability to protect against devices out of our personal arsenal. One will find bluelight blocking glasses as the best way to filter non-consensual blue light in public, not to mention the most stylish method.

BLUEYECON Movement will pioneer awareness regarding short-term and long-term effects of blue light exposure as a pure play company in a growing market. 

Your part:

Sharing the message and awareness is foremost; a societal effort will help prevent our future generations from premature blindness. A contribution will fuel the vast efforts to extend the message through guerrilla and digital marketing while scaling inventory with go-to-market strategies. Guerrilla marketing involves unconventional methods to pique interest through pure curiosity. Much of the target market will use the platforms related to digital marketing, such as social media, thus success in the digital space will ensure growth for awareness and the capabilities of BLUEYECON.  Combining guerrilla strategies in the physical world and success through digital strategies offer a stable foundation for BLUEYECON Movement to spread its message. Contributions will help a college student change the way we look at screens and prevent massive costs of optical procedure in the future. 

 

I am Zak Levesque, a student at Stetson University in DeLand, FL with a background in finance, sales and entrepreneurship. Through an internship at a software company I was introduced to the benefits of bluelight blocking glasses. My coworker gave me a pair as a gift which sparked my curiosity, so I began my research. During my time with the inside sales team, I realized a gap in the market for blue light protection and I figured there are countless business offices that rely on the computer for most work-related tasks. Less than 5% of the sales floor used blue light protection, yet a fellow intern shared a new way to look at screens with me. After realizing the benefits of the glasses I gained the determination to share the benefits with offices throughout.

Please help build BLUEYECON as a global Movement to bring awareness to growing non-consensual bluelight exposure. 

Additional Information (Scientific):                                                                                                                        https://www.forbes.com/sites/fionamcmillan/2018...

https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/22201280

story:
THANK YOU!   Keep it rolling!  


From the team that brought you Walksoftz, "Roll-up ballerina flats in the clutch!" - we are proud to introduce our new line - SOLZ shoes.  

 

At SOLZ, we have designed and patented a new and unique shoe for a unique lifestyle – yours.  These are shoes for walking around town all day or dancing all night.  They are perfect for running on the beach.  They can even go in the water with you and walk up and down your longboard.  When you are done, you can hose them down or throw them in the wash.  They are so comfortable you may forget you have them on.  But your feet will notice, and because they look so good - so will everyone else.



We have been working on this project for over a year and have already successfully brought our introductory "Walksoftz" shoes to market.  We now have the design for our new line finalized and manufacturing in place (not easy!).  It will cost approximately $15,000 to do the first production run.   I have self-funded this project so far and am now asking you to join me and help.  I have only about $5,000 left I can contribute because, unfortunately, you can't eat shoes.  So we are hoping to raise at least $10,000 here.  That is just a beginning, raising more will allow us to create new styles and colors and bring an amazing shoe to an even wider audience.


SOLZ shoes will all retail for $59.99, so pre-ordering them here for $33 is a fantastic deal!  You also have the opportunity to become an entrepreneur by joining us as a Founding Affiliate Partner and locking in the privilege of buying our shoes at an exclusive wholesale price going forward.  You even have the chance to truly let your SOLZ shine by joining us as a designer and collaborating on your own unique shoe.  Check out the perks.


SOLZ is also very proud to announce a new partnership with Nashville-based charity Soles4Souls.  Through this partnership SOLZ will be able to get a pair of shoes to someone in need for every single pair of SOLZ shoes ordered.  SOLZ will be sponsoring several shoe drives to collect used shoes as well as donating money for every new pair ordered.


** Just announced!  As a special token of our appreciation, for every contribution over $100 we will also include a free pair of our "Walksoftz" roll-up ballerina flats in the clutch! (retail $29.99)  Check them out here:  www.walkstreetmovement.com  


SOLZ is a parent company to three brands and we are creating three initial styles in conjunction with these brands.  You can choose the style you like best, or take advantage of  a great deal and choose all three!


Here are our initial styles:




The ones with the snake logo are called "Sneakinz" and available in men's full sizes 7-12 in both black and grey with matte synthetic.


The ones with the apple logo are called "Walkstreetz" and available in women's full sizes 4-10 in both black and grey with shinier patent synthetic. 


The ones with the sun logo are SOLZ flagship ultimate beach shoes and are unisex.  Mens sizes 7-12 and womens 4-10.  


All shoes are made additionally with ballistic nylon and a soft, environmentally friendly synthetic sole.  They can be bent, folded, and rolled up.  They are all machine washable.  And every pair comes with a matching ballistic nylon clip-on "capsule" bag and two SOLZ bracelets for additional packing options.  






A wise man once said, “Life is way too important to be taken too seriously.”  We agree.  Life should be fun, sunny, light and comfortable.  And so should your shoes.   Who says shoes have to be heavy, uncomfortable and boring?  Why cant your shoes fold up in a cool capsule or go in your back pocket when you want to change or be barefoot?  Why can’t you "clip on" an extra pair of shoes for that next trip without worrying if your bag is over the weight limit?  Why cant your shoes just be an extension of your feet … and your personality?  They can.

We truly appreciate your support and are here to answer any questions you may have.  brad@solzshoes.com.


Please add $5/pair for shipping and contact me for international shipping options.  


*** UPDATES:  I have been asked if it is possible to order two pairs at once.  Absolutely!  Just contribute $66 and add a note that you would like to pre-order two pairs.  Additionally, size and color selection is not a drop down selection, please add a note stating your preference or we will contact you at the time of order fulfillment.   If you are looking for sizes that are not listed please also send me an email, as we are still finalizing the order and will attempt to accommodate popular demand where possible.  :)

story:
Short Summary

  • We are: Diana Ciler Jewelry is a Jewelry Brand based out of NYC. 
  • Campaign: Dimension by Diana Ciler is a ground breaking concept that will allow Women to fashion their entire Jewelry Wardrobe from one seemingly simple pair of Earrings.
  • Mission Statement: Should you accept the challenge to Fund our campaign, you will answer that question; What do I wear tonight, tomorrow and next year, with one single purchase.

What We Need & What You Get

  • Why: We need $50,000 in order to: a)Build the Prototype. b)Patent the Prototype. c)Manufacture the amounts necessary to get these Pieces into Department Stores and Hip Boutiques across the USA and the World.
  • Perks: Aside from the discounts off our website, dianaciler.com, we will also be rewarding you with several of the jewelry pieces in Diana's line right now (as seen in the picture above), as well as the coveted pair of Dimension Earrings.
  • What if no-go-go: Should the funds not reach the $50,000 we ask for, we will still Build the Prototype and Manufacture as many as we possibly can.

The Impact

  • Value: This concept of one pair of Earrings making several types of Jewelry, will save people money, time, and the pain of having to choose from many pieces of Jewelry strewn about your room. They will look killer on you as well...
  • Track Record: Diana Ciler is represented by Promenant, which sells Fashion and Jewelry around the World to every major Department and Chain Store. Promenant knows what will sell and is 1000% positive, this is the next big thing in the World of Fashion and Jewelry. 

Risks & Challenges

  • Challenges: This concept has never been done before, so there is a lot of trial and error.  That being said, we have already put a good amount of our own money into the trial and error process and are proud to say, we have beaten it. This concept is now tested and with your funds, we can take it to Market.

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Can't Help?: It's OK, we get it, we have been there, you can not help us out with Funds, but, we can most definitely use your word of mouth.  Put it on Facebook, Tweet your friends, Pin it on Pinterest, Instagram it on Instagram, heck, shout it from the mountaintops and if you don't have a mountaintop, we will take a hill, a valley, or whatever you got.
  • Share Tools: Use your Indiegogo share tools, that would be most excellent!

story:
The Story

"What if you started a clothing company?"

I thought about my mother's suggestion for a moment and something deep inside said, “Yes.”

Virginia Dare Dress Co. began in this moment of clarity after a perfect storm of frustration with my shopping attempts coupled with my desire to do something more.

I believe beautiful dresses make us feel confident and graceful. I'm drawn to classic silhouettes and simple styles that are flattering and elegant yet easy to wear every day.

In my 10 years working as a photographer, I found there are many of us who love how we feel in dresses, but the right ones are so difficult to find.

So I googled: how to start a fashion business…

Since then I've spent years studying design, production, pattern making, and fabric sourcing, as well as learning what we as women want to say about ourselves. Our clothing has a significant effect on us and helps form our identity and community.

Slowly I built this concept of a company that inspires others to their more beautiful potential. I worked with expert sample and pattern makers in New York and Washington DC, and now we're ready to launch.

This first collection was inspired by secret gardens and springtime in London. Perhaps, Kate Middleton and I out for a picnic.

This campaign will pre-sell the collection and fund the production run and start the online store while we continue working to make this dream a reality.

Please join us as we launch Virginia Dare Dress Co. Become a backer and help us tell this story!

Website | Instagram | Pinterest | Facebook

story:
The world's lightest and best fitting sunglasses with unparalleled eye protection, 100% custom 3D printed just for you.

Why settle for one-size-fits-all eyewear? You deserve better! Every single pair is custom designed to fit just for you, every detail is engineered for optimal performance and protection.

Made from ultralight aerospace materials, the Falcon 3D printed sunglasses are the lightest in the world.  Coming in at 17g, they're 23% lighter than the lightest Oakley sunglasses (EVZero - 22g).

Streamlined aerodynamic frame design with advanced coating technology keeps your sunglasses in place no matter how tough the competition.

 

 

[ Our Co-Founder, Rain, Demonstrating Her Custom Falcon I Sunglasses]
 

Your custom 3D printed sunglasses are guaranteed to perfectly contour every detail of your face, giving you the best fitting sunglasses you will ever own.

 

 

 

Made in Wisconsin and custom-cut by artisans in Rhode Island, USA, our High Definition UV400 lenses optimize safety and performance with 100% UV protection and maximized the field of vision.

[ Our Marketing Director, Yuri, Demonstrating the Quality of our Lenses ]

Our ultra-durable PC (polycarbonate) lenses are tested to withstand the most extreme elements, guaranteeing you absolute eye protection and fail-proof security against high-mass and high-velocity impact.

The frames are light, flexible, and strong made possible by the Internal micro-structures enabled by industrial-grade 3D printing technology.

 

 

The patented air ventilation channels allow precisely engineered air flow paths, giving you the ultimate aerodynamic and anti-fogging system available.

 

One-size-fits-all sunglasses fit less than 15% of the world's population, with our patented  3D-Fit system, you are guaranteed a perfect fit no matter the size or shape of your head.

 

We've built the world's first and largest head and face 3D scan database with over 3,500 data entries. Our patented  3D-Fit customization algorithms are designed based on our extensive 3D scan research and analysis. 

 

 

* Please note that all color and lens selections will take place after the campaign ends.

 

We are engineers, designers, and computer scientists who are driven to change the way people experience wearables. We have all had difficult times finding glasses, sunglasses, or helmets that could fit us and protect our lives when necessary.  It's our mission to make products that fit every unique individual perfectly. 

 

 

Risks & Challenges

Because we use 3D printing for production, we do not need minimum number of orders to meet the molding requirements, which means no matter how many orders we receive, we will have absolutely no problem fulfilling them. Some of the problems we might face are different from those of traditional manufacturers’, that’s why we took the extra time and effort to figure everything out before bringing the product to market. We are lucky to have gotten tremendous support from experienced people in the eyewear industry and 3D printing industry, who helped guide us through the challenges with this brand new technology. We can’t promise that we won’t make mistakes, but we promise to reduce the risks by planning ahead.  After all, all we want is to give you the best possible product, and the best possible experience.

* Please note that we are still in the process of running finite element analysis on the design, to test its aerodynamic performance, and strain and stress qualities. So what you see in the pictures and videos might not be the final design, but they are close representations of what the final product will look like. We will be posting updated images in the next few months, they are only going to look and perform better.

 

FAQ

1. How does the scanning work?

We are offering 2 methods for our backers to get scanned. 1) Download the Skelmet scan app (launching summer 2017) and get a friend to do the scan for you; 2) Go to a nearby scan partner shop to get a trained associate to take the 3D scan.

2. My head is really big, would it work?

Yes absolutely! There is a pair of sunglasses in everyone’s size no matter what size or shape your head is. Since these sunglasses are 100% custom made based on your facial structures, they will fit you perfectly no matter the size of your head.

3. What if they don't fit?

For the first 3 months after receiving the product, if you experience discomfort or improper fit, we will make new ones until they fit you perfectly.

4. Are they approved for safety?

We have been in close contact with the Vision Council to make sure our custom 3D printed products are in line with the safety standards. We have been given green lights from the people who wrote the standards, and have passed the initial tests for ANSI 80.3 with our prototypes. We are now working to pass for ANSI Z87.1 so that the sunglasses can qualify as safe sunglasses. We are confident that we can get the safety ratings approved.

5. What’s the frame made out of?

They are made with professional industrial grade SLS (Selective Laser Sintering) 3D printers with a polyamide-12 nylon-plastic material. It's similar to traditional sport sunglasses material, but lighter, and more flexible.

6. What’s the warranty policy?

We offer 2 year limited warranty for defects in workmanship and manufacturer materials. Improper usage and physical damage will not be covered.

Also because they are custom made for you, for any reason within the first 3 months upon receiving the product if you experience discomfort or improper fit, we will make new ones until they fit you perfectly.

7. Do you take insurance?

We are considered an out-of-network provider, so you can apply for reimbursement if you have an out-of-network benefit included in your vision plan. We will provide you with an itemized receipt with a complete break down once the item is shipped. Please contact your insurance provider for more information.

Some of the problems we might face are different from those of traditional manufacturers’, that’s why we took the extra time and effort to figure everything out before bringing the product to market. We are lucky to have gotten tremendous support from experienced people in the eyewear industry and 3D printing industry, who helped guide us through the challenges with this brand new technology. We can’t promise that we won’t make mistakes, but we promise to reduce the risks by planning ahead.  After all, all we want is to give you the best possible product, and the best possible experience.* Please note that we are still in the process of running finite element analysis on the design, to test its aerodynamic performance, and strain and stress qualities. So what you see in the pictures and videos might not be the final design, but they are close representations of what the final product will look like. We will be posting updated images in the next few months, they are only going to look and perform better. FAQ1. How does the scanning work?We are offering 2 methods for our backers to get scanned. 1) Download the Skelmet scan app (launching summer 2017) and get a friend to do the scan for you; 2) Go to a nearby scan partner shop to get a trained associate to take the 3D scan.2. My head is really big, would it work?Yes absolutely! There is a pair of sunglasses in everyone’s size no matter what size or shape your head is. Since these sunglasses are 100% custom made based on your facial structures, they will fit you perfectly no matter the size of your head.3. What if they don't fit?For the first 3 months after receiving the product, if you experience discomfort or improper fit, we will make new ones until they fit you perfectly.4. Are they approved for safety?We have been in close contact with the Vision Council to make sure our custom 3D printed products are in line with the safety standards. We have been given green lights from the people who wrote the standards, and have passed the initial tests for ANSI 80.3 with our prototypes. We are now working to pass for ANSI Z87.1 so that the sunglasses can qualify as safe sunglasses. We are confident that we can get the safety ratings approved.5. What’s the frame made out of?They are made with professional industrial grade SLS (Selective Laser Sintering) 3D printers with a polyamide-12 nylon-plastic material. It's similar to traditional sport sunglasses material, but lighter, and more flexible.6. What’s the warranty policy?We offer 2 year limited warranty for defects in workmanship and manufacturer materials. Improper usage and physical damage will not be covered.Also because they are custom made for you, for any reason within the first 3 months upon receiving the product if you experience discomfort or improper fit, we will make new ones until they fit you perfectly.7. Do you take insurance?We are considered an out-of-network provider, so you can apply for reimbursement if you have an out-of-network benefit included in your vision plan. We will provide you with an itemized receipt with a complete break down once the item is shipped. Please contact your insurance provider for more information.

story:
QUIK'STIX NOW AVAILABLE!

To purchase your Quik'Stix please select the required quantity indicated under each pledge tier on the right as well as the associated shipping amount. Orders will be sent out 1-2 business days of receiving your pledge. 


Recently Inov8Labs successfully raised enough funding on Kickstarter for the first batch raw materials, moulds and manufacturing, marketing, and distribution expenses necessary to successfully launch our product to market. However, after receiving an overwhelming amount of interest and amazing ideas from potential distributors and backers worldwide we, the Inov8Labs Team, would like to take things a step further. With help from you and the Indiegogo community the funds raised from this campaign will go towards facilitating research and development in future innovative products just like Quik'Stix and bringing these products to stores near you! 



Quik'Stix is a super sticky, multipurpose, two piece circular gel pad developed by Inov8 Labs that'll stick and secure just about anything you throw at it. Constructed specifically from a proprietary blend of injection moulded Poly AB Glue Plastic Quik'Stix provides greater stick, resistance, and durability than similar products in its class, can be cut, stretched and re-used by simply washing in warm water, and can be easily be repositioned when needed without loosing its super sticky properties. 

So where did the idea come from? The Quik'Stix idea was formed from analysing the multitude of options currently available on the market and understanding that they all lack a number of vital features needed to successfully become the go-to product for safely securing your household or everyday personal items. These included a secure reliable hold, a thoughtful design, and a proven recipe. Take Blue Tack as an example. Although it was designed to be used over and over again to temporarily fasten objects in fixed locations such as a wall or desk it generally lacks the ability to secure anything more than paper or small items such as pens. This provides a problem when you need to hold something heavier such as a remote, phone, or tablet. To solve this problem many people then lean towards another staple product. 3M backed Hooks or Velcro. Now although they do a great job at holding the extra weight they are either too bulky or lack the ability to be reused once placed. What happens if you want to move that picture frame you've just placed? or the iPad you would like in rotated? You get the idea!

Quik'Stix not only solves all these problems but also adds a bunch of extra features and this is where we need your help! We want Quik'Stix to be the go-to staple product for all your household and personal fastening needs and in order to do so are approaching you, our fellow Indiegogo backers, to help us bring our amazing product to market!


It's trademark Green colour is not just for looks! For those after a more secure design we've added a removable green tape similar to that of 3M's ultra strong hold technology to one side of the circular design. This allows objects up to 600 grams to be safely and more permanently secured to most smooth surfaces all without causing any damage. However if you're after a less permanent solution, make a mistake, or simply change your mind this can still be easily removed.


Each Quik'Stix is made up of a centre circle and outer ring measuring 35mm (1.378in) and 55mm (1.97in) in diameter and has been engineered to safely hold objects up to 600g (1.322lb) which is more than enough for most small household or personal items. Our super sticky yet easily removable custom recipe was designed by the graduate engineers at Inov8 Labs and while we cannot disclose the exact chemical compound it did involve reengineering a base recipe from the ground up to provide a superior hold as compared to similar products currently offered to market.

To add to the already appealing aesthetics we also chose the colour green for the secure hold technology as it proved to be the best option for locating the Quik'Stix on the majority of car dashes, walls, benches, etc. It also looks super cool!

Understanding that people may also want to use this product without it being so visible we kept the Poly AB Glue Polymer transparent as this allows the Quik’Stix to remain looking new and more attractive for longer plus reducing the visible signs of dust and debris. 

 

Removal of the Quik’Stix pads is simple. To correctly remove the Quik’Stix from the desired surface start by slowly lifting one edge of the sticky gel pad upwards and away from the surface. Using the released section as a tab continue by slowly peeling up the rest of the Quik’Stix as shown above.

Removal of your possessions is even easier. Simply grip the item firmly and rotate either clockwise or anti-clockwise.


With usability in mind it was vital to make Quik'Stix 100% re-usable without losing its ever so sticky qualities. We designed a custom Poly AB Glue Plastic recipe that can be used over and over again by simply washing it under warm water. Just leave it to dry in room temperature for roughly 30 seconds and it's ready to be used like new!


Another important aspect in the design was the working temperature range of Quik’Stix. One of the many ways we like to use our Quik’Stix is to secure our phones to the car dash for use as a hands free gps device. However, the car dash can get very hot especially when driving or parked in the sun and thus it was important to create a product that could be used in across a broad range of temperatures. Our custom injection moulded Poly AB Glue Plastic recipe was specifically engineered to address this problem and can be used from -16 degrees celsius (0 F) all the way up to 62 degrees celsius (150 F).


This is where we need you! Although we've successfully raised our original funding goal on Kickstarter the money raised from our Indiegogo crowdfunding campaign will go to facilitating further research and development and future innovative products just like Quik'Stix.


Share Quik'Stix on Instagram and Facebook. 

Facebook

Instagram

 Website Link:

inov8aus.com (in development)


Disclaimer: Use Quik'Stix with common sense. Although Quik'Stix has been developed to hold objects up to 600g (1.322lb) it is NOT advisable to push the limits of the design. This means if the object is heavy, expensive, or precious more Quik'Stix pads should be used to safely secure the object to the desired surface. Another important factor affecting the overall strength capabilities of the design is the surface type you are trying to stick to. Generally the bumpier/rougher the surface the less likely Quik'Stix can guarantee a secure hold. The same applies for the surface of the object you are securing. Quik'Stix, Inov8 Labs and any related persons or groups are not liable in anyway for any damage to your belongings, surfaces or self when using Quik'Stix gel pads so please use with caution.

Returns: Should you receive your Quik'Stix pad in less than perfect condition, you may contact us for a free replacement. We will be happy to work with all of our Indiegogo backers to resolve any and all issues that they have, should any arise. However, Since this is a crowdfunding campaign and we are offering Quik'Stix as a pre-order in the form of a reward for your financial contribution rather than as a retail item, we do not have a return policy, we cannot give returns or refunds due to change of mind, misuse, damaged items due to misuse, or damage to products used with Quik'Stix or any reason other than your Quik'Stix arriving in a condition that will prevent you from using it. We have put a lot of effort into creating and developing such an amazing product and have proven the reliability and consistency in our design and production methods to ensure our pledgers complete satisfaction. However if in the odd chance you receive a defective item (as described above) we will do our best to quickly resolve the issue.

Video credits:

Music: www.bensound.com 

Supported by:

http://kickingitforward.org 


To ensure complete and successful fulfilment of all Quik'Stix orders we have reached agreements with 2 highly rated international manufacturing companies who have proven their reliability, consistency, and manufacturing capabilities. 

We have also carried out a complete risk analysis in which we feel has accounted for the majority of foreseeable risks and challenges over the entirety of this project. If in the unlikely situation we encounter any unforeseen changes that could potentially affect the supply and delivery of Quik'Stix you will be notified ASAP. 

We believe as our backers it is of the highest importance to keep you informed and the project as transparent as possible so please feel free to contact us by leaving a comment and we'll try our best to reply to all your questions.

story:
In Demand

Thank you to all the backers that have made this campaign a complete success.  As I now go into the final factory sample and order stage the campaign itself is now 'InDemand' and enters the after funding portion between now and delivery.

 

Spitfire Aviators Sunglasses with Side-Shields

Circa 1940s: The Spitfire fighter — flawlessly designed and nimble in the air — pierced the skies of Great Britain.

O’Riginal’s Trading Co. is thrilled to bring you the Spitfire Aviator sunglasses. These are true aviator sunglasses with stainless steel wire frame construction and wire-mesh side-shields that don’t interfere with peripheral vision. Spitfires are great in the car, on the mountain, at the beach or just walking around town. They’ll keep you looking cool as you head into the dog fights of daily life.

Spitfire by O'Riginal's Trading Co.

O'Riginal's Trading Co.

 

O’Riginal's was born out of my passion for sunglasses with side-shields. The Spitfire is my fourth crowdfunding campaign and the star of the OTC collection.

My previous three crowdfunding campaigns each surpassed funding goals and more than 15,000 pairs of OTC sunglasses are proudly worn by customers and backers.  

With the help of you and previous backers this campaign will bring the Spitfire Aviators into production.  Also, as a backer for the Spitfire you are going to end up with the coolest pair of sunglasses...or two pair, maybe even three.  

O’Riginal's is a small but mighty venture flying against the three large multi-national corporations that produce 90% of all sunglasses on the market. OTC brings originality to the game, providing unique designs and a very personal touch. 

Current Customers Agree

 

 

Undeniably Cool

Let's Break it Down

Spitfires have already been sampled and are ready for production.  I've spent the last several months getting them right and can now move forward.  Samples are not the final product and minor adjustments may be made as we enter the final stretch.

The Build.

Each pair of Spitfires are hand crafted stainless steel frames and side-shields.  This makes them durable and tough as nails. Like many of my other designs the side-shield hinges fold the shields behind the lens while the temples fold in front of the lens.  

Folding Wire Mesh Side-Shields

 

Wire mesh side-shields allow for full unobstructed peripheral vision.

 

Poly-Carbonate Lenses

Classic Colors

Green, Gray, Amber, Polarized UV 400

 

 

 

Mirrored Colors

Blue, Silver, Orange, Polarized UV 400

 

 

It Weighs What!?!?

With the polycarbonate lenses and stainless steel wire frames the glasses are extraordinarily light at 1.25 oz. or 35.4 g.  In other words less than many plastic or even 'classic' frames out on the market today.

The new molds are made and samples tested.  It is now time to get the Spitfire backed and enter production.

Measurements

  • Lens 55mm
  • Frame Temple to Temple 152mm (about 6 inches)

Why Should You Back The Spitfires?

  1. I want you to love the look of the glasses.  If you are like me, and there are a lot of you out there...glasses with side-shields do it for you.  They always have for me, as you can read here. If you don't love them don't back them. (But what's not to love? You saw them!)
  2. I have been successful with 3 previous crowdfunds, 2 on Indiegogo and 1 on Kickstarter.  I surpassed goal on each crowdfund and have fully delivered over 10,000 pairs of glasses to backers and customers.
  3. You can see reviews from customers via a third party on my website I have a 92% rating from Shopper Approved. You can see those here.
  4. I also have over 40K fans on the O'Riginals Trading Co. FB page.
  5. You have backed me in the past and know the pride and care I put into each line of glasses.

The Perks

Early Bird - Choose any color of Spitfire at a reduced backing level and limited quantity.  One per backer

The Ace - You get one pair of Spitfires in the color of your choice.

The Dogfight- You get two pairs of Spitfires in the color of your choice.

The Squadron- You get three pairs of Spitfires one in each color.

Where Does The Backing Go?

Once fees are paid and funds are dispersed to O'Riginal's Trading Co.  the order with the factory will be placed and confirmed.  I usually place a 40% deposit and pay the balance at time of shipping.  I also hold funds until I approve the production sample.

After a successful crowdfund I plan to place the order at or around December 18th, if funds have been released by Indiegogo.  I hope to be shipping the Spitfires by April 20th of 2020.

It's All About You

I first started refurbishing antique glasses in 2011 before I started the crowdfund  odyssey that brought my O'Riginals Sterling 23 to the market in 2015.  That is when the glasses became about you, the backer and customer.  I realized then I am not the only one who loves this type of eyewear.  That's when O'Riginals Trading Company became a team with those who have supported me on this journey. 

I now have friends from Delhi to Denver and Sydney to Salzburg.  O'Riginal's glasses with side-shields have been to the South Pole and the summit of Mt. Everest.  They even protected a customer from losing their eye to a saw blade in their metal shop.

I am so fortunate to continue onto the next glasses line and thankful to have you with me for the ride.

Risks & Challenges

To be honest I don't see much risk, I am not new to crowdfunding my glasses and have fulfilled all backers in the past. I am fully confident that every backer will get their glasses.

The Challenge is getting them in the time frame that I project.  My three projects have all run later than expected.  I have run into production issues that added time to the back end.  I believe I am building enough time into the schedule to get an 'on time' shipping schedule.

Here are two examples of issues that added time into the final shipping on one occasion the side-shields were not done correctly and I had to send 1,000 pair back to the factory .  Another time the factory used the wrong rivets. I had to replace 8,000 rivets on 2,000 pairs of glasses myself prior to shipment.

Shipping can be a challenge.  When you are shipping world-wide it can take some time to get to Johannesburg.

Issues arise. It is the nature of crowdfunding, but a good producer will fix the problems that come up.  Crowdfunding isn't like buying fro Amazon, it is a process and you are along for the ride, good, bad and ugly.  

Bottom line, producing products is difficult and not for the faint of heart.  I have three successful public crowdfunds behind me. Here's to another one.

If You Can't Back The Spitfire

Thank's for taking the time to have a good look at the Spitfire Aviators from O'Riginals.  I appreciate that they may not be for everyone and you aren't going to back the project.  However, I bet you know someone or there is somebody in your social media reach that would love to have a look at the Spitfires.

  • Please take a minute an share this out on the huge and vast interwebs.  You know Facebook, Instagram, Twitter...whatever else you are using.

Here are two examples of issues that added time into the final shipping on one occasion the side-shields were not done correctly and I had to send 1,000 pair back to the factory .  Another time the factory used the wrong rivets. I had to replace 8,000 rivets on 2,000 pairs of glasses myself prior to shipment.
Shipping can be a challenge.  When you are shipping world-wide it can take some time to get to Johannesburg.
Issues arise. It is the nature of crowdfunding, but a good producer will fix the problems that come up.  Crowdfunding isn't like buying fro Amazon, it is a process and you are along for the ride, good, bad and ugly.  
Bottom line, producing products is difficult and not for the faint of heart.  I have three successful public crowdfunds behind me. Here's to another one.


If You Can't Back The Spitfire
Thank's for taking the time to have a good look at the Spitfire Aviators from O'Riginals.  I appreciate that they may not be for everyone and you aren't going to back the project.  However, I bet you know someone or there is somebody in your social media reach that would love to have a look at the Spitfires.
Please take a minute an share this out on the huge and vast interwebs.  You know Facebook, Instagram, Twitter...whatever else you are using.

story:
The moment you want to go out lightly, VOIXATCH guarantees exceptional portability.
Feel around you, and get connected anytime anywhere.

 

VOIXATCH embodies the ultimate smartwatch technology, matching seamless LTE + GPS connectivity and smartwatch features with personalized style.

The Bezel Headset features Qualcomm Bluetooth 5.0 technology that fine-tunes dynamic sound with Knowles BA Speaker, as well as the multi-pairing that connects your smartphone and VOIXATCH whenever and wherever you are.

 

 

With / Without VOIXATCH

The moment you want to go out lightly, VOIXATCH guarantees exceptional portability.

Everything on Your Wrist

With patented truly wireless all-in-one design, VOIXATCH gives you more freedom and convenience to discover the true value of a smartwatch with Google VOICE.

 

Anytime, Anywhere

VOIXATCH works as a cellular smartwatch with the built-in Bluetooth bezel headset that keeps you ready to make and take calls and stay connected, whether you have your smartphone with you or not.

Notification 

Effortlessly check and reply to a text message from your smartphone or VOIXATCH itself.

 

Evolving Style 

Convenience and performance should be dynamic, and so should style. That’s why VOIXATCH features a customizable design.

Tech meets Fashion

From the Moonlight Blue for a night out at a party to the Platinum Silver when you go to the office, VOIXATCH comes with a sleek selection of different colors that will always help you to dress--and wear a smartwatch--to impress!

 

Always Charging on Your Wrist

The smartwatch keeps your Bluetooth headset charged and ready for your next call without you having to carry a separate charging case.

Intuitive UI/UX

Not only the intuitive Ul/UX allows you to easily control watch functions and apps, but also  the optimized way of using H/W makes it easy for you to access VOIXATCH functions, for example, an incoming call will be automatically received two seconds after detaching the bezel headset.

VOIXATCH has a hexagonal based icon which is optimized for circular display, making it easier to touch frequently used app.

Only need One Hand

You need only one hand to put the Bluetooth Bezel headset on your ear. Just detach the bezel and push the side button, then a support hook on the back of the headset pops out, and you can secure the headset on your ear.

Lose No More

VOIXATCH has a wing-shaped protrusion to prevent the bezel from detaching unexpectedly. That makes it harder to lose and easier to keep safe and right where you want it, all the time. To detach the Bluetooth bezel headset, twist it counterclockwise and then lift it off the watch body.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Gold or Platinum?

True Wireless

Real Handsfree ​

VOIXATCH

 

The product concept came out in 2015 and was patented in the US in 2016. And now we finally launch the campaign in Kickstarter after years of effort. We believe that VOIXATCH is founded on the basis of blending practical design with innovation, and makes life easier not only for you but also for the disabled, especially to the visually impaired. (We need more years to develop the new type of VOIXATCH for the disabled. Because, they need their own UI/UX, and also help from Social Welfare Center).

In the near future, we will adopt more functions in the bezel and give you expandability through swapping bezels(We call this 'The Bezel Platform'). To achieve this mission, we are looking forward to your support. Thanks. Sincerely.

- team VOIXATH –

 

 Developing of VOIXATCH

 

IR & Networking

story:
Being a mama isn't all cuddles and milk comas, it's hard work. The day in the life of a mama can be a relentless series of wins & losses. But that feeling when you catch your bottle of milk just before it hits the floor or find your hidden pack of safety wipes after you think you've just run out... These are Superhero Mama moments and those are the good days.

So how will this diaper bag help me have more of those good days?

Have you ever forgotten a change of clothes? Or needed a burp cloth because someone has some impressive projectile spit up? Is the restroom at brunch so tiny and you need a place to change your babe? Do you need two diapers every time you change her because she likes to triumphantly pee in your face to announce that she's done? Do you need all these things but still need a small and light way to carry all these things around?

The Original Swagroll is an innovative new style of diaper bag. You will always have what you need on hand, in the exact place where you left it and all in one compact bag. You'll be so fast, your childless friends won't even know that you've changed a diaper before they've had time to wrinkle their noses.

Be one of the first to support us and get The Original Swagroll diaper bag for only $55 for the first 48 hours ($90 retail) Or scroll down to see our other reward bundles down below.

"Simply obsessed"

"Stylish But Functional"

"She's worked hard on perfecting the functionality (and beauty!)"

The Original Swagroll is our first ever diaper bag. It all started in a conversation with my pregnant sister in 2010. She needed a compact and travel-friendly diaper bag that held everything she needed for a day or weekend trip. It needed to be organized and easily accessible, as well as small enough to fit into her favorite handbag. The handbag that she refused to give up simply because she was now a mama! After 8 years we have tested with real mamas in our beta version, and now refined the design and increased it's functionality beyond your wildest dreams! It is easy-to-use, organized with quick-draw pockets, compact & sleek. It is a diaper carry-all system that will make your job and life a little easier.

Core features:

  • Use it 3 ways: Inside your favorite handbag or backpack, cross-body messenger bag or hook it on the back of any restroom door.
  • 100% machine washable & changing mat included!
  • 9 organized, expandable pockets - all accessible from the side.
  • Unique quick-draw compartment accessible by zipper, holding your go-to items. 
  • Magnets and adjustable buckles allow you to hold as little or as much as you need.
  • Compact & sleek, made for dad too.
  • Made from our luxuriously soft, vegan leather and water-repellant lining. Changing Mat and detachable shoulder strap included.

Interior

Organized, Quick-Draw Pockets.

 

Unzip the bag at the bottom to reveal your quick-draw pockets with your main go-to items. Wet-wipes and diapers. Boom!

Unroll The Original Swagroll to reveal 7 interior pockets designed to hold all your diaper-changing necessities.

  • 2x mesh pockets for creams, extra tissues, pacifiers etc 
  • 2x expandable pockets for diapers, extra clothes or burp cloths 
  • Wet-wipe dispenser 
  • Double-zipped wet bag for your dirties 
  • Changing Mat included 

Roll it up and use the 2 exterior pockets to hide that extra cheese-stick, toy monkey or carry your cell phone. Clip your keys to the d-rings so you have them on hand.

--- And once your babes are out of diapers, think about using this as your traveling toiletries bag.

Exterior

Fits Inside the Handbag or Backpack you already Love!

Don't replace all your favorite bags just because you're a Mama now. Throw this little thing into your favorite medium-sized handbag or backpack, and no-one will even know that you can change diapers in one-minute-flat. Dad can use it this way too! (Let's be real, he might take two minutes)

Wear it cross-body as a messenger bag with the detachable shoulder strap for your no-fuss, hands-free adventures to the park or out to coffee. 

Hook it on the back of any public restroom door when you're out to brunch and unroll it so that all your diaper-changing-tools are right where you need them.

100% Machine Washable

Made from a deliciously soft vegan leather with a water-repellant lining. This diaper bag goes straight in the washing machine and dryer, because Mama, you know things are going to get messy. Wipe it down for those smaller messes.

Compact & Sleek

Lightweight and compact, this little bag packs a big punch. It weighs in at under one pound and fits inside any medium sized handbag or backpack - it's seriously that small!

Super soft fabric, sturdy zippers and hardware. No shiny logos, no cheesy prints or vinyl-sided fabrics here. This bag comes in Black. 

The Diaper Wallet

As part of our rewards we are offering a limited edition Diaper Wallet. Made from the same luxe vegan leather, it is machine washable. It has two zipper openings and an internal pocket with snap closure. This can be used for diapers, or as a chic clutch for your personal belongings. This bag comes in Black.

Agatha Cub is a small startup in New York founded and led by Bianca Reis, who was frustrated with the gender stereotyped clothing available for kids. This inspired Bianca to design her own kid’s clothes, offering a different perspective on what is accepted as ‘normal’.

Staying true to that motivation, The Original Swagroll is our answer to every mama who wants to be as organized as possible without announcing to the world their mom status via a gigantic paisley or chevron printed diaper bag. We have refined the design over 8 years, including a beta production run to really get the details right but now we need your support to make it a reality.

Bianca is an Australian native and mother of two who now lives in Brooklyn, New York. Crossing the threshold into motherhood was life changing for Bianca and as she navigates the highs and lows, she hopes to share all that she learns. Because it really does take a village, which is why we are here!

DIMENSIONS:

  • 12” wide x 8” high (expandable)
  • 40” shoulder strap 
  •  0.75 lbs. weight (so light!) 
  • 4” top handle drop

MATERIALS:

  • Luxe vegan leather, machine washable
  • Water-repellant weather-cloth lining 
  • Premium zippers & hardware
