story:
Founders was conceived after trying and failing to answer the seemingly simple question of where to go to buy great shoes? 

The shoes we wanted we couldn’t afford, and the shoes we could afford, we didn’t want. 

Together, we can fix that.

Sue. Our Classic Cap-Toe Oxford
Founders: What Makes Us Who We Are
  • Materials. Top-quality luxury French calfskin, double-thick genuine leather soles, stacked leather heels, and glove-lined interiors. The leather is as bullet-proof and beautiful as it comes - it will develop a beautiful patina over time and withstand the stress of years of wear and multiple resolings.
  • Make. World-class production in a multi-generational, family-owned luxury factory in Naples, Italy using Rapid Stitch Construction - full leather insole, full leather midsole, full leather outsole. It is the benchmark standard of quality shoe production. If you have never experienced shoes produced in the craftsman tradition - the attention to detail combined with unparalleled durability is the definition of 'less is more' mentality - it's simply how it should be done.
  • Value. We are offering our first release direct-to-consumer in order to provide an unheard of value in the luxury shoe market. Shoes produced to similar quality standards and with similar luxury materials retail for 3-4x what we are offering here on Indiegogo. This is a top-quality product that will be on your feet for years.
  • Beauty. With your help, it is our goal not only to provide these essentials - everyone needs a lace-up, a loafer, and a beautiful boot - but to build a brand focused on producing top-quality, patently beautiful product that tells our story. We want to establish Founders as the answer to the uncertainty and anxiety we all experience trying to find quality at a fair price - a brand that you can have confidence in time and again.
  • Care. Each pair of Founders shoes comes with a pair of double barrel, high vamp, genuine cedar shoe trees and luxury shoe bags. In contrast to today's world of fast-fashion, Founders is offering a decade product - with proper care, a pair of Founders will be part of your life for years to come. Shoe trees are the most important part of that care regime - they maintain the shoe's shape, fight unnecessary creasing, alleviate odor, help the shoe dry properly - and honestly just look so cool.
Models

It is our goal in designing Founder's initial product offerings to focus on the three shoes that everyone should have in their closet. If you are going to own only three shoes, we think these should be the three.
Sue. The classic. Our 5-Eyelet, Cap-toe Oxford. Wedding, interview, uptown, downtown - the killer everyone has to have in their closet. Most people make something like this - very few get it right.

Sue. Click for additional angles.

Sue.
Colemore. 7-Eyelet, Cap-toe, Ankle Boot. We understand not everyone wears a 'dress shoe' every day. To address those with a less formal aesthetic, we designed the Colemore to bridge the gap. With unparalleled construction and a Vibram second-sole, this is actually tougher than the popular faux-workboots out there...and you don't have to get caught wearing a faux-anything.

Colemore. Click for additional angles.

Colemore. Vibram second sole.
Lehman. Moc-stitch, Half-strap, Penny loafer. It's actually the most versatile Founders model - the beautiful curves and deceptively intricate design - people who should get it, do.

Lehman. Click for additional angles.

Lehman. Unsuccessful bank, very successful loafer.
Bailey. Our shoe tree - double barrel, high vamp, plated brass knob, genuine cedar, sized according to shoe. It doesn't get much love on its own but is the most important part of any shoe care regime - plus shoes just look so much better with trees. 

Bailey. The under-appreciated MVP.
 ***Each pair of Founders shoes purchased through this Indiegogo campaign will be shipped with shoe trees and shoe bags included.
Founders' #1 Last
All Founders models offered in this Indiegogo are made using Founder's '#1 Last'. It is the culmination of countless revisions, work in two countries, and a few late nights - in order to bring customers a truly beautiful shape, an honest true-to-size fit in a 'D' (Medium) width, and something that is interesting without screaming - classic without being dull.

#1 Last. Classic without being dull.

Note on sizing: Founders is being offered in a medium (D) width fitting in US Men's Sizes 7 to 13 and has been designed to fit true-to-size. That being said, for those that consistently fall between sizes we suggest choosing the larger of the two.

Our size guide. As always, please contact us with any questions.
Quality
The construction of a top-grade luxury shoe is an incredibly complicated and often contentiously debated process, but we think it is helpful to bucket 'quality' into two main concepts: materials and construction.
Materials
At Founders we source our materials from some of the oldest, most well-respected tanneries and sole manufacturers in France and Italy. Our calfskin is produced to withstand years of wear, multiple resolings and will develop a beautiful patina over time. While you should always wear Founders to fit your style, we suggest trying light buffing and conditioner instead of traditional waxes in order to let the quality of the calfskin shine through.

Colemore. The Colemore boot has a Vibram rubber second sole instead of our traditional double leather sole.
Construction
Founders shoes are made in a multi-generational, family-owned, luxury shoe factory in Naples, Italy using Rapid Stitch Construction. In Rapid Construction a leather insole is stitched to a leather midsole and then a second stitch connects the leather midsole to a leather outsole. What you are left with is a full stitched leather construction without any glue or fillers and a shoe that provides a best-in-class foundation for foot support, weight distribution, motion transfer, water repellency, and the ability to resole the shoe multiple times if necessary.

Lehman. Sacrificed to the table saw - full sewn leather construction - nothing to hide.
Note on the break-in process: We are offering a luxury, all-leather shoe that is built to withstand the test of time. With this in mind, we suggest that the first time you wear Founders, wear them with socks and for a manageable distance. This will allow the leather to mold to your foot's particular shape and gait without unnecessary discomfort.
Indiegogo Rewards
Be the first to experience the beautiful product we're making by supporting our project at pricing that is exclusive to our Indiegogo campaign.
  • $50 Contribution: Monogrammed shoe trees. We will brand your initials (or whatever you want for that matter, up to 3 letters) on a set of our premium Bailey shoe trees and send them to you in a Founder's luxury shoe bag. You can choose any size tree available in this promotion.

Bailey. Your initials - up to three characters.
  • All Other Levels: Based on your donation level, 1 to 6 pairs of Founders shoes, all shipped with Founder's premium Bailey shoe trees and luxury shoe bags. Customer can select any model, either color, and any size - even repeats - according to donation level.

For example: if you donate $850 to the campaign you will receive your choice of 3 pairs of Founders shoes and can select any of the 3 models, in either color, in any size of your choosing - even repeats - each shipped with our premium Bailey shoe trees and luxury shoe bags. 

Want two black boots in size 9 and one brown loafer in a 12? Not a problem.

Thank You

Thank you for taking the time to view our Indiegogo campaign. As you've heard a few times by now, we are looking to build Founders into the place where you feel confident coming to get great shoes - the right quality, the right value, and a brand you can have confidence in moving forward. With your help we hope to turn our passion into reality.

Please feel free to ask us any questions either here via Indiegogo or at info@shopfounders.com, visit us online at www.shopfounders.com, and click the picture below for additional photographs of each model.

Thanks for visiting our Indiegogo campaign! Click here for a few more shots.

Lehman. Click for additional angles.



Lehman. Unsuccessful bank, very successful loafer.


Bailey. Our shoe tree - double barrel, high vamp, plated brass knob, genuine cedar, sized according to shoe. It doesn't get much love on its own but is the most important part of any shoe care regime - plus shoes just look so much better with trees. 



Bailey. The under-appreciated MVP.

 ***Each pair of Founders shoes purchased through this Indiegogo campaign will be shipped with shoe trees and shoe bags included.
Founders' #1 Last
All Founders models offered in this Indiegogo are made using Founder's '#1 Last'. It is the culmination of countless revisions, work in two countries, and a few late nights - in order to bring customers a truly beautiful shape, an honest true-to-size fit in a 'D' (Medium) width, and something that is interesting without screaming - classic without being dull.



#1 Last. Classic without being dull.

Note on sizing: Founders is being offered in a medium (D) width fitting in US Men's Sizes 7 to 13 and has been designed to fit true-to-size. That being said, for those that consistently fall between sizes we suggest choosing the larger of the two.



Our size guide. As always, please contact us with any questions.

Quality

The construction of a top-grade luxury shoe is an incredibly complicated and often contentiously debated process, but we think it is helpful to bucket 'quality' into two main concepts: materials and construction.

Materials
At Founders we source our materials from some of the oldest, most well-respected tanneries and sole manufacturers in France and Italy. Our calfskin is produced to withstand years of wear, multiple resolings and will develop a beautiful patina over time. While you should always wear Founders to fit your style, we suggest trying light buffing and conditioner instead of traditional waxes in order to let the quality of the calfskin shine through.

Colemore. The Colemore boot has a Vibram rubber second sole instead of our traditional double leather sole.

Construction
Founders shoes are made in a multi-generational, family-owned, luxury shoe factory in Naples, Italy using Rapid Stitch Construction. In Rapid Construction a leather insole is stitched to a leather midsole and then a second stitch connects the leather midsole to a leather outsole. What you are left with is a full stitched leather construction without any glue or fillers and a shoe that provides a best-in-class foundation for foot support, weight distribution, motion transfer, water repellency, and the ability to resole the shoe multiple times if necessary.



Lehman. Sacrificed to the table saw - full sewn leather construction - nothing to hide.
Note on the break-in process: We are offering a luxury, all-leather shoe that is built to withstand the test of time. With this in mind, we suggest that the first time you wear Founders, wear them with socks and for a manageable distance. This will allow the leather to mold to your foot's particular shape and gait without unnecessary discomfort.
Indiegogo Rewards

Be the first to experience the beautiful product we're making by supporting our project at pricing that is exclusive to our Indiegogo campaign.



$50 Contribution: Monogrammed shoe trees. We will brand your initials (or whatever you want for that matter, up to 3 letters) on a set of our premium Bailey shoe trees and send them to you in a Founder's luxury shoe bag. You can choose any size tree available in this promotion.


Bailey. Your initials - up to three characters.


All Other Levels: Based on your donation level, 1 to 6 pairs of Founders shoes, all shipped with Founder's premium Bailey shoe trees and luxury shoe bags. Customer can select any model, either color, and any size - even repeats - according to donation level.




Mix and match from these six beauties - any model, either color, any size - even repeats.
For example: if you donate $850 to the campaign you will receive your choice of 3 pairs of Founders shoes and can select any of the 3 models, in either color, in any size of your choosing - even repeats - each shipped with our premium Bailey shoe trees and luxury shoe bags. 
Want two black boots in size 9 and one brown loafer in a 12? Not a problem.
Thank You

Thank you for taking the time to view our Indiegogo campaign. As you've heard a few times by now, we are looking to build Founders into the place where you feel confident coming to get great shoes - the right quality, the right value, and a brand you can have confidence in moving forward. With your help we hope to turn our passion into reality.
Please feel free to ask us any questions either here via Indiegogo or at info@shopfounders.com, visit us online at www.shopfounders.com, and click the picture below for additional photographs of each model.



Thanks for visiting our Indiegogo campaign! Click here for a few more shots.

story:
Introducing the Flyfold Wallet

Your footwear, apparel, bags and watches have all been modernized with technical materials. The Pioneer Flyfold is the missing link that completes your wardrobe with the most technically advanced premium wallet— engineered for demanding & active lifestyles and built to last a lifetime. 

  The Flyfold's minimalist design holds full length bills and 10+ cards.

Conventional wallets fall apart. The Flyfold will last a lifetime.

Our main color. (seen in video and most imagery). All black thread and dark logo.

BLACK/WHITE color unlocked. 

BLUE/WHITE color unlocked. 

Features

Field-tested to the limits:

Athletes have put our technology to the test and their feedback has perfected our wallets.

We have shipped thousands of wallets across the world so you can feel very confident you will be backing something real, tested, worth-while.

Featured in:

  • “It made my leather wallet feel like the stone age. I was sort of ashamed of myself lol” -Ved, cinematographer, London ENG 
  •  “I have an early prototype from years ago and it still looks new!” -Todd, Industrial Designer, Seattle, WA 
  •  “The Flyfold was surprisingly easy to organize all my cards with the 2 large card slots” Mark, entrepreneur, Chicago IL 
  •  “The fabric feels like nothing I’ve ever felt. It’s smooth, firm, and feels obviously premium” -Bobby, cyclist, Scottsdale, AZ

1. 10X Stronger Than Steel

Our 10XD™ super fabric is ultra-high-molecular-weight-polyethylene (ten times stronger than steel per weight) blended into a fine nylon ripstop. The dense and tactile finish repels dirt and water, keeping your wallet in like-new condition for years.

2. Sweatproof, waterproof, & machine washable

Soggy leather wallets weigh you down and fall apart. If you ride to work in the summer you know the feeling. Forgetting your wallet was in your pants when you washed them now only cleans your wallet.

Heat-welded construction removes seams that are the first to burst. High stress areas feature bar-tacks that are stronger than rivets. The same bar-tacks used in climbing gear.

4. Breaks in with time, but never breaks down. 

Our Future form™ technology is the pliable core inside the Flyfold giving it form and a leather-like hand feel. Engineered to break in and mold to your cards with use and time, but never break down as leather does.

5. Minimalist style, maximum features

The Flyfold’s minimal design is still fully featured. 10 cards and full length bills is exactly what the modern wallet should hold. Large card slots are more secure and allow you to fan out cards for easy access.

 Closed measurements: about 83mmx105mm

Progress over tradition. Textile over leather.

We looked to the future to define the next generation of wallets. Leather cannot achieve the precision, control or durability we are able to achieve with our high-density weave and advanced manufacturing. We look to principles of function and refinement and celebrate better ways of making things.

Manufacturing confidence

We have been delivering world-class Pioneer product for the last year and a half and and our relationship with our manufacturing team is closer than our relationship with our own families (at times). Our overseas team in Saigon manufactures for the likes of Lululemon, Rapha, and The North Face. 

We have proven our technology with hundreds of prototypes and have produced thousands of wallets using our technology. We know you will receive a precision product and each and every wallet is personally inspected by us before being shipped. Summary: You are backing a real thing that really exists and will be delivered to you perfectly.

About Pioneer 

We are industry veterans, having designed for brands like Nike, Black Diamond Equipment, Brooks England, and Levi’s Commuter. We have taken our knowledge of technical fabrics and applied it to a new generation of wallets. With your support we hope to bring our designs to a larger audience and help fund further development into defining the future of carry.

Designers not businessmen. 

We are designers and athletes. We left the cubicle to launch Pioneer and create beautiful wallets that change old perceptions of what a wallet should be. We are passionate boot-strappers who focus entirely on product. Kickstarter will allow us to raise funds to keep our heads down and develop more stuff and get more feedback from users to push the envelope even further. 

See you out there with a Pioneer Flyfold Wallet! Thanks for your support!

This campaign is promoted by Backercamp. Since 2012, Backercamp has helped 5,000+ creators make their projects a reality, raising over $200MM through crowdfunding.

story:
World's Best Wireless Wearable Technology- Finally Here

 

You are familiar with the issue of trying to keep your earphones in so you can stay connected to your music or a call while you are on the go. It is even harder in the winter when you throw gloves into the mix!

Use it anyway you want! VERY Versatile!

Problems Solved

Say goodbye to the inconvenience of chords, earphones, and holding your phone!​

Beanie Blue is the answer to the problem we have all been waiting for!

Beanie Blue is made with Wireless Wearable Technology so that you can connect to your music or important call when you are on the go- leaving your hands free so you don’t miss a beat.

Specifications & Description:

  • You can pair Beanie Blue with any bluetooth enabled device (Bluetooth Version: V3.0+EDR)
  • As long as you stay within about 30 feet of the device you will stay connected.
  • The radius transmission of microphone is around 3 feet. Beanie Blue’s speaker mimics that of an earphone making sure your music or conversation stays a personal experience.
  • The internal microphone and speakers are securely positioned but can easily be removed if you need to wash the hat.
  • Charge battery with USB cable (Li-ion Battery:3.7V/120mA)
  • Battery charge time 2.5 hours, Continuous Use 5 hours, Standby time 60 hours
  • Volume Control and Pause/Play Control on side
  • Answer phone calls with Play/Pause button- Hands free answering and talking

Answer Phone calls and adjust music with the buttons on the side.

Speaker and Microphone on either side of the beanie

Removable microphone and speakers so you can wash the hat!

Charges easily and within 2.5 hours.

Reserve Yours Now!

What We Need & What You Get!

  • We want to create a brand around Convenient Wireless Technology. This is our first product that we are bringing to the market. We need this funded to get our first order out!
  • PERKS
    • ​Perk #1- 1 for $21
    • Perk #2- 2 for $35 ($17.50 each)
    • Perk #3- 10 for $ 160 ($16 each)
    • Perk #4- 50 for $750 ($15 each)
    • Perk #5- 100 for $1400 ($14 each)

 

Other Ways You Can Help

We know that some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • We are trying to get the word out about our campaign! It would really help us if you would share us with your circles.
  • Share, Share, Share! Please use the Indiegogo share tools to share this product with all your friends!

Timeline

story:
Aluminum Folding Fan "SPREAD"

A Traditional Folding Fan re-designed to be modern and simple,
made of aluminum alloy.

Features

  • Lightweight : It only weighs 65grams. A half of an iPhone 5S.
  • Simple and Chic : Simple design to emphasize the beautiful surface of anodized aluminum.
  • Durable : Strong enough for day-to-day use.
  • 100% Recyclable : Aluminum is fully recyclable material. However, you won't throw this fan away.


Specifications

Size (WxHxD)
Unfolded - 330 x 200 x 10 mm
(13.0 x 7.9 x 0.4 inches)
Folded - 20 x 200 x 20 mm
(0.8 x 7.9 x 0.8 inches)

Weight
65 g | 2.3 oz

Colors
Red, Metallic Grey

Retail Price : USD 55.00


The Funding

We have built our prototypes. We are currently looking for distributors around the world. At the same time, as a small design company, we are trying to minimize financial risk by testing our new product in the market.


Perks

(No extra Shipping Cost to European Countries, U.S., Australia, Asian Countries.
You can choose color option for each product.
We will contact you in early September.)

For $40 Contributors :
You will receive one folding fan.

For $150 Contributors :
You will receive one folding fan, plus a stationery set (one 16cm ruler, one 31cm ruler, a set of penvase, a photostand, and a clipboard), all made of aluminum.

For $400 Contributors :
You will receive 10 folding fans, with your logo engraved.

For $500 Contributors :
You will receive 10 folding fans, with your logo engraved. Plus, a stationery set(one 16cm ruler, one 31cm ruler, a set of penvase, a photostand, and a clipboard), all made of aluminum.


About theALU, INC.

Based in Seoul, South Korea, theALU, INC. designs and produces quality design products all made of aluminum. Through simple designs theALU expresses the unique and attractive characteristics of the aluminum material.

One of our products is currently being sold at MoMA Design Store in New York. (Go to MoMA Design Store)

story:
#19thAmendmentFund 19thAmendment.co @19thAmendment

19th Amendment is a fashion kickstarter site with an interactive portfolio tool (a.k.a. Virtual Studio) for fashion designers to showcase, get constructive feedback on, and sell their designs directly to the people that support their vision!

We've been ‘stiletto-strapping’ and we've accomplished a lot. But now we need your help to finish the development of our site so that we can focus on manufacturing independent, 'Made in the U.S.A." fashion! Your contribution to #19thAmendmentFund gets you one of the awesome 'perk' listed on the right.

Let's make a change

There is an alarmingly high failure rate for fashion designers trying to start their own lines due to high capital requirements and lack of business and manufacturing knowledge.  Our goal is to create a seamless process for fashion designers to kickstart thier career. 19th Amendment is innovating in the fashion industry by giving more designers a chance to succeed and more consumers the high quality, forward-thinking garments they want.

[Click on the designers below to see their Virtual Studios!]

       

       

      

Take back the runway

Too many talented fashion designers never reach their full potential.  With your help, we hope to:

  • Innovate the fashion industry for the better
  • Grow manufacturing in the U.S.A. from the ground up
  • Increase the number of successful fashion designers

As a customer, you get access to:

  • Curated clothing, made in the US, delivered to your doorstep
  • Direct interaction with designers - you tell designers what you like
  • Wholesale pricing of exclusive new designs before they hit the runway
  • A community of today’s most influential fashion curators 
  • An exclusive library of the next wave of design talent

    

      

      

Here's how we work

By using crowdfunding as a way for supporters to pre-pay for designs, we reduce the financial risk of designing a line. Our model allows consumers to give constructive feedback to designers so they understand what their customers want. Once a design is purchased at least ten times, we manufacture and produce for them.

Thanks to tiered manufacturing, the more a design sells, the less the cost of production, which means more profit for the designer and a lower cost for the consumer. 

Every garment is manufactured in the U.S.A. at partner facilities so, not only are you supporting us and our designers, you are supporting American manufacturing - and that really rocks!

Our Story

After graduating from Parsons School of Design, I experienced success desgining for New York Fashion Week, Ellen DeGeneres, and other established designers.  Despite all these great opportunities, I couldn't support myself on the wages I was being paid, jobs were increasingly being outsourced, and I found it impossible to break into the industry on my own. The odds were stacked against me and my design peers.

I founded 19th Amendment to help the next generation of great designers launch successful careers and to give consumers access to all the great, undiscovered fashion out there.

We need your help!

Through 19th Amendment we hope to help the future of the fashion industry by growing US manufacturing and accelerating the next generation of fashion designers. Please help us in our mission to move Fashion Forward!

story:
About Us

Gamblers Gear was founded on the idea that every player is part of a community. We are all familiar with the kinship towards Poker, however there are many other popular games at the casinos. We at Gamblers Gear feel that no one is properly creating a brand to service this entire community.

A casino outing is fun on many levels. The excitement we experience with friends as we compete to win cash, the memories from a weekend getaway and the new individuals we meet while sitting at the tables. We see no reason why these entertaining trips can’t be captured in a T-shirt that allows you to enjoy the moment with your friends, act as a reminder from the memories or perhaps a way to meet new people.

We believe that the image of this community is more than just that of a King or Ace card. They have a unique attitude and speak their own language. For example, Black Jack players know when it is best to Double Down their bets while Baccarat players are known to yell Monkey in the hopes of a face card. We have tried to capture some of these popular sayings into humorous designs that are still fashionable. 

A few examples of some of the insider gaming language we have incorporated into our designs can be seen in the following:

Double Down: This term is typically used during Blackjack when a player is dealt an 11 and doubles their bet in hopes of a 21. We have incorporated an 8 and a 3 into our design as a way to illustrate this.

King Monkey and Monkey (x3): Monkey is used by both Blackjack and Baccarat players in the hopes of being dealt a face card. Our Monkey (x3) design plays on the fun that Baccarat players typically yell this word three times for luck.

When the Fun Stops: This is a reference to the tag line for Gamblers Anonymous as a reminder that gambling is meant to be fun and enjoyable.

We have several initial designs for both men and woman, which can be seen by visiting our website at www.gamblersgear.com. Our shirts, which are a fitted cut, will be made with a tri-blend fabric (cotton/polyester/rayon) that feels comfortable in any environment.

Our vision for Gamblers Gear is to build a brand. We are starting with these initial T-shirt designs, however our goal is to add newer designs and eventually other apparel categories. Furthermore, with online gaming becoming legalized and the potential for exponential on-line traffic, we feel the timing is right for our concept. However, before we take our first step, we need your help today to get started.


What We Need & What You Get

We are asking for your help to raise $3,500. These funds will primarily be directed to start our screen-printing for each of our SKUs (8 designs for men and 7 for women). In addition to building an inventory, these funds will provide us with a boost to our PR budget to properly build the Gamblers Gear brand.

As a reward for your support, we would like to offer the following gifts: 

Pledge $10 or more: A Gamblers Gear post card with our logo and our King Monkey along with a handwritten thank you by the two co-founders

Pledge $25 or more: One grey T-Shirt with our King Monkey Design.

Pledge $40 or more: One grey T-Shirt with our King Monkey Design in addition to a second shirt of your choice among our designs.

Pledge $70 or more: One grey T-Shirt with our King Monkey Design and two additional shirts of your choice among our designs.

Pledge $85 or more: One grey T-Shirt with our King Monkey Design and two additional shirts of your choice among our designs. Donors will also get a personalized thank you on our Facebook page.

Pledge $200 or more: A shirt for each of our designs (8 in total for men and 7 for women), a special thanks on our Facebook page and if you so choose a picture of you wearing your Gamblers Gear shirt.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you are unable to directly support us in reaching our funding goal, we would appreciate any non-monetary help such as, sharing our Indiegogo campaign with your friends, telling others about Gamblers Gear and liking us on Facebook. 

Thanks for your time and your support!

Gamblers Gear
story_txt:
About
Us
Gamblers Gear was founded on
the idea that every player is part of a community. We are all familiar with
the kinship towards Poker, however there are many other popular games at the
casinos. We at Gamblers Gear feel that no one is properly creating a brand to
service this entire community.
A casino
outing is fun on many levels. The excitement we experience with friends as we
compete to win cash, the memories from a weekend getaway and the new
individuals we meet while sitting at the tables. We see no reason why these
entertaining trips can’t be captured in a T-shirt that allows you to
enjoy the moment with your friends, act as a reminder from the memories or
perhaps a way to meet new people.
We believe that
the image of this community is more than just that of a King or Ace card. They have a unique attitude and speak their
own language. For example, Black Jack players know when it is best to
Double Down their bets while Baccarat players are known to yell Monkey in the
hopes of a face card. We have tried to capture some of these popular sayings
into humorous designs that are still fashionable. 
A few
examples of some of the insider gaming language we have incorporated into our
designs can be seen in the following:
Double Down: This term is typically used during Blackjack when a
player is dealt an 11 and doubles their bet in hopes of a 21. We have
incorporated an 8 and a 3 into our design as a way to illustrate this.



King Monkey and Monkey (x3): Monkey is used by both Blackjack and
Baccarat players in the hopes of being dealt a face card. Our Monkey (x3)
design plays on the fun that Baccarat players typically yell this word three
times for luck.




When the Fun Stops: This is a reference to the tag line for Gamblers
Anonymous as a reminder that gambling is meant to be fun and enjoyable.


We have
several initial designs for both men and woman, which can be seen by visiting
our website at www.gamblersgear.com.
Our shirts, which are a fitted cut, will be made with a tri-blend fabric
(cotton/polyester/rayon) that feels comfortable in any environment.
Our
vision for Gamblers Gear is to build a brand. We are starting with these initial
T-shirt designs, however our goal is to add newer designs and eventually other
apparel categories. Furthermore, with online gaming becoming legalized and the
potential for exponential on-line traffic, we feel the timing is right for our
concept. However, before we take our first step, we need your help today to get started.

What We
Need & What You Get
We are asking for your help to raise
$3,500. These funds will primarily be directed to start our screen-printing
for each of our SKUs (8 designs for men and 7 for women). In addition to
building an inventory, these funds will provide us with a boost to our PR budget
to properly build the Gamblers Gear brand.
As a reward for your support, we would like to offer the following
gifts: 
Pledge
$10 or more: A Gamblers Gear post card with our logo
and our King Monkey along with a handwritten thank you by the two co-founders
Pledge
$25 or more: One grey
T-Shirt with our King Monkey Design.
Pledge
$40 or more: One grey
T-Shirt with our King Monkey Design in addition to a second shirt of your
choice among our designs.
Pledge
$70 or more: One grey
T-Shirt with our King Monkey Design and two additional shirts of your choice
among our designs.
Pledge
$85 or more: One grey
T-Shirt with our King Monkey Design and two additional shirts of your choice
among our designs. Donors will also get a personalized thank you on our
Facebook page.
Pledge
$200 or more: A shirt for
each of our designs (8 in total for men and 7 for women), a special thanks on
our Facebook page and if you so choose a picture of you wearing your Gamblers
Gear shirt.



Other
Ways You Can Help
If you
are unable to directly support us in reaching our funding goal, we would
appreciate any non-monetary help such as, sharing our Indiegogo campaign with
your friends, telling others about Gamblers Gear and liking us on Facebook. 
Thanks for
your time and your support!
Gamblers Gear

story:
Short Summary

Hi there!

My name is Peter McConnell, and I have created The Ogre. I live on the Gold Coast in Queensland, Australia, and my normal vocation is teaching corporate wellness.

I stumbled across my idea while thinking about how to carry a Stand-up Paddle Board to the beach, and this creation came to me. I could not find the design anywhere so I set about making some prototypes.

So, here I am, at that critical stage of needing to increase the size of the project.

The Ogre gets its name from being Ergo backwards, given it's an ergonomic strap, and I like the idea of an Ogre helping you carry your bags!

I have always seen this product as very simple and highly versatile across many industries. The Ogre protects your posture, reduces shoulder load, and frees up your hand instead of always needing to adjust the strap hanging off your shoulder.

The Ogre, with it's various attachments, will assist in carrying:

  • Surfboard bags
  • Media equipment
  • Travel bags
  • Sports bags
  • Construction equipment
  • Laptop bags
  • Golf bags, and many more.

With my passion for helping companies and individuals become healthier in every aspect of their lives, this product, The Ogre, is very special to me because I know I can help out a multitude of people who need to carry heavy loads for whatever reason. On a daily basis I see everyone from school children to golfers to cameramen struggling with the weight and load distribution of the bags they are hauling.

Current stage:

Presently, I am in the Patent Pending stage, and I have manufacturing and shipping organised and priced. I am using a local business with 15 years experience in organising the manufacture and shipping of goods to Australia. The next big step is cementing distribution channels in the various industries, and creating a strong online presence.

Thank you for your interest in helping The Ogre help others carry their load!

Testimonial:

“I believe the many advantages of this strap are:

  • Reducing the load on the shoulder and collarbone
  • Easing discomfort in the neck and shoulders
  • The horizontal strap disperses the load through the spine, improving posture and efficiency
  • The horizontal strap draws the shoulder load back toward the centre of the body
  • The load is maintained close to the body
  • Freeing the use of the hands.”

Kieran McLoughlin - Physical Therapist; Neuro-muscular Therapist; and Exercise & Movement Coach. Sydney. Australia

 

What We Need & What You Get

My wish is to create The Ogre on a grand scale, reaching industries and countries everywhere. My request for $75,000 is to pay for:

  • Further patenting work - this includes completing the Australian Patent process and International Patent application. After these steps ultimately I will also be selecting what countries to apply for Patents. The cost of this whole process can be upwards of $50,000.
  • Marketing & Distribution planning. Currently The Ogre wil be sold through various channels - online direct sales; wholesale to online sites; wholesale to relevant industry companies; and via relevant industry distributors.
  • Further design including different sizes, colours, and bag attachments. I have already organised manufacturing in Asia, and because they have minimum order requirements (1000 units), I will need to order a few thousand straps to cover the different sizes and attachments. Curently the colour is black,  however at the right time I will need to have several colour choices available. The prototype strap is a large size which will fit anyone up to about 120kg. It can be used on much smaller people (I am 85kg and it's adjusted to its mid-range.

For your kindness and generosity, I will be offering:

  • The Ogre in its prototype form which are immediately available (only 50 exist!!)
  • The Ogre in its newer state which will be available later in the year
  • The Ogre with extra attachments so you can use it for carrying a bare board..
  • The Ogre in bulk amounts of varying sizes at wholesale prices
  • And I like The Ogre logo so much I will be offering T-shirts to give more choices in price scale.

If I do not reach my entire funding goal, the funds will go to the patenting process first, and then into marketing and promotion costs. Ultimately every dollar I receive pushes me far closer to my goals with The Ogre.

 

The Impact

Developing The Ogre has been an amazing journey for me to this point. I have met some very helpful people and been well-guided. I see The Ogre as a wonderful tool to help people in many different industries with the carrying of their respective loads. As I teach corporate wellness and postural correction, The Ogre is another method by which I can assist people all over the world to carry heavy things more easily and more safely.

What started out as a curiosity in carrying a stand-up paddle board has morphed into a terrific project in helping people from all walks of life. I have much work to do in making this a success for everyone involved now and in the future, and with your help I can make this happen.

Thank you for your time and your contributions. I am truly grateful for your assistance and excited at what will be achieved!

Other Ways You Can Help

If you are not in a position to help financially with The Ogre Project, and you feel this project is valuable, I would humbly appreciate you forwarding this on to your friends,  family, and co-workers if suitable.

story:
Accessories with designs inspired by British wildlife and nature

Having worked in London for many years in various industries including law and finance, I changed career direction 5 years ago and set up my first venture designing handbags and accessories made with British manufactured fabrics such as Harris Tweed and Tartan.

This has now been successfully established,  www.chantam.com I have in total 8 years of experience in the fashion industry. I come from a creative family and find that as I am getting older my genes are taking over and I am becoming totally drawn into creative work. To expand the business I am now also developing number of consumer lifestyle products with designs inspired by British wildlife and nature.

I have always found happiness, peace, comfort and harmony in nature. My wish is to bring these positive elements into people's lives by way of bringing products with nature related patterns to market.

I would now like to take this project forward and make it successful, creating not only beautiful designs but also opportunities for young people qualified in art/design who are new entrants into the job market, as I think things are still tough for new graduates.

 I need funding of $37,000 to launch this new brand. The money will spent on logo, brand application, design protections, website, producing samples, completing some of the projects in progress, stationery, photography, marketing, software and equipment . The funds received will be spent in this order of priority. 

Special discounts and gifts will be given to sponsors.

I have been working on this project for the last 2 years and already completed 10 designs. With your help I will be able to turn the project into a brand. 

Some of the designs will also support charities both in UK and around the world. 

Your help will make a difference! 

Thank you.

Yasemin

story:
Thanks for checking out my campaign!

My name is Zach Stuck and I am a 20-year-old college marketing student and the sole founder of Pif Clothing Co., which I launched on January 16th of 2013. To say the least, the last couple of months have been crazy. Between releasing my first products, creating a universal donating process, developing a sustainable business, and learning as much as I can everyday about the clothing industry, all while fulfilling my brand’s mission, I’ve kept myself pretty busy. As of today, Pif Clothing Co. has sold around 200 total items and donated the same within our first 5 months in business. 

About Pif Clothing Co...

1. 100% Made in America Clothing – Manufactured in America garments, custom logo tags made in Florida, high quality screen-printed in Wisconsin, sewing done local. (Benefits national, state, and local economies).

2. For each item sold, Pif Clothing Co. donates the same quality/same design product to children who can truly benefit from it. All donating up to this point has been through multiple Boys & Girls Clubs in Wisconsin. Pif donates on somewhat of a quarterly basis (February/March, May/June, August/September, November/December).

3. At first glance, the price point may seem slightly high. Most clothing brands are charging the same (if not more) for their clothing, giving them loads of profit. Pif Clothing Co.’s approach is different. That profit is used to purchase another of the same quality shirt to give to a child.

... Join the movement to Pay It Forward and to support American made products by ordering from Pif Clothing Co. today.

Now to our summer line products…

One of each summer line product is fully created. In order to produce these products at a cost that supports our price point while still gaining profits, Pif Clothing Co. would need $30,000 in sales (about 600 t-shirts/tanktops and 100 sweatshirts). I greatly appreciate your support on any level. In turn, I am eager to supply you with a high quality Made in America product, equipped with high quality screen-printed graphics, and custom logo tags and tag-less tags. Above all, that same quality item will be given to a child that can benefit from it. Your support gives you and Pif Clothing Co. the opportunity to benefit many!

Thanks for all of your support. – Zach

 

Available Versions

 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 

Donated Versions

 

High quality American Made clothing.

You bet! Pif Clothing Co. plans to provide only American Made Clothing. All of Pif Clothing Co. summer line products will be printed on American Apparel Garments. T-shirts are a 50/50 cotton/polyester blend, which creates a comfortable and slim fitting t-shirt. Tanktops are tri-blend (50%Polyester/25%Cotton/25%Rayon), making a soft and light tank top perfect for hot summer days. Pif Clothing Co. sweatshirts are 100% Cotton, comfy, warm, and great year round.

How do your sizes fit?

We will be printing Mens/Unisex sizes S, M, L, XL, XXL

We will be printing Womens sizes S, M, L, XL

We will be printing Sweatshirt sizes S, M, L, XL, XXL

Mens/Unisex T-Shirts, Tank Tops & Unisex Sweatshirts

Womens T-Shirts & Tank Tops

Will buying from Pif Clothing Co. create American jobs? 

 Why, of course! Pif Clothing Co. is already generating business for many companies (Screen Print Shop, Tag Company, Clothing Manufacturer, Local Sewing Business). The more products that Pif Clothing Co. sells, the more help is needed, bringing even more work to these local businesses, creating even more jobs for them. The brand is always growing, creating an even bigger need for employees within as well.

How does the donating process work? 

 Thanks for asking! Pif Clothing Co. donates on somewhat of a quarterly basis (February/March, May/June, August/September, November/December). When the time comes, I contact the Boys and Girls Clubs that desire to receive clothing from Pif Clothing Co. and supply them with an item of each size. These will be used to figure out how many of each size product they would need. We then ship each Club as many garments as we can to best fill their requests.

How can a clothing business like Pif Clothing Co. be sustainable when it has such a low profit margin?

Great question! It all comes down to the ordering process. Pif Clothing Co. plans to continue selling products in a similar fashion as that of Indiegogo. Pre-orders will be held for all of our clothing and future products from now on out. Each time an item is introduced, there will be a time limit set (for example: 1 week) to order the product. A minimum number of orders will be set for each product as well. If the minimum number of orders is not met within the set time limit, the products will not be manufactured or sold, and the customers will be refunded their money. This process is set up to prevent the suffering from dead inventory and will guarantee a profit margin. Pif Clothing Co. will sell direct to consumers through our own website (www.pifclothing.com). This will avoid the 100% mark-ups most stores add to products.

Why donate to Boys and Girls Clubs?

I thought you’d never ask. Pif Clothing Co. runs on a mission that I strive to fulfill, which is introducing another aspect to the business that reaches out to the community. We’re not just handing out free t-shirts, but providing clothing that will give a wide range of children confidence and comfort through a stylish, high quality garment. Boys and Girls Club is introduced daily to new children, many of whom come from low-income homes. Not all of these families are able to purchase high quality and trendy clothing on their own. Donating t-shirts won’t change the world, but I believe giving children confidence through quality clothing is a good place to start.

THANKS AGAIN FOR CHECKING OUT MY CAMPAIGN! 

WWW.PIFCLOTHING.COM

story:
My name is Richardson Chery and I was born and raised in Port-Au-Prince, Haiti. From there, I moved to Miami. I currently reside in Los Angeles.

I am looking to start a company that will encourage the Youth of Haiti to speak up and have a place where they can be educated about STD's, HIV, their sexual orientation and any issues or concerns that comes with it. At first, the company will be providing jobs for the youth, and then we will move towards creating community centers for health education and to aid in the prevention of STD's. .

With your help, we will be providing an opportunitty to build a new life to many youth that feel left behind by not only providing them with jobs, but also the neccessary training to start their own companies, and take a stand for social change in Haiti.

What We Need 

We will need:

8 Industrial Sergers at $500 each.

$1,000 for a generator

the remaining $1,000 will go towards buying fabric, elastic, buttons etc...

If our goal isn't met, the amount that we collect will go towards buying the sergers which are the most important piece of our operation.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Please tell as many people as you can. If you have any sergers or generators that you would like to donate, please feel free to contact us. We thank you at kadetNation.
